Eleonor, a 38-year-old married mother of five, works hard to provide for her family. For the past 10 years she has run a general store in the Philippines, and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Having borrowed and repaid 19 previous loans from NWTF, Eleonor is now requesting one for PHP 20000 to purchase additional stocks to sell in her store. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married, with two children. 

Tessie has a small store that sell spices and vegetables. She has had this business for two years. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more spices and vegetables to resell.

Tessie is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more spices and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Jacquilyn

texts.en:
Jacquilyn is married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Jacquilyn is 34 years old and all three of her children are in school.

Jacquilyn has a  business selling used clothing in the Philippines. Jacquilyn requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell.

Jacquilyn has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jacquilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of used clothing to sell

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de 39 años de edad, es una persona muy alegre y positiva quien a pesar de las dificultados ha logrado salir adelante junto a su familia la cual esta conformada por sus cuatro hijos. María posee una tienda, en la cual comercializa productos tanto alimenticios como de primera necesidad en el hogar, la cual está ubicada en su casa de habitación, en donde desde hace 5 años que se dedica a ella. María solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir la tienda comprando más pan, leche, jugos y otros productos más, los cuales posee mayor demanda, así de esta forma ella espera mejorar sus ventas. María  es una mujer muy trabajadora la cual desea mejorar su negocio y de esta forma contar con una mejor estabilidad y así  brindarle un futuro comprometedor a sus hijos en el cual puedan contar con todo lo necesario para vivir mejor.
texts.en: María del Carmen, thirty-nine, is a very happy and positive person who, despite difficulties, has managed bring success to her family, which includes four children.  She has a store where she sells basic household food items.  The store is located in her home, where she's been working for five years.  María is seeking a loan to stock up on bread, milk, juices, etc., because they are in high demand and she is hoping to increase sales.  She is a hard-working woman who wants to improve her business so she can have more stability and provide her children a promising future in which they have all they need for a better life.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk, and juices to sell in her store.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es: María Concepción de cuarenta y seis años de edad  vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas, y a la venta de productos por catalogo, tiene varios años con su negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad de producto, los excelentes precios pero sobre todo por el buen  servicio; María es una mujer emprendedora y con muchas metas que desea alcanzar siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le ayuden ha llegar al éxito, piensa que si trabaja con perseverancia y motivación no tardara mucho en lograrlo; en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda de su producto y como toda buena comerciante planea aprovechar este momento para acrecentar el negocio pero para ello necesita aumentar la inversión y no posee suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles, y productos de catalogo. María Concepción tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que pagara la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Concepción, 46, lives with her life partner and their two children in their own house. She makes a living selling pupusas and products by catalog. She has had this business for several years and she has grown a large clientele because people prefer the quality of her products, the excellent prices, and above all the good service. María is an entrepreneurial woman with many goals she wishes to meet. She is always on the lookout for new opportunities to help her achieve success. She thinks that if she works with perseverance and motivation, she will not take long to achieve success.

In recent weeks the demand for her products has risen, and like every good merchant she plans to take advantage of this moment to grow the business, but for that she needs to investment more and she does not have enough capital to support this. This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn, cheese, pork rinds, beans and catalog products. María Concepción has good payment references and is very responsible. She assures us that she will pay her debt off along with giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, fried pork rind, beans and catalog products

loans.name: Dolores Gloria

texts.es: Dolores Gloria de  69 años de edad, es una señora muy laboriosa que a pesar de su edad debe trabajar arduamente para salir adelante junto a su nieto menor de edad. Ella posee una tienda donde comercializa productos perecederos como: bebidas, granos básicos, golosinas, pan entro otros más, así mismo para obtener ganancias extras ella se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas, un negocio que es de mucha ayuda para ella ya que posee varios clientes quienes de paso al comprar las tortillas compran algún productos de la tienda, su nieto le ayuda a atender ambos negocios. Dolores solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la tienda y adquirir nuevos productos y mayor cantidad de la que ya tiene; así mismo para comprar maíz para la elaboración de tortillas. Dolores ansia mucho salir adelante y mejorar su estabilidad económica pronto.
texts.en:
Dolores Gloria, 69 years old, is a hard-working woman who works arduously to move forward, despite her age. She works with her young grandson. Dolores owns a store, in which she sells perishable goods such as drinks, basic grains, candy, bread, and other products. Also, in order to earn extra income, she makes tortillas. This business is a great help to her because many of the customers who come to buy tortillas also buy some products from the store. Her grandson helps her with both businesses. 

Dolores is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, so she can use the money to invest in the store and acquire new products in larger quantities than she has currently. She will also buy corn for making tortillas. Dolores has much desire to move forward and improve her financial stability soon.

loans.use: to buy perishable goods for her store

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Mary is 45 years old, comes from Olkalou, and is married with two children who are aged 22 and seven years old. 

Mary has a dairy business that she has been doing for the past four years and has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy another dairy cow. She is optimistic that her dairy business will do better since there will be an increase in milk production.

She hopes to be financially independent and improve the living standards of the family.

loans.use: to buy another dairy cow

loans.name: Dante

texts.en:
Dante is from Magsaysay, Baliangao. He is 53 years old and married, with five children. 

To make a living, Dante plants, harvests, and sells bananas. He has been in business for two years and earns PHP 6,000 a month for these activities. This year, Dante joined GDMPC. 

Dante is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000, which will be used to purchase fertilizers, such as manure. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, such as manure

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.en:
Marcelino is 42 years old and married, and he and his wife are blessed with three school-aged-children.  

Marcelino is engaged in a hog fattening business as a source of income. He has been managing his hog raising business for over two years. 

He is a very patient and industrious father. He operates his livelihood to provide all the needs of his family. It is quite difficult, but his willingness to lift his family from poor living pushes him to execute this work.

Now he is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy fees, vitamins, and vaccine for his hogs. He wants to develop his hog fattening business more to earn higher proceeds for his children.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccine for his hogs

loans.name: Eusebio De Jesus

texts.es: Eusebio, es un señor de 64 años, está casado y tiene 8 hijos, vive solo con su esposa en el municipio de Omoa, Cortes. Hace más de 10 años que don Eusebio estableció su propio negocio de una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como granos básicos, lácteos, azúcar, productos enlatados, condimentos, etc. además vende repuestos para bicicletas, baterías, pastillas, y otros de abarrotería. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para surtir el negocio de más productos de granos básicos, lácteos, embutidos y refrescos. El quiere que su negocio se mantenga estable con esta inversión y que aumente las ventas. Su meta es trabajar mucho para dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Eusebio is a 64 year-old gentleman who is married and has 8 children.  He lives only with his wife in the municipality of Omoa, in the department of Cortes.  More than 10 years ago, Eusebio started up his own business.  The business is a grocery store where he sells consumer staples such as: grains, dairy products, sugar, canned goods, condiments, etc.  He also sells spare parts for bicycles, batteries, pills and other grocery items.  He is requesting a loan of 10,000 Honduran lempiras to stock up his store with more staple grains, dairy products, sausages and beverages.  With this investment, he wants to keep his business stable and increase his sales.  Eusebio's goal is to work a lot in order to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, dairy products, sausages, juices and other beverages to stock up his store

loans.name: Siempre Amigas  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Siempre Amigas es un banco comunal formado por 18 mujeres quienes viven por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar que tiene hermosos paisajes para disfrutar de la calidez de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil como las socias quienes trabajan diariamente para mejorar la economía de sus hogares y buscan un mejor porvenir para sus familias, se dedican a los trabajos del campo como la agricultura y cría de animales, al comercio y muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes puestos de trabajo.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Carmen Lucia, tiene 35 años, es madre soltera de  un hijo de 4 años de edad  que este año ingresa a estudiar a una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su abuelita a quien le ayuda con los gastos del hogar y le hace compañía.
 
La Señora Carmen Lucia de es una profesional en la rama de la costura, tiene un pequeño taller hace 4 años en donde se dedica a elaborar polleras (vestidos típicos) y blusas. También cría animales en especial ganado.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la  compra de telas e hilos para su negocio.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
"Always Friends" is a communal bank formed by 18 women who live near the parish of Valle en Cuenca, a place that has beautiful countryside in which one can enjoy the warmth and beauty of nature.  The people of Valle de Cuenca are friendly and gentle, like the members of the community bank, who work daily to better the economies of their homes and seek a better future for their families.  They work at jobs of the countryside like agriculture and the raising of animals commercially.  Many also work in the city at various different kinds of jobs.

One of the members of this group is Carmen Lucia.  She is 35 years old and is the single mother of one 4 year old son, who this year will begin to study in a small school in the city.  She doesn't have her own house so she lives in her grandmother's house, who helps her with the household costs and gives her company.

Carmen Lucia is a professional dressmaker.  She has had a small shop for the last 4 years where she makes "polleras" (typical dresses of the region) and blouses.  She also raises livestock, especially cattle.

Her new loan will be used for the purchase of cloth and thread for her business.

Her dream is to own her own home.

loans.use: to buy cloth and thread

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos quienes le ayudan en el negocio. Ella posee su propio negocio en el cual elabora tortillas, realizándolas  de lunes a domingo, ya que posee muchos clientes a los cuales es necesario atenderlos lo mejor posible. El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación en donde vende con la mayoría de sus vecinos y personas de los alrededores. Antonia  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de materia prima para elaborar las tortillas. Este negocio es muy importante para Antonia  ya que le permite crecer como persona, debido a que puede contar con su propio trabajo y de esta misma forma ayudar a su familia a contar con una mejor estabilidad económica y así mismo a contar con todo lo necesario para el hogar.
texts.en:
Antonia lives with her husband and two children who help her with the business. She has her own business in which she makes tortillas, making them from Monday to Sunday since she has many clients and it is necessary to attend to them in the best possible way. The business is located in a room of her house where she sells to the majority of her neighbors and the people from nearby. 

Antonia is requesting a loan with which she can buy a larger quantity of raw material to make her tortillas. This business is very important to Antonia since it allows her to grow as a person due to the fact that she can rely on her own work, and by working can help her family to have better economic stability and likewise have everything necessary for the home.

loans.use: to buy corn in order to make tortillas

loans.name: Eda Marili

texts.es: Eda Marili vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad, ella es una persona muy trabajadora la cual se dedica de lleno a su negocio para brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Desde hace cinco años ella posee una sala de belleza en donde trabaja a mujeres niños y hombres haciendo cortes de cabello, tintes, manicuras y más, así mismo comercializa productos de belleza y joyería con baños de oro o de plata. Eda cuenta con varios clientes ya que ha logrado ganar la confianza de sus vecinos y amigos quienes saben que siempre realiza el mejor trabajo posible. Eda solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el deseo de poder comprar mayor cantidad de productos de belleza, joyería y tintes en diferentes marcas y variedad, de esta forma podrá ampliar su negocio y contar con una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Eda Marili lives together with her husband and two minor children. She is a very hard-working person who dedicates herself fully to her business, in order to provide the best for her family. For the past five years, she has operated a beauty salon where she works on women, children and men, providing haircuts, coloring, manicures and more. At the same time, she sells beauty products and jewelry plated with silver or gold. Eda has numerous customers, since she has been able to win the confidence of her neighbors and friends, who know that she always does the best work possible. Eda is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL with the desire to be able to buy a larger quantity of beauty products, jewelry and hair dyes of various brands and types. In this way she will be able to expand her business and have better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
María, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada, tiene 3 hijos y vive con su familia en el municipio de Santa cruz de Yojoa, Cortes.
Ella tiene 10 años de dedicarse a las actividades de agricultura, en su parcela cultiva hortalizas, como culantro, pataste, zanahoria, rábano etc. ella ha sido cliente de ODEF, quien ha solicitado 10 prestamos anteriormente con los cuales ha mantenido en pie sus cultivos. Actualmente solicita otro de 25,000 Lempiras con el cual va a fertilizar los cultivos y va preparar parcelas para nueva siembra, ampliando así su cultivo principalmente el de culantro. Su meta es seguir trabajando para darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria, 38, is married and has 3 children.  She lives with her family in the municipality of Santa Cruz de Yojoa in the department of Cortes.

Maria has been farming for 10 years; on her land, she cultivates vegetables such as cilantro, chayote, carrots, and radishes.  She has been a client of ODEF who has requesting 10 loans previously.  She has used those loans to keep going with her farming activities.  She is now requesting another loan, of 25,000 Honduran lempiras, that she will use to fertilize her crops and prepare parcels of land for a new planting.  This way she can expand her main crop, which is cilantro. 

 Maria's goal is to continue to work so that she can provide a higher standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to fertilize her vegetable crops and prepare land to cultivate

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es: Rosalina  de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos de uso personal, blusas, camisas, vestidos, pantalones, cremas, perfumes, todo para dama, caballeros y niños, comercia de forma ambulante y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, además tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; Rosalina es una mujer activa, entregada a su labor, esta siempre a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que se le presenten pues sabe que esas le abrirán puertas al éxito, una de sus grades metas es acrecentar su negocio pero necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, etc. Rosalina tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rosalina, 51, lives with her family and works as a street vendor selling clothing and personal care products: blouses, shirts, dresses, pants, creams, perfumes, and women's, men's and children's accessories.  She has acquired much experience in sales and attracted many customers, since people prefer to buy from her when they need a top quality item, at a low price and with good customer service.  

Rosalina is very active and dedicated to her job; and she is always on the alert for new opportunities to help her be successful.  One of her greatest goals is to grow her business, but she needs working capital and is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy wholesale clothing, perfumes, creams, cosmetics, etc.  Rosalina has a good credit record and very high values, and is committed to paying back her loan while providing a full life for her family.

loans.use: To buy wholesale clothing, perfumes, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Mujeres Floreciendo  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Floreciendo es un banco comunal que está formado por 13 socias, ellas son amigas, vecinas y conocidas que tienen algo en común que es salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias a superarse, son trabajadoras, luchadoras y a pesar de las  adversidades de la vida siempre están mirando hacia delante con una sonrisa. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene clima frió, su geografía accidentada le regala hermosos paisajes, su arquitectura que es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su cultura y tradiciones son admiradas por sus visitantes y es un orgullo para su gente.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Luz, tiene 45 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 23 años que está en la universidad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que viven es la recompensa a su arduo trabajo en matrimonio.
 
Doña Luz es dueña de una volqueta y se dedica al trasporte pesado desde hace 8 años, para esto tiene un chofer a quien le paga un sueldo mensual. En casa se dedica a la cría de cuyes, gallinas y cerdos y también se dedica a la agricultura, sus cosechas son para la venta y el consumo de su hogar.
 
Su crédito ahora lo va a invertir en la compra de alimento para sus animales y cerdos para seguir creciendo en esta actividad.
 
Su sueño es viajar a diferentes partes del mundo que le gustaría conocer.
texts.en:
"Mujeres Floreciendo" [Women in Bloom] is a communal bank that is made up of 13 members. They are friends, neighbors, and acquaintances who have something in common: making a living and helping their families to improve themselves. They are hardworking, determined, and despite the adversity in their lives, they always look to the future with a smile. 

They live in different areas of the city of Cuenca. This city has cold weather, and its rugged geography offers beautiful scenery. Its architecture is a mixture of colonial and modern, and its culture and traditions are admired by its visitors and a source of pride for its people.

Luz is one of the members of the group. She is 45 years old and married. She and her husband have one 23-year-old son who is at the university. Her husband works in the construction field as a bricklayer. The house they live in is the reward for their hard work as a couple.

Luz is the owner of a dump truck and she has worked in heavy transport for eight years. For this, she has a driver to whom she pays a monthly salary. At home, she works at raising guinea pigs, hens, and pigs, and she also does agricultural work; her harvests are for sale as well as household consumption.

She will now invest this loan in the purchase of livestock feed and pigs, so she can continue developing this business.
 
Her dream is to travel to different parts of the world that she would like to visit.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Rene Armando

texts.es: Rene Armando de veintitrés años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hija; él se dedica a la venta de tortillas con ayuda de su esposa, tiene varios años con el negocio y  eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas, el negocio esta ubicado en su domicilio y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios pero sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Rene es un hombre dedicado a su labor, honesto, responsable y soñador, esta dispuesto a ganarse un futuro mejor, en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda de su producto y como todo buen comerciante quiere acrecentar la tortilleria pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Rene Armando tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene confianza que podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Rene Armando is twenty-three years old and lives with his wife and daughter.  He sells tortillas with the help of his spouse.  He has worked in this business for several years and has been rewarded with lots of experience in sales.  The business is run out of his home and he has many customers.  People prefer him for the quality and good prices of his tortillas, but above all for his excellent service.

Rene is a man dedicated to his work.  He is honest, responsible, and a dreamer.  He is willing to earn a better future.  In the last few months, the demand for his product has increased, and like all good businessmen, he wants to expand his tortilla business but needs the capital.  For this reason, he is asking for this loan from INTEGRAL that will permit him to purchase wholesale corn.  Rene Armando has a good record of repayment.  He is sure that he can repay this debt, and at the same time, he has confidence that he can offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en: Alicia is 45 years old, married, and has two children who attend school. Alicia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Alicia requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Alicia has been raising pigs for five years now and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Alicia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy showcases, shelves and materials to construct a kiosk.

loans.name: Rosalva Elizabeth

texts.es: Rosalva Elizabeth de 29 años de edad, es una persona soltera y sin hijos, quien trabaja para salir adelante y superarse cada vez más para ser mejor. Ella posee un salón de belleza en el cual trabaja desde hace tres años, tiempo en el cual se ha esforzado por equipar con todo lo necesario su negocio, siendo en la actualidad aún una necesidad ya que las tendencias de bellas van cambiando constantemente. Rosalva solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más espejos, sillas, pelucas, tintes, cremas y todo lo necesario para realizar su trabajo y así mismo para comercializar con sus clientes. Ella tiene muchas esperanzas de mejorar sus ingresos y así vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Rosalva Elizabeth, 29, is single, with no children, and works to get ahead and improve her lifestyle.  She has been running a beauty salon for three years, during which time she has worked hard to equip her business with everything she needs, although it is something she must stay on top of because of the constantly changing trends of the beauty world.

Rosalva is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy mirrors, chairs, hair pieces, hair color, cream and everything she needs to do her work and sell products to customers.  She is very hopeful of improving her income and leading a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy chairs, hair pieces and hair color for her business.

loans.name: Silvia Patricia

texts.es: Silvia Patricia de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Néstor y sus dos hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de mariscos camarones, conchas y pescado por la mañana y pupusas por la tarde, tiene varios años de trabajar en este negocio y se hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo el producto es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Silvia es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica,  luchadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, sabe que solo con perseverancia y motivación alcanzara el éxito que desea, como toda buena comerciante desea aumentar sus ganancias pero para eso necesita aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mariscos por mayor, maíz, quesillo, frijol, chicharrón, etc. Silvia Patricia tiene buenas referencias de pago, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Silvia Patricia is 33 years old and lives with her life partner, Nestor, and their two children. She runs a business selling shrimp, shellfish and fish during the mornings and dumplings in the afternoons. She has been running her business for a few years and she has many customers because people know that her products are high-quality and that she offers excellent service. Silvia is dedicated to her work, she is energetic, hard-working and wants to get ahead in life. She knows that she will only achieve success if she perseveres and stays motivated. Like all good business people, she wants to increase her earnings but, to do so, she needs to increase her level of investment; consequently, she is applying to INTEGRAl for a loan, which will allow her to buy wholesale seafood, corn, cheese, beans and pork, etc. Silvia Patricia has good credit references and takes a responsible attitude towards paying off her debt, and at the same time she has faith that she will be able to bring economic security to her family home.

loans.use: to buy wholesale seafood, corn, cheese, beans and pork.

loans.name: Justina Lum

texts.en:
She is married with three children and they live in a two-room house in Mbengwi, Momo Division, Northwest Region, Cameroon.  She has faced challenges in life such as poverty in her family, death of her loved ones, sickness of family members, and an accident that left her child seriously sick with pain and injuries.

She joined GHAPE in the year 2005 and has taken and successfully repaid her loans four times. Her life has been a success story since she joined GHAPE because her standard of living has been raised. 

She is a hardworking farmer involved in the cultivation of cassava, beans, and maize. She says if given the new loan requested, she will expand her business and improve her yields by paying people to clear her farmlands, buy improved farm seedlings, and also buy fertilizers. She holds a positive view her business will succeed, since she has experience in the field due to longevity. She will put good fertilizer on the crops and also plant good improved farm seedlings.

She promises to expand her business with the profit, educate her children, provide medication for the family, and also buy pigs as to diversify her business. She prefers GHAPE loans because the members are educated before loan disbursement, repayments are made at convenient intervals, and no collateral is needed before loan disbursement.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings, labour, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Grupo Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité Grupo Unidas esta compuesto por 16 integrantes mujeres que viven en la misma comunidad. El comité ya tiene mucha de experiencia con el  trabajo grupal, ya que son años los que trabajan juntas, se reúnen cada semana para compartir, comunicar e interiorizarse de las novedades que se generan dentro del grupo, a resolver sus indiferencias etc.
Una de las integrantes, la señora Lilian es casada y tiene 2 hijos que viven con ella. Lilian se dedica a la venta de ropas para mujeres y niños y con los ingresos que ella obtiene ayuda a su marido en los gastos del hogar. 
Con el crédito pedido, la señora desea comprar mayor cantidad de mercaderías como remeras, pantalones, camisas, etc para luego volver a venderlas a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee "Grupo Unidas" ("United Group") is made up of 16 female members who live in the same community.  The committee has lots of experience with group work and has worked together for years.  They meet every week to share, communicate and learn about the news of other members of their group, to resolve their differences, etc.

One of the members, Lilian, is married and has two children that live with her.  Lilian sells clothing for women and children.  With the income she obtains, she helps her husband with the household expenses.

With this loan, Lilian wants to buy a greater quantity of merchandise like knit shirts, pants, t-shirts, etc. which she will later sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like knit shirts, skirts, t-shirts and pants

loans.name: Concepción Luz

texts.es: Concepción Luz  de 18 años de edad, es una joven humilde pero trabajadora quien cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos ya que se esfuerza para salir adelante, ya que únicamente vive junto a su abuela y dos hermanos junto a quienes trabaja para contar con todo lo necesario. Concepción se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas las cuales comercializa de forma ambúlate en colonias aledañas a su vivienda, así mismo le ayuda a su abuela a elaborar tortillas para posteriormente venderlas. Concepción solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con la intención de poseer el dinero necesario para comprar más verduras y atender todos los pedidos que sus clientes le hacen, así mismo para comprar leña y maíz para el negocio de las tortillas. Con esto Concepción espera aumentar sus ganancias para poder vivir mejor junto a su abuela quien también ha luchado mucho por sus nietos, lo que Concepción espera compensárselo mejorando los ingresos actuales.
texts.en:
Concepcion Luz, 18, is a humble and hardworking youth who has good references from her neighbors, because she works hard to get ahead.  She lives only with her grandmother and her two siblings, and they work together so that they will have everything they need.

Concepcion has a business selling fruits and vegetables.  She sells from place to place in the neighborhoods surrounding her house.  In addition, she helps her grandmother to make tortillas to later sell.  Concepcion is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can have enough money to buy more vegetables to fill all of her customer's orders.  She will also buy firewood and corn for her tortilla business.  With this investment, Concepcion hopes to increase her earnings so that she can live better along with her grandmother.  Concepcion's grandmother fought hard to provide for her grandchildren, and she would like to pay her back by improving her current income.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Atanga Joana

texts.en:
She is a widow with five children, and they live in a four-room house in Mbengwi, Momo Division, Northwest Region, Cameroon.  She has faced many challenges in life, which include the death of one parent, sickness of her children, and poverty as a widow after the death of her husband, and also constant accusation from her in-laws that she killed her husband.

She joined GHAPE in the year 2002 and has taken and successfully repaid her empowerment credit seven times. She is very hardworking and involved in farming and as such cultivates yams, beans, corn, and a variety of vegetables. 

She promises that, if given the new loan requested, she will buy good seedlings, pay people to clear the farm land, buy fertilizers, and pay people for weeding of the farm. 

She holds a positive view that her business will succeed because there is high demand where she lives. The crops cultivated will serve the community as food, and because she keeps animals, the manure will be used for fertilizing the farm and as such she will have good yields. She will also sell to her friend, who will resell in the Bamenda food market. From this business, the community will benefit from low-price, high-quality farm produce and availability at all times.

She promises that the profit from the loan will be used for family medication and to buy other commodities which she cannot produce; also payment of her children’s school fees and purchase of books. She says a GHAPE loan is preferable because of low interest rates, the repayment of the loan in installments, and education on management before loan disbursement.

loans.use: to purchase labour, manure, seedlings (yams, beans, corn, and a variety of vegetables), and fertilizer.

loans.name: Elsa Raquel

texts.es: Elsa Raquel de 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien posee una panadería y trabaja haciendo viajes en su pick up; así también vive junto a dos hijos menores de edad. Elsa trabaja en su propio negocio, el cual es una tienda en la que se comercializan productos de primera necesidad como pan, agua, gas propano, medicinas y algunas golosinas, su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Elsa desea mucho el poder surtir en gran medida su negocio, ya que de esta forma podrá vender más y obtener más ganancias, es por esto que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar todos los productos necesarios para brindarles todo lo que sus clientes buscan, de esta forma ella podrá brindar un mejor servicio el cual se vea recompensado con más clientes. Para Elsa su negocio es muy importante ya que cuenta con la ventaja de poseerlo en su hogar lo cual le permite atenderlo y así mismo estar junto a sus hijos a las cuales al mismo tiempo les puede brindar todo lo que necesiten.
texts.en:
Elsa Raquel, 34, lives with her husband who has a bakery and also works using his pick-up truck for transportation.  They live with their two minor children.  Elsa has her own business, which is a store where she sells essential daily items such as bread, water, propane gas, medicines and some sweets.  Her store is in a room of her house.  Elsa wants to offer a wide variety of products at her store so she can sell more and earn a higher profit.  Therefore she is requesting a loan so she can buy the products the customers are looking for.  This will improve her customer service and attract more business.

Elsa's store is very important to her because it allows her to stay at home and do her housework while being close to her children and providing them with everything they need.

loans.use: To buy groceries for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale vegetables.

loans.name: Verginia

texts.en:
Verginia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food and fruits vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years. She earns more income from a direct selling business.

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients and fruits to sell in her food and fruit vending business. Verginia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients and fruits to sell.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en: Michael is a 28-year-old from Nakuru and is married with a four-year-old child. He has a transportation business that he has been operating for the past two years. He has applied for his first business loan from KADET LTD to buy another motorcycle. He is optimistic that his business will do well in the near future.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Junelyn

texts.en: Junelyn is married with 1 child. She is 26 years old and lives in the Philippines. Junelyn is a farmer and she manages a gardening business to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years, and every month she earns about 3,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 4,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Junelyn is a new member of GDMPC. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Marvin Yovani

texts.es: Marvin Yovani vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hija, el posee una tapicería, elabora y repara sillones, sillas, entre otros, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite realizar cada día mejor su labor, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por la calidad, por los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Marvin es hombre dedicado a su labor, enérgico, con muchos deseos de alcanzar sus  sueños y salir adelante, su mas grande secreto es la perseverancia sabe que así lograra el éxito; en los últimos meses aumento la demanda en el negocio y necesita cubrir las necesidades de los clientes, pero para ello necesita de capital que le permita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela, forros, hilos, pega, etc. Marvin tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marvin Yovani lives with his life partner and their daughter. He owns an upholstery business where he makes and repairs armchairs and chairs, among other items. He has worked in this industry for a few years and he has gained a great deal of experience, which allows him to continuously improve his work. He has many customers as people prefer the quality of his work, his good prices and, above all, his excellent service. Marvin is dedicated to his work, he is full of energy and wants to achieve his dreams and get ahead in life. The secret to his business is perseverance; he knows that this will bring him success. In the last few months there has been an increase in demand for his work and he needs to fulfill his clients' requirements. Consequently, he needs capital to invest, so he has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy fabric, covers, threads and glue, etc. Marvin has good credit references and he is sure that he will be able to meet his repayments. At the same time, he has faith that he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, covers, threads and glue

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina Guadalupe de 31 años de edad, es muy responsable y trabajadora, es madre de tres pequeños hijos y es soltera siendo la única encargada de bienestar de ellos ya que no posee ninguna ayuda. Marina se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo como: perfumes, maquillaje, tintes para el cabello y otros más, su negocio es bastante estable ya que cuenta con una cantidad bastante grande de clientes los cuales mes a mes consumen los productos que ella comercializa de forma ambulante, haciendo visitas de casa en casa mostrando los diferentes catálogos. De esta forma Marina se gana la vida y es así como le brinda alimentación, estudios, vestido y más a sus hijos. Es por esto que ella solicita un préstamo para poder comprar mayor variedad de cosméticos y así mismo diferentes productos para ofrecer a sus clientes a los cuales en su mayoría compran a crédito por lo que Marina necesita cierta cantidad de dinero para invertir en el negocio.
texts.en:
Marina Guadalupe, 31, is a hard-working, responsible mother of three small children.  She is single and the only one responsible for her children's well-being, since she has no help.  Marina sells products by catalogue, such as perfumes, make-up, hair color and other items.  Her business is fairly stable since she has many customers who consume her products on a monthly basis.  

She works door-to-door and visits each household where she shows her catalogues.  This is how she earns a living to feed, educate, cloth and do even more for her children.  This is why she is requesting a loan to buy a wider variety of cosmetics and have different products to offer her customers.  Marina sells to most of them on credit so she needs a certain amount of money to invest in her business.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Silvestra

texts.en:
Silvestra is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. She makes and sells rattan furniture. She has had this business for 6 years. 

Silvestra is a new member of HSPFI. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase raw materials for making rattan furniture.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making rattan furniture.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en: Hadija is mother to her two adult children. She is married to Ali, a businessman. For the last two years, she has been selling makuti (thatching palm fronds) from her home. Despite the few achievements she has made in her business, she faces the challenge of high transport cost. Hadija dreams of opening some outlets so as to increase her sales. This way she will be able to continue to provide for her family. Her cry is to see her business prosper; however, she does not have enough capital to invest in her business. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 30,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase more makuti and pay for the transportation cost.

loans.use: to purchase more makuti (thatching palm fronds) and pay for the transportation cost.

loans.name: Alfreda

texts.en: Alfreda is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. Alfreda has a food/retail shop (sari-sari store) that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages. Alfreda has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Alfreda hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Soraya Ivonn

texts.es: Soraya Ivonn vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos menores de edad quienes son los que le dan las fuerzas para ser mejor día con día.  Con el deseo de poder suplir todos gastos y necesidades del hogar, Soraya inició su propio negocio el cual es una tienda de productos perecederos, la cual está ubicada en su casa de habitación. Soraya  atiende el negocio de lunes a domingo, su jornada  inicia cada día a las 6 de la mañana y termina a las 10 de la noche, a pesar que su trabajo es pesado ya que debe atender clientes a lo largo del día, le permite poder cuidar a sus hijos. Es por esto que ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda invertir comprando mayor cantidad de productos de primera necesidad y de esta manera mejorar sus ventas, las cuales le permitan suplir todas las necesidades de sus hijos y del hogar.
texts.en:
Soraya Ivonn lives together with her husband and three minor children; they give her the strength to do better day after day. With the desire to be able to supplement all their household expenses and needs, Soraya began her own business, which is a grocery store located in her home. 

Soraya works in her shop from Monday to Sunday; her workday starts every day at six in the morning and ends at ten o'clock at night. Although her work is difficult and she has to tend to her customers all day long, it allows her to take care of her children. That's why she is requesting a loan that she will be able to invest in a larger quantity of essential goods so she can improve her sales, allowing her to provide for all the needs of her children and her home.

loans.use: to buy perishable goods to sell.

loans.name: Ena Ruth

texts.es: Ena Ruth de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de pollo y menudos, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia  en las ventas, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque su producto es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable siempre se encuentra a la orden de los clientes; Ena es una mujer activa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que entre mas duro trabaje, mayor será la recompensa al final del camino, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollo por mayor, menudos, embutidos etc. Ena Ruth tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo tiene la confianza que podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Ena Ruth is 43 years old and lives with her life partner and their son in their own home. She has been running a business selling chicken and giblets for a few years, and she has gained a great deal of experience in sales. She has many customers as people prefer her high-quality products, her affordable prices and her unbeatable service; she is always there to serve her clients. Ena is an active lady, who wants to get ahead in life; she believes the harder she works, the greater the recompense in the end. In the last few weeks, there has been an increase in demand for her products and she wants to seize on that as an opportunity to increase her level of investment. Consequently, she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to help her buy wholesale chicken, giblets and cold meats etc. Ena Ruth has good credit references and is a very responsible person; she is certain that she will be able to repay her loan in the defined period and, at the same time, she trusts that she will be able to offer her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy chicken wholesale, giblets and cold meats

loans.name: La Esperanza Ii Group

texts.es:
El comité La Esperanza II esta integrado por 18 mujeres que se dedican a actividades varias, desde la venta de ropas hasta la limpieza de un hotel de la zona. El comité se caracteriza por estar integrado por mujeres emprendedoras, y por ver resultados rápidos a sus micro negocios y con ella  colaboran con los ingreso de su hogar y así brindan a sus hijos un mejor bienestar.
Una de las integrantes la señora Nilda, es casada y tiene una hija pequeña, se dedica a la venta de ropas para hombres y mujeres, como remeras, camisas, pantalones, sacos, etc.
Solicita el crédito para poder comprar dichos productos y así venderlos a su clientela, poder cumplir las necesidades de estas y las suyas al mismo tiempo.
.
texts.en:
The committee La Esperanza II is made up of 18 women who work in various businesses, from clothing sales to cleaning a hotel in the region.  The committee is characterized by being made up of enterprising women, and by seeing fast results in their small businesses with which they contribute to their homes' incomes and in this manner provide a higher standard of living for their children.

One of the members, Nilda, is married and has a small daughter.  She works in selling clothes for men and women, like T-shirts, blouses, pants, jackets, etc.  

She requests a loan to be able to buy said products and then sell them to her clients to be able to provide necessities for her family and herself at the same time.

loans.use: to buy clothes like T-shirts, blouses, pants, jackets, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Unidas” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Chore. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, algunas se dedican a la docencia, otras son empleadas domésticas algunas son vendedoras de productos de primera necesidad. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo y su comité.
Una de las integrantes, la señora Graciela tiene una librería donde vende todo tipo de útiles como cuadernos, lápices, marcadores, resmas de hojas, etc todo lo necesario para la escuela o el trabajo, de esta manera ella aporta a su canasta familiar.
El crédito solicitado sería para comprar mayor cantidad de mercaderías para poder satisfacer las demandas de los clientes.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Unidas” Communal Bank was formed when several neighbors came together in the city of Chore. All of the members of the bank engage in their own endeavors: some are teachers, others are domestic employees and some are vendors selling basic necessities. The members form a very close group and are capable of working together to strengthen their team spirit and their bank.

One of the members, Sra. Graciela, has a bookstore where she sells all kinds of supplies, such as notebooks, pencils, markers, reams of paper, etc, everything needed for school or work. In this way she contributes to household expenses.

The loan requested would be to purchase a larger quantity of merchandise in order to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to purchase pencils, notebooks, markers, etc.

loans.name: Dario

texts.es:
El Sr. Dario tiene 36 años es casado  y tienen 2 hijos que viven con ellos.
El Sr. Dario es comerciante se dedica a la venta ambulante de artículos de mercería, ferretería, electrónicos, cuenta con una clientela totalmente formada a la que desea seguir satisfaciendo y por qué no el día de mañana montar su local propio. 
El invertiría este crédito para la compra de más mercaderías ya que cuenta con muy buena demanda en la venta de sus mercaderías, por lo que desea aumentar su stock de mercaderías.
texts.en:
Dario is 36 years old, married, and has 2 children who still live with the family. He is a merchant who sells merchandise in the streets, including both hardware and electronics. He enjoys a firmly established clientele that he wishes to continue satisfying, and he hopes to establish a shop in a fixed locale in the future. 

Dario will use this loan to purchase additional merchandise, since he can count on very good demand. That is why he wishes to augment his supply of mechandise.

loans.use: purchase merchandise, including hardware, electronics, etc., to sell in the streets.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora Alicia de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo; ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos, yuca frita, papas, pastelitos, pupusas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la cocina, prepara los antojitos mas deliciosos del lugar, es muy conocida y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que el producto esta elabora con material de primera calidad, es muy higiénico, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Dora es  un mujer dedicada a su labor, ama lo que  hace, siempre esta haciendo lo posible por mejorar , busca oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el triunfo y no se rendirá hasta dar todo de si, en su puesto de antojitos cada día aumenta mas la demanda pues  esta ubicado en una zona estratégica, quiere mejorar su inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, verdura, carne, quesillo, frijoles, etc. Dora Alicia tiene buen record crediticio y una moral intachable asegura al cien porciento que podrá cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene confianza que podrá ofrecerle a su familia la vida plena que se merecen.
texts.en:
Dora Alicia, 61 years old, lives with her life partner and son. She sells traditional snack foods, fried yuca, potatoes, pastries, pupusas, and other food. She has several years experience in this business and it has given her much experience in the kitchen. She prepares the most delicious snacks in the area. She is well known and has gained many customers. The people know that her products are made with quality ingredients, she is very hygienic, her prices are affordable, and above all, she has excellent service. Dora is a woman dedicated to her work and she loves what she does. She is always doing everything possible to improve. She looks for opportunities that allow her to reach success and she will not stop until this happens. 

At her snack kiosk, the demand for products grows daily because it is in a strategic location. She wants to improve her investment but needs working capital. This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. A loan will allow her to buy corn, vegetables, meat, cheese, beans, and other ingredients. Dora Alicia has a good credit history and a high moral character. She 100% assures that she will pay the debt and at the same time, she is confident that she will be able to give her family the fulfilling life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables, meat, cheese, and beans

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
El Señor Oscar tiene 46 años de edad es casado y tiene 2 hijas una de ellas es mayor de edad, asiste a la universidad la otra, esta cursando la primaria ambas siguen viviendo con ellos.
El señor Oscar se dedica a ser  transportista desde hace 7 años, su trabajo el realiza por épocas. En la época de Junio a Diciembre transporta caña dulce desde su chacra hasta la fábrica de Petropar y los meses restantes lleva mandiocas a la fábrica.
El cliente solicita el préstamos para la compra de cubiertas nuevas para poder trabajar sin inconvenientes.
texts.en:
Oscar, age 46, is married and has two daughters.  One of them is an adult and attends the university, and the other goes to elementary school.  Both daughters continue living with them.

Oscar has been a truck driver for seven years.  His work is seasonal.  From June to December he transports sugar cane from his farm to the Petropar factory.  During the other months he takes cassava to the factory.

He is requesting the loan to buy new tires in order to be able to work without problems.

loans.use: to buy tires for the truck.

loans.name: Santo Tomas Group

texts.es:
El comité Santo Tomas esta integrado por 13 señoras con gran espíritu emprendedor. Las mismas se juntaron para poder unir sus fuerzas y de esa forma lograr objetivos deseados, las mujeres son humildes y muy trabajadoras que luchan día a día por sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Una de las integrantes, la sra. Teodolina tiene una pequeña despensa, la que desea seguir surtiendo con mayor variedad de productos que ofrecer a su clientela y así poderlos satisfacer en muchas necesidades más y generar mayores ingresos para su canasta familiar propia.
Solicita el crédito para comprar bebidas, frutas, verduras, lácteos, panificados, etc.
texts.en:
The committee Santo Tomas is made up of 13 women with great enterprising spirits.  The same women joined to be able to unite their strengths and in this way achieve their desired objectives.  The women are humble and very hardworking, and fight day by day to be able to get their children ahead.

One of the member, Teodolina, has a small pantry, which she wants to continue supplying with better product variety to offer her clients, and be able to satisfy them with many more necessities and generate higher income for her own family's needs.

She requests the loan to buy drinks, fruits, vegetables, dairy products, baked goods, etc.

loans.use: to buy drinks, fruits, vegetables, dairy products, baked goods, etc.

loans.name: María Emma

texts.es: María Emma de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos los cuales aun asisten a la escuela; Ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos y sandalias tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las ganancias esperadas, ya tiene clientela fija que la prefieren porque siempre tiene todo lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precio accesible y además con un excelente servicio; María es una mujer activa, enérgica, dedica a su labor, siempre esta a la búsqueda de oportunidades que le abran  camino prospero en el futuro pues sabe que así tendrá el mayor de los éxitos, en los últimos meses asegura que las ventas en su negocio han aumentado y quiere aprovechar para aumentar  también su inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un  crédito que le permita comprar zapatos y sandalias por mayor. María Emma posee buenas referencias de pago y se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Emma, 44 years old, lives with her life companion and their four children who all still attend school. She sells shoes and sandals and has had her business for several years. She has had a great deal of experience in sales which enables her to obtain expected profits since she has a fixed clientele who prefer her because she always has the high quality products they need at accessible prices and provides excellent service. 

María is a very active and energetic woman who is dedicated to her work. She is always looking for an opportunity to open a path toward prosperity in the future since she knows that is how she will have the greatest success. In recent months, she assures us that her business sales have increased and she wants to take advantage of this opportunity to also increase her investment, however she does not have sufficient capital. Thus she is applying to Integral for a loan that will enable her to buy shoes and sandals wholesale. María Emma has a good payment history and takes responsibility for paying off the debt. At the same time she hopes that she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and sandals wholesale.

loans.name: Marta Lilian

texts.es: Marta Lilian de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a sus hijas, su madre y su hermana; ella se dedica a la venta de comida y antojitos, carne, pollo, ensaladas, arroz, frijoles, sopas, yuca, pupusas, bebidas, entre otros, su negocio esta ubicado en un local en un lugar estratégico, donde transitan muchas personas, tiene varios años elaborando platillos de comida y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la cocina y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, la prefieren por el rico sabor de la comida, por la calidad, lo buenos precios pero sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Marta es una mujer que ama su labor, se entrega día con día al máximo pues sabe que solo con esfuerzo y motivación podrá alcanzar el éxito, en los últimos meses asegura que ha aumentado la demanda y quiere satisfacer  a todos sus clientes, pero necesita invertir en mas materia prima por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, carnes, verduras, lácteos, embutidos, bebidas, etc. Marta Lilian tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá regalarle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Marta Lilian is 41 years old and lives with her daughters, her mother and her sister. She runs a business selling food and snacks, meat, chicken, salads, rice, beans, soups, cassava, dumplings and drinks, among other items. Her business is located in a strategic spot where many people pass by. She has been making food for a few years and she has gained a great deal of experience in the kitchen. She has many customers who come to her for her tasty food, the quality of her food, her good prices and, above all, her excellent service. Marta is a lady who loves her work, she works as hard as she can every day because she knows that she will only succeed by applying effort and staying motivated. In the last few months, she says there has been an increase in demand for her food, and she wants to satisfy her customers but she needs to invest more money in raw materials. Consequently, she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy grains, meats, vegetables, dairy produce, cold meats, drinks, etc. Marta Lilian has good credit references and is a responsible person; she is certain that she will be able to repay her loan and, at the same time, she has faith that she will be able to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: cereals, meats, vegetables, dairy products, cold meats and drinks.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 33 years old and married, with five children. She is married to Luis, a farmer. 

Her small business of cooking and selling snacks such as babana-que (fried banana coated with sugars and flour) allows her to gain PHP 200 daily. She is asking for a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy flour, cooking oil, sugar, and bananas to cook and sell. 

Norma hopes this loan will be given to her so she can continuously offer delicious snacks as well as friendly services to her customers. 

With good capital, Norma would like to put up a small store and increase her earnings too.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, sugar, and bananas to cook and sell

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es: Ana Vilma, vive junto a su hijo quien trabaja como comerciante y junto a su pequeño nieto de seis años de edad. Ana posee un comedor, el cual está ubicado en la su casa de habitación. Ella ha trabajado durante muchos años haciendo desayunos y almuerzos vendiéndolos con sus vecinos, amigos y trabajadores de la zona. Ana necesita poder incrementar su materia prima para poder atender a más clientes, es por esto que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de verduras, granos básicos, fruta, jugos, sodas, todo lo necesario para poder atender mejor a sus clientes y así mismo atender a más personas. Ella desea mucho poder aprovechar al máximo esta situación, debido a que es la única forma que tiene actualmente para ganarse la vida.
texts.en: Ana Vilma lives with her son, who works as a merchant, and her six-year-old grandson.  Ana runs a diner out of her house and has worked several years serving breakfast and lunch to neighbors, friends and workers in the area.  She wants to buy more food ingredients so she can attend to more customers, so she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy more vegetables, basic grains, fruit, juice, sodas and everything she needs to improve customer service and attract more people.  She wants to take full advantage of this situation because it is her ownly source of income for now.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for food production.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam, 36, owns a business selling coconuts from her rural home to nearby neighbors. Her experience goes back ten years when she started out with support from her spouse. She buys the merchandise in various regions of the community she travels to.

Mariam is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing with Yehu through which she’ll buy more coconuts. She wants to be able to offer her loyal customers good prices and quality, which the loan will make possible since she will be able to buy in large volume, thereby obtaining discounts.

loans.use: buy more coconuts to sell.

loans.name: Ahalya

texts.en:
Ahalya is a 45-year-old physically-challenged lady living with her husband; two daughters, ages 18 and 20 years old; and a son, age 15. She is engaged in the activity of weaving handkerchiefs. Her younger daughter helps her weave them. Her elder daughter works as a daily labour in her village. 

The financial condition of the family is not good because Ahalya's husband is also a physically-challenged person, and he is not able to do any kind of work. She buys raw materials like cotton, thread and colours from a dealer and gives the finished goods to him. In return, she gets only the labour cost, which is very little. Ahalya has a plan to buy raw material directly from the market and sell her finished products in the market. Doing so will increase her income.

Ahalya has requested a loan of 15,000 Indian rupees to purchase raw materials for weaving handkerchiefs. She has a dream that her daughters get married into a good house and that she can save some money for her family’s future.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing cotton, thread and colours for weaving handkerchiefs.

loans.name: Ashot

texts.ru:
Ашот занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в деревне Сизнак, Сюникского региона, на протяжении 18 лет. Он разводит кур и свиней, а также выращивает овощи и фрукты. Ашот продает свою сельскохозяйственную продукцию: овощи, фрукты, свинину и яйца, своим постоянным клиентам в городе Капане. Основной акцент в своем бизнесе Ашот делает на свиноводство, так как считает его наиболее выгодным. 
Ашоту 50 лет. Он женат и у него две дочери. Старшая дочь учится в сельскохозяйственном университете, на платном отделении, а младшая учится в школе. Ашот и его жена работает на молочной ферме рабочими. Ежедневно, до и после работы Ашот и его жена работают на своей ферме и, таким образом, содержат семью и платят за обучение старшей дочери.  
Ашоту необходим кредит в размере 500.000 драм для  покупки комбинированного корма для свиней.
texts.en:
Ashot has been running his agriculture business in the village of Siznak of the Syuniksk region for the past 18 years. He keeps chickens and pigs, and also grows fruit and vegetables. He sells his farm's products - vegetables, fruit, pork and eggs - to his regular customers in the city of Kapan. Ashot focuses his business mainly on raising pigs, as he considers it to be the most profitable.

Ashot is 50 years old. He is married and has two daughters. The older daughter is a paying student at an agricultural university, while the younger attends school. Ashot and his wife are employed as labourers at a dairy farm. Each day, both before and after work, they also labour at their own farm, thereby providing for their family and paying for their older daughter's education.

Ashot requires a loan of 500,000 dram to purchase mixed feed for his pigs.

loans.use: to buy fodder for his pigs and piglets

loans.name: Resedá Group

texts.es:
El comité Resedá esta compuesta por 16 miembros mujeres que se dedican a actividades varias. El comité se caracteriza por ser muy unido y responsable ya que muchos de sus familiares dependen de los ingresos que generen las señoras.
Una de las integrantes, María se dedica a la venta de productos de limpieza; con esta actividad ella genera ingresos y aporta a su canasta familiar, le gustaría poder abarcar mayor variedad de productos de limpieza en el día de mañana e ir creciendo dentro de este rubro. 
El crédito solicitado por la señora María sería utilizado para comprar mayor cantidad de productos de limpieza, como desodorante de ambiente, limpia pisos, limpia vidrios, ayudín, detergentes, trapos, etc, para ofrecerles a sus clientes que ya se van volviendo habituales.
texts.en:
The Resedá Communal Bank is composed of 16 female members who are all engaged in various activities. The bank is characterized as being very united and responsible because many of their families depend on the earnings the women generate.

One of the members, María, sells cleaning products. With this business, she earns an income and contributes to household expenses. She would like to be able to offer a greater variety of cleaning products in the near future and continue to grow along these lines.

The loan Sra. María is requesting will be used to purchase a greater number of cleaning products, such as air fresheners, floor cleaners, window cleaners, household helpers, detergents, dust cloths, etc. to offer her customers, who are now turning into regulars.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning products such as window cleaners, air fresheners, dust cloths, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 36 años de edad es casada y tienen 1 hija, viven en el centro de la ciudad de Itá donde en su misma casa posee una despensa bien surtida conocida y frecuentada por sus sus vecinos y ocasionales clientes.
Los productos que ella ofrece son todos los de primera necesidad como azúcar, arroz, yerba, lácteos y otras mercaderías. También posee otro negocio que consiste en alquilar un salón ubicado en un lugar estratégico de la ciudad donde explota un copetín todas las noches.
El crédito solicitado por la Señora sería para comprar mayor cantidad de mercaderías de primera necesidad para la despensa que posee.
texts.en:
María, age 36, is married and has one daughter.  They live in the center of the city of Itá in their own house.  They have a grocery store in their house.  The store is well stocked, well-known, and frequented by their neighbors and occasional customers.

The products that she offers are all of the basic needs items like sugar, rice, tea, dairy products, and other merchandise.

She also has another business, which consists of renting a pub.  It is located in a strategic place in the city where you can get an aperitif every night.

The requested loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of basic needs merchandise for the grocery store that she has.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, tea, and dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Aramayis

texts.ru:
Ферма 51 летнего Арамаиса находится в деревне Срашен, Сюникского региона. Арамаис разводит крупный рогатый скот, свиней и кур, выращивает овощи и фрукты, а на арендованном участке земли выращивает пшеницу. Свою сельскохозяйственную продукцию: выращенные овощи, фрукты и пшеницу, говядину, свинину, молоко и яйца Арамаис реализует в городе Капане.  
Арамаис женат и у него двое детей: 10 летний сын и 3-х летняя дочь. Жена  помогает  Арамаису на ферме, а Арамаис, параллельно ведению сельскохозяйственного бизнеса, работает в Шикаохском заповеднике. 
Благодаря ведению сельскохозяйственного бизнеса Арамаис имеет возможность содержать свою семью. 
Арамаису необходим кредит на сумму 700.000 драм для организации посевных работ, покупки зерна определенного сорта, а также комбинированного корма для свиней.
texts.en:
51-year-old Aramayis's farm is located in the village of Srashen in the Syuniksk region. Aramayis raises cattle, pigs and chickens, cultivates fruit and vegetables, and also grows wheat on a rented plot of land. He sells his farm's products - vegetables, fruit, wheat, beef, pork, milk and eggs - in the city of Kapan.

Aramayis is married and has two children: a 10-year-old son and a 3-year-old daughter. Aramayis' wife helps her husband on the farm while he, in addition to being a farmer, also works in the Shikaogh nature reserve. Thanks to his farm, Aramayis is able to support his family. Presently, he needs a loan of 700,000 dram to organize sowing and to purchase particular types of seeds as well as mixed feed for his pigs.

loans.use: to organize sowing, buy seeds and also fodder for his pigs

loans.name: Jogeswar

texts.en:
Jogeswar is a 26-year-old physically-challenged person living with his father, wife and a son (age 6 months). He has been engaged in the activity of sheep farming for the past six years. He purchases lambs from the market and sells them when they grow up. Presently he has 20 sheep in his farm house. 

Jogeswar wants to purchase 20 more sheep for his farm house, make his farm house bigger, and increase his monthly income. He wants to reduce the gap between the demand for sheep from his customers and the supply of sheep from his farm house to the market to satisfy his customers.

Jogeswar has requested a loan of 30,000 Indian rupees to purchase more lambs. He has a dream of giving his family a better standard of living and saving some money for his family’s future.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing 20 lambs for his sheep farm.

loans.name: Chhel

texts.en:
Chhel is a married woman who lives in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province in Cambodia. She is 50 years old and has six grown-up children. She is a diligent farmer who puts in long days working at her rice field, especially during the rainy season. With the time she has left, Chhel weaves bamboo baskets and containers to sell for additional income. She has been engaged in these two businesses for nearly 10 years, and works continually harder to someday earn a better living standard. Her husband helps her with the farming, and also devotes himself to the construction industry, in which he is skilled in building wooden houses rather than brick ones.

Chhel is requesting this loan because she wants to purchase a jigsaw and other construction supplies for her husband, who is currently building a house for a local villager. She believes that this purchase will allow her husband to perform his work more effectively. She’s very grateful for the loan granted because it will be a great help for her and her husband.

loans.use: to purchase a jigsaw and other construction supplies for her husband, who is building a house for a local villager.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité “San Cayetano” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad deItacurubi del Rosario. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, como son las ventas y cría de animales. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
La señora Silveria se dedica a la venta de leche de vaca recién ordeñada, para mantener la calidad de su producto lo hace de forma instantánea y con mucho cuidado.
El crédito sería utilizado para mejorar la alimentación del animal y también mejorar los envases de su producto.
texts.en:
The committee San Cayetano was formed by various neighbors from the community of Deltacurubi del Rosario. All of the members develop their own economic activities independently such as the raising and selling of animals. The members of the group are very close and capable of working together which strengthens their relationship.
Ms. Silveria sells cow milk, freshly milked, and to maintain the quality of her product she sells it immediately and very carefully.
The loan will be used to improve the nutrition of the cow and also to improve the number of bottles she produces.

loans.use: purchase food for cows.

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en: For over five years, Warlita has worked in raising and fattening hogs. She is 49 years old and the mother of three children. She works hard and is self sufficient, striving to avoid life's hardships and to make sure her childrens' educations are not interrupted. She wants to continue her lifelong dream through her children. Thus, she is requesting a loan amount P15,000 to buy hog feed and three more hogs. She is hoping to maximize these funds to improve her business and the family's financial status.

loans.use: to buy feed and three more hogs

loans.name: Ivy

texts.en: Ivy, who is married with one child, is 22 years old and lives in Sinian, Baliangao in the Philippines. Ivy owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for three years and earns 5,000 PHP each month. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase farm chemicals. Ivy has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. In the future, Ivy's plan is to save her returns on investment in order to buy another plot of farm land.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
El señor Jaime es soltero tiene a su cargo la cantina del Club Deportivo Pilarense donde vende golosinas, cigarrillos y bebidas en general.
El señor se encuentra muy agradecido porque gracias a los créditos ha podido mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
El crédito solicitado sería para invertir en la compra de insumos para su  negocio y de esa manera hacer crecer mas sus ventas.
texts.en: Jaime is a bachelor and has his own business in a cantina at the sports club Pilarense where he sells candies, cigarettes and drinks. He is very grateful because it is thanks to the loans that he has received that he has been able to improve the quality of life for himself and his family. He is asking for a loan that will be used to purchase stock for his business and in this way will be able to increase his sales.

loans.use: purchase candies, cigarettes, drinks etc.

loans.name: Randy

texts.en: Randy is 27 years old, married, and has two young children. He provides motorcycle transport services while his wife cares for their children. His daily income is about 300 PHP, and goes toward the family's food and milk. He would like to keep offering services to the people in his village, which is why he is asking for 6,000 PHP in additional revolving capital.
