He will use the loan to buy oil and gasoline needed in his motorcycle transport businesss. This will help maintain the smooth flow of his operation. Randy's hope is to ensure safe travel to all his pasenggers, and for safety in his own life as well.

loans.use: to buy oil and gasoline for his motorcycle transport service.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 28 years old and from Nakuru, where she and her husband live with their three children, aged between 10 and 2 1/2 years old.

Mary has a food kiosk that she has been running for the past five years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD so that she can increase her stock by buying food ingredients like cooking oil, wheat flour and maize flour.

She hopes to see her business grow in the near future and to be able to open another food kiosk.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like cooking oil, wheat flour, and maize flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To install water and renovate the kitchen.

loans.name: Eufenia

texts.en: Eufenia is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. Eufenia has a pigpen that sells grown, matured pigs. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy animal feed for the pigs. Eufenia has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
El señor Luis es propietario de una constructora pequeña que se dedica a esta actividad. El señor cuenta con movilidad propia tiene un camión y también una motocicleta.
Con el crédito planea crecer como constructora para poder llegar a una mayor cantidad de clientes. Si bien es la primera operación, el señor es una persona que ha demostrado ser muy trabajador y emprendedor.
El señor pide el crédito para poder comprar materiales de construcción como ladrillos, palas, cemento y otros materiales.
texts.en:
Luis is the owner of a small construction company. He has his own means of transport as he has a lorry as well as a motorbike. 
With the loan Luis plans to expand his business to be able to reach a greater number of clients. Although this is his first loan, he is a person who has proven himself to be very hardworking and enterprising. 
Luis is requesting the loan to be able to buy construction materials such as bricks, shovels, cement and other materials.

loans.use: to buy material such as bricks, cement, shovels, etc.

loans.name: Bharat Prasad

texts.en:
Bharat Prasad is a 43-year-old differently-able person living with his wife, daughter (age 14 years old) and son (age 13 years old), who are in their schooling age. He is engaged in the business of selling rice. He purchases rice from farmers and sells it in the market. He earns 5,000 Indian rupees (INR) per month. He has been in this business for the past five years.

Bharat Prasad wants to purchase more stock of rice for his shop and to make his shop bigger in size for which he has requested a loan of 25,000 INR. He says that by increasing his inventory he will be able to earn more and give a better quality of life to his family. He has a dream of educating his children and saving some money for his daughter’s future.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing more stock of rice for his rice shop.

loans.name: Edjiwengatuwa Group

texts.es:
El Comité Edjiwengatuwa está conformado por 17 mujeres que viven en la misma comunidad, las integrantes se dedican a la misma actividad que es la cría de animales. Las integrantes del comité son mujeres humildes y luchadoras que gracias al comité tienen mayores conocimientos sobre las ideas de negocios porque muchas no tenían idea de lo que sería trabajar en equipo. Todas se comprometen a dar lo mejor de sí para que el comité termine el primer ciclo de la mejor manera posible y por encima de todo que mejore el nivel de vida de cada una de las integrantes.
La señora Maribel se dedica a la cría de animales de la chacra como vacas, canchos, gallinas, entre otros.Para ello, la señora tiene que alimentarlos con buenos alimentos todos los días para luego venderlos como animales o los productos que producen como leches, huevos, queso, etc. 
El crédito sería utilizado para la compra de alimentos balanceados a los animales.
texts.en:
The communal bank Edjiwengatuwa is made up of 17 women who live in the same neighborhood. The members all work in the same industry raising animals. The members of the communal bank are humble and hardworking women who, thanks to the communal bank, have more knowledge of business practices because many of them didn’t know what to do. All of them have committed to give their best so that the communal bank can finish its first loan cycle in good standing and above all to improve the quality of life for each member. 

Maribel works raising farm animals like cows, pigs, chickens, etc. To do that, she has to feed them good food every day in order to later sell the animals or their products, like milk, eggs, cheese, etc. 

The loan will be used to buy feed for the animals.

loans.use: to buy feed for her farm animals

loans.name: Pajero Group

texts.en:
Abdallah, who is in his early 40s, is married with two children (boy and girl) who still go to school. He has been running a chips business for six years now. He works from 4pm to 12pm daily and he is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy more stock of his business (a sacks of Irish potatoes and cooking oil) and he has paid back all of his loan successfully. He hopes for a loan to increase more stock of his business to make more chips. His dream is to one day be able to expand more his business.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Pajero" which totals 13 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase more business stock.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: El Sr. Santiago tiene 23 años y es soltero, el se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su tienda de barrio  que se encuentran en la localidad de San Jose,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, Santiago va a usar este préstamo para la compra de una moto para transportarse ya que la distancia es lejos para ir a abastecerse de mercadería y esto le facilitara en su trabajo, Santiago enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida y la  de su familia. Su deseo para su negocio es tener la tienda mas surtida de la localidad, y así de esta manera tener más clientes y por ende mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Santiago is 23 years old and single.  He makes a living selling groceries from his store located in the town of San Jose.  This loan will be his first with this institution.  Santiago will use this loan to purchase a motorcycle so that he can travel the long distances it takes to purchase the materials for his store.  This will make his work much easier. 

Santiago faces challenges in his business like coming out of poverty and he will use the benefits of this loan to better his family's quality of life.  His wish is to have the most stocked store in the neighborhood thus having more customers and a higher income.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: El Batán  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal El Batan es un banco que todos sus miembros están realizando su primer crédito, está formado por 5 socias y 1 socio quienes son amigos y vecinos, todos tienen su diferentes trabajos los mismos que les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera ciudad más importante del país, es desde 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, el calor de su gente, la cultura y tradiciones la hacen una ciudad llena de colorido y encantos.

Una de las socias de este grupo en la Señora. Doris, vive por el sector de la ciudadela Jaime Roldos en la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 34 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijas de 18, 14 y 11 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en la universidad y sus dos últimas hijas estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo ha migrado en busca de mejores oportunidades de trabajo para mejorar la economía de su hogar, la casa en la que viven es fruto del trabajo conyugal.
 
La Señora. Doris se dedica a sus hijas, pero como es una mujer emprendedora y le gusta el comercio también se dedica a la venta de productos naturales y de belleza de la marca Leodine hace 3 meses, pero hace 2 años vende ropa, zapatos y más productos a sus amigas y conocidas, trabaja sin un horario fijo.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos para incrementar su mercadería como ropa, zapatos, cosméticos y productos naturales.

Su meta es  terminar su casa ya que aun le hacen falta algunos acabados.
texts.en:
The El Batan communal bank is a bank whose members are all requesting their first loan. It is made up of 5 female members and 1 male who are all friends and neighbours. They all have different jobs which allow them to pay their household expenses and to improve their families' quality of life. They live in different places in the city of Cuenca which is the third largest city in the country and which has been a World Heritage Site since 1999. The warmth of its people, its culture and traditions make it a city full of colour and charm. 

One of the group's members is Doris. She lives in the area of the Jaime Roldos residential complex in the city of Cuenca. She is 34 years old, and is married with 3 daughters who are aged 18, 14 and 11. Her eldest daughter is studying at university and her younger daughters are studying at a school in the city. Her husband has migrated in search of better opportunities for work in order to improve their household income. The house in which they live is the fruit of their conjugal work. 
 
Doris spends her time looking after her daughters but as she is an enterprising woman and she also likes trading she has been selling natural and beauty products from the Leodine brand for 3 months. Two years ago she sold clothes, shoes and other products to her friends and acquaintances. She has no fixed working hours. 
 
She will invest her loan to buy products to expand her merchandise, such as clothes, shoes, cosmetics and natural products. 

Her goal is to finish her house as it still needs some finishing touches.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, cosmetics and natural products.

loans.name: Dolores Margarita

texts.es:
La Señorita Dolores se encuentra en el sexto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal La Esquina, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene gente cálida, amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, esta ciudad encierra en su arquitectura su historia colonial, cuenta con varios lugares para visitar dentro y afuera de la ciudad.

La Señorita Dolores es una mujer soltera, vive con sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar, la casa en la que viven es propiedad de sus padres.

Ella hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, este producto lo vende cuando tiene la oportunidad a sus amigas y conocidas. Como es una profesional en la rama de la costura realiza todo tipo de arreglos a prendas de vestir y confecciona, alquila disfraces para toda ocasión, también cría cuyes, conejos, cerdos y vacas.
 
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos, alimento para sus animales y telas para su taller.
 
Su meta es crecer en sus negocios.
texts.en:
Señorita Dolores is in her sixth loan cycle with La Esquina Community Bank. She lives in the neighbourhood of Miraflores in Cuenca, a city whose inhabitants are warm, friendly, and kind. They still maintain their traditions and culture. The town displays its roots as a colonial city through its architecture, and it is possible to visit various places inside and outside the city.

Dolores is single and lives with her parents with whom she shares household expenses. The house where they live belongs to her parents.

Dolores started selling cosmetics ten years ago. Whenever she has the chance, she sells to her friends and acquaintances. As she is also a professional seamstress, she also does all kind of alterations and sewing, and rents out costumes for different occasions. Dolores also raises guinea pigs, rabbits, pigs and cows. She plans to use the loan money to buy cosmetics, feed for the animals, and fabric for her sewing business. Her goal is to grow her businesses.

loans.use: buy cosmetics, animal feed, and fabric

loans.name: Hilda Yolanda

texts.es:
La Señora. Hilda es una socia activa del banco comunal La Esquina, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene gente cálida, amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, esta ciudad encierra en su arquitectura su historia colonial, cuenta con varios lugares para visitar dentro y fuera de la ciudad.
  
Ella es muy joven ya que tiene 24 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 3 hijos de 7, 3 y 1 año de edad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.

La Señora. Hilda se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos ya que están muy pequeños y necesitan de sus cuidados, en casa se dedica a la cría  y venta de pollos, cuyes, ganado y borregos los que vende cuando están gorditos, también se dedica a la agricultura y las cosechas que obtiene son solo para el consumo de su hogar.
 
Se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza  en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de alimento para sus animales.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Hilda is an active member of the La Esquina Communal Bank.  She lives in the Miraflores neighborhood of the city of Cuenca.  This city has warm, friendly, kind people who keep up the culture and traditions of their villages.  Its architecture encapsulates its colonial history and it has several places worth visiting in and out of the city.

She is very young, as she is only 24 years old.  She lives with her partner and she has three children who are seven, three, and one year old.  Her husband works as a private employee.  They do not have their own home, rather they live with her in-laws, with whom they share the household expenses.
  
Hilda takes care of her children full-time, as they are very young and need her care.  At home she raises and sells chickens, guinea pigs, deer, and sheep, which she sells when they are fat.  She also farms and the harvests she reaps are used only for home consumption.

This is the fourth loan she is taking out with her communal bank and she will use it to buy feed for her animals.
 
Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy animal feed

loans.name: Dolores Concepción

texts.es:
La Señora. Dolores forma parte del banco comunal La Esquina hace 8 años, le gusta mucho el banco comunal por la unión del grupo, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene gente cálida, amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, esta ciudad encierra en su arquitectura su historia colonial, cuenta con varios lugares para visitar dentro y fuera de la ciudad.

Ella está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 11, 9, 2 años y su ultimo hijo de apenas 3 meses de edad, sus dos primeros hijos están estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que viven es de propiedad conyugal.

La Señora Dolores le dedica a su hogar por que sus hijos son pequeños y no tiene con quien dejarlos, pero para aportar económicamente en casa se dedica a la cría de pollos y cuyes los que vende en su comunidad, también siembra varios productos y sus cosechas son para el consumo de su hogar y si existe un sobrante lo vende.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es seguir creciendo poco a poco en esta actividad.
texts.en:
Dolores has been a member of the La Esquina communal bank for 8 years. She likes the communal bank a lot because of the group's unity. She lives in the Miraflores area of the city of Cuenca, a city which has a warm, pleasant and kind population and which maintains the culture and traditions of its peoples. The city's colonial history is locked into its architecture, and there are various places to visit both within the city and on the outskirts.  

Dolores is married and has 4 children aged 11, 9 and 2 years old, and her latest child is just 3 months old. Her eldest two children are studying at a small school in the city. Her husband works as a builder and the couple own a house together. 

Dolores spends her time looking after her family because her children are little and she hasn't got anybody to leave them with, but to contribute economically to the household she works raising chickens and guinea pigs which she sells in her community. She also cultivates various plants and what she harvests is used to feed the family, or is sold if there is some left over. 

She will use her loan to buy chickens and feed for her animals.  

Her goal is to continue to grow little by little in this activity.

loans.use: to buy chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos. Ella posee una tienda de productos perecederos y de primera necesidad, la cual está ubicada en su misma casa de habitación, lo cual trae muchos beneficios, ya que puede dedicarse a su negocio al mismo tiempo que se dedica a sus hijos y a los quehaceres del hogar. Su negocio es uno de los más surtidos del lugar y que cuenta con mayor cantidad de clientes, tanto por su excelente servicio como por sus precios accesibles. Guadalupe solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda obtener el dinero necesario para invertir más en su negocio, aumentando la cantidad de cada producto, y de esta manera poder atender a mayor cantidad de clientes. Ella es una mujer muy responsable quien se siente muy agradecida por el hecho de poder contar con un negocio propio el cual le permita brindarle todo lo necesario a sus hijos.
texts.en:
40-year old Guadalupe lives with her husband and three children. She runs a store out of her house selling perishables and everyday necessities. This brings her many benefits as she is able to look after the business at the same time as her children and household. 

Guadalupe’s store is one of the best-stocked in the area and has more customers both for the excellent service she provides and for her very good prices. She is seeking a loan to invest in her business. She wishes to buy a larger quantity of each product so she can serve a larger number of customers. 

She is a responsible woman who is very grateful for the fact that she owns her own business so that she can provide her children with all that they need.

loans.use: buy everyday basics for her store

loans.name: Charlene

texts.en: Charlene is 33 years old, married and has four children. She is in an agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. Charlene has been raising livestock for five years now and has borrowed ten times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She requested a 15,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy additional livestock. In the future, Charlene would like to save enough to improve her business and do some house improvements.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock.

loans.name: Blanca Edis

texts.es: Blanca Edis de 50 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos quienes colaboran económicamente a los gastos del hogar. Blanca posee un pequeño negocio en el cual comercializa bebidas gaseosas de diferentes marcas y sabores, con este negocio ella puede brindarle ayuda a su esposo con todo lo necesario para poder vivir dignamente. Blanca solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda invertir en la compra de más gaseosas, así mismo de jugos de diferentes sabores y hielo para comercializar. Ella es una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora quien lucha junto a su familia por una estabilidad económica y una vida mejor.
texts.en: Fifty-year-old Blanca Edis lives with her husband and three children, who all contribute financially to the household expenses.  Blanca has a small business selling different brands and flavors of soft drinks.  With this business, she is able to help her husband with everything they need to live respectably.  Blanca is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL that she will use to buy more soft drinks, as well as different kinds of juices and ice to sell.  She is a very responsible and hardworking woman who works alongside her family toward financial stability and a better future.

loans.use: to buy sodas, juices, and ice to sell

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is 36 years old from Naivasha. He is married with a son who is three years old. James has a retail shop that he has been running for the past six years. He has applied for his fifth loan from KADET Ltd which he will use to buy more sugar, cooking fat, flour, etc., to add to his shop for sale. He hopes to expand his business in the near future and open another shop.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking fat and flour to add to his shop

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 33 years old, comes from Nyahururu, and is married with three children who are aged between 15 years and 10 years old. 

Joyce has a green grocer business that she has been running for the past one year and has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy more vegetables, onions, and tomatoes for sale.

She hopes to expand her business in the near future and improve her living standards.

loans.use: To buy more stock of vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Quirina

texts.en:
Quirina is 55 years old, married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Quirina has a fishing business in the Philippines. Quirina requested a PHP 19,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fishing materials for her business.

Quirina has been in this business for nine years. In the future, Quirina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing materials for her business

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila works hard to support her family. She is single and has a hog fattening business in the  Philippines. She has been in this business for 24 years. 

Cirila requested a 15,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, Cirila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cell phone cases, cables, screens, and protective cases.

loans.name: Bernarda Del Transito

texts.es: Bernarda del Transito de 40 años de edad, vive junto a sus tres pequeños hijos quienes dependen por completo de ella. Bernarda es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la venta de verduras, pollo, frutas y otros más de forma ambulante en diferentes colonias, ella cuenta con varios clientes fijos quienes le compran a diario. Bernarda trabaja muy duro para poder darles todo lo necesario a sus hijos, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL y de esta forma contar con más productos como pescado, crema, queso y mayor cantidad y variedad de verduras, lo cual sería de mucho beneficio para ella ya que podrá contar con más ingresos.
texts.en:
Bernarda del Transito, age 40, lives with her three children, who are completely dependent upon her.  Bernarda is a very hard-working woman.

She sells vegetables, chicken, fruit, and others in an itinerant manner in different neighborhoods.  She has various fixed customers who buy from her daily. Bernarda works very hard in order to give her children everything they need.

The reason she is requesting a loan from Integral is to have more products like fish, cream, and cheese.  It is also to have a greater quantity and variety of vegetables.  This would be very beneficial for her because she would be able to have more income.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, and chicken to sell.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis  de 40 años de edad, es un señor muy alegre y trabajador, quien ha luchado con empeño por salir adelante junto a su esposa, el se dedica a la siembra de frijol, maíz y guineos en su propia parcela, de esta forma  se esfuerza por tener una vida estable. José solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semilla de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así para comprar matas de guineo, pesticidas y abono para brindar calidad en lo que vende, esto lo hace con el deseo de poder tener una vida estable junto a su esposa y sus hijos y de esta forma salir adelante.
texts.en:
40-year old José Luis is an energetic, hardworking man who together with his wife has always tried to make progress. He grows beans, corn, and bananas on his land and manages to have a reasonable life. 

José Luis is seeking a loan to buy corn and bean seeds as well as banana plants, pesticide, and fertilizer. His crops will be of a higher quality as a result. He wishes to be able to provide his wife and children with more stability so they can get ahead in life.

loans.use: buy corn, fertilizer etc.

loans.name: Las Lideres  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Lideres está conformado por 6 mujeres, algunas de ellas ya han sido socias de otros bancos comunales y otras socias es la primera vez que realizan los créditos en el banco comunal, todas se caracterizan por ser mujeres trabajadoras que laboran en diferentes actividades las que le permiten solventar  los gastos de sus hogares, también son muy amable y carismáticas. Viven por distintos lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que se caracteriza por que su gente mantiene viva la llama de sus tradiciones y su cultura, esta ciudad tiene una arquitectura colonial y moderna, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la belleza de la naturaleza.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Melva, vive por el Centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija  de 10 años y esta a días de dar a luz a su segundo hijo. Su esposo es chofer profesional y presta sus servicios conduciendo su propia unidad de taxi, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
La Señora Melva hace 10 años que se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, labora vendiendo a sus amigas y conocidas. Por su embarazo tuvo que dejar su trabajo anterior, ella laboraba en una boutique.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos para aumentar su stock y sus ventas.
 
Su meta es tener su propia boutique ya que le gustan mucho las ventas.
texts.en:
The Las Líderes Communal Bank is made up of six women, some of whom have been members of other communal banks, while others are taking out loans with a communal bank for the first time.  They are all known for being hardworking women who do different kinds of work to cover their household expenses.  They are also all very kind and charismatic.  They live in different areas of the city of Cuenca, which is well known because its people keep the torch of their traditions and culture burning.  This city has colonial and modern architecture and it has several places to enjoy the beauty of nature.

One of the group's members is Melva.  She lives in downtown Cuenca; she is 32 years old and married.  She has one 10-year-old daughter and she is only days away from giving birth to her second child.  Her husband is a professional taxi driver who works driving his own cab.  They do not have their own home, so they rent.

Melva started selling cosmetics ten years ago.  She works selling to her friends and acquaintances.  She had to leave her previous job working in a boutique because of her pregnancy.
 
She will use her loan to buy cosmetics to increase her stock and her sales.
 
Her goal is to have her own boutique because she likes sales a lot.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Elsy Guadalupe

texts.es: Elsy Guadalupe de 46 años de edad, es una señora muy trabajadora y responsable quien posee su propio negocio. Ella vive junto a su compañero de vida y dos hijos que se dedican a estudiar. Elsy se dedica  a la venta de ropa,  zapatos para mujeres, hombres y niños. Su venta está ubicada en la calle principal del centro del pueblo en que reside, la cual es una calle de mucho comercio debido a que se encuentran diferentes negocios y ventas ambulantes y así mismo es muy transitado por una gran cantidad de personas. Ella desea poder aumentar sus ventas y así percibir mayores ganancias, las cuales sean de mucho beneficio para su familia, es por esto que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior, zapatos y sandalias, en diferentes tallas y estilos y así poder llamar la atención de muchas más personas las cuales sean compradores potenciales, todo esto lo hace con la ilusión de mejorar sus ventas y así poder contar con el dinero necesario para  mejorar la estabilidad del hogar y también contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en: Elsy Guadalupe is 46 years old and is a very hardworking and responsible woman who has her own business. She lives with her life partner and her two children who are studying. Elsy works selling clothes and shoes for women, men and children. Her shop is located in the main street of the village she lives in, which is a street where there is a lot of trade as there are various businesses and street-sellers there, so a large number of people pass through. She would like to be able to increase her sales and thus receive greater profits, which would be of great help to her family. This is why she is requesting a loan with which she can buy larger quantities of underwear, shoes and sandals in different sizes and styles so that she can catch the attention of many more potential customers. She is doing all this in the hope of improving her sales and to earn the necessary money to improve her family's stability and so that they have all that they need.

loans.use: to buy underwear and shoes to stock her business.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela tiene 52 años, vive en compañía de su hija Jojaira, en la casa de su padre.
Hace 8 años falleció su esposo, desde entonces tomó las riendas de su hogar sola y empezó a dedicarse a la agricultura, lo que hacía su esposo. Posee sus propios terrenos, heredados por su padre, ahí siembra papa, alcachofa, maíz y alfalfa, los cuales le proporcionan buenos ingresos económicos porque los comercializa en la capital del país. Ahora se encuentra en preparativos para la siembra, cuenta que desea incursionar un poco más en la siembra de alcachofa. Así también espera volver a tener su establo con muchas vacas; “hace un año, poseía seis vacas, por inconvenientes se enfermaron y murieron, ahora volveré a criar”, comenta con mucho optimismo.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Virgen de la Candelaria” y este es su cuarto préstamo con MFP. En todo este tiempo trabajó muy duro para seguir con sus objetivos, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues en su grupo le enseñaron a ser responsable.
Adela invertirá este dinero en la compra de semilla de alfalfa y fertilizantes naturales para comenzar con la siembra de sus diversos productos.
texts.en:
Adela, age 52, lives with her daughter, Jojaira, in her father’s house.  Her husband died eight years ago.  Since that time she took the reins of her household by herself.  She started farming, which is what her husband did.

She has her own land, which she inherited from her father.  She grows potatoes, artichokes, corn, and alfalfa.  These crops give her good income because she sells them in the capital of the country.

She is now preparing to plant, and she wants to put a little more into planting artichokes.  She also hopes to have a lot of cows in her stable again.  “A year ago I had six cows.  Because of difficulties, they got sick and died.  Now I will raise them again,” she says with great optimism.

She belongs to the Virgen de la Candelaria communal bank.  This is her fourth loan with MFP.  In all of this time she worked very hard to continue on with her objectives.  She pledges to be punctual with her payments.  In her group they taught her to be responsible.

Adela will use this money to buy alfalfa seeds and natural fertilizers to start planting her diverse products.

loans.use: to buy alfalfa seeds and natural fertilizers to start planting her diverse products.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria tiene 54 años, está casada con Oscar, con quien tiene dos hijos, de los cuales, ahora sólo viven con uno de ellos. La casa donde viven es propia, la compró hace 13 años.  
Desde niña comenzó a cuidar los sembríos de sus padres, junto a sus hermanos pasaban horas en el campo. Ya tiene 30 años de experiencia en la agricultura, siembra alfalfa, alcachofa y papa. El secreto de Victoria es vender sus productos en la ciudad de Lima, donde el precio es mucho mayor. También obtiene otro ingreso del alquiler de sus pastos a ganaderos para el alimento de sus animales, los mismos pastos le ayudan a ella también, para alimentar a sus animales. Tiene vacas, cuyes y ovejas, los cuales engorda para venderlos de manera ocasional.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Virgen de la Candelaria” y este es su cuarto préstamo con MFP. En todo este tiempo trabajó muy duro para seguir con sus objetivos, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues en su asociación le enseñaron a ser responsable.
Victoria invertirá este dinero en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de alfalfa y alcachofa.
texts.en:
Victoria is 54 years old and is married to Oscar with whom she has two children, only one of whom still lives with them. They bought the house they live in 13 years ago. 

When she was a little girl she began to look after her parents' crops, and she used to spend hours with her siblings in the fields. She now has 30 years experience in agriculture and she sows alfalfa, artichokes and potatoes. Victoria's secret is to sell her products in the city of Lima, where the price is a lot higher. She also obtains another income from renting her pastures to farmers to feed their animals. The same pastures also help her to feed her own animals. She has cows, guinea pigs and sheep, which she fattens up to sell occasionally.  

She belongs to the "Virgen de la Candelaria" solidarity group and this is her fourth loan with MFP. During all this time she has worked very hard to continue with her objectives, and she promises to be punctual with her repayments as in her association she was taught to be responsible. Victoria will use this money to buy natural fertilisers to scatter over her alfalfa and artichoke crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilisers to scatter over her alfalfa and artichoke crops.

loans.name: William Oswaldo

texts.es: William Oswaldo de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo, él se dedica a la venta de hot dog en una zona muy concurrida de la localidad donde reside, es muy conocido pues su producto es delicioso al gusto del cliente, se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija pues las personas saben que todo  es elaborado con material de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre a todo con un buen servicio; William es un hombre de hogar, decidido y muy trabajador siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que se le presenten pues solo así alcanzara el éxito, como todo buen comerciante quiere aumentar las ventas pero necesita invertir mas y necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar embutido, carne de soya, pan, aderezos, verdura etc. William tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: William Oswaldo is 34 years old, and he lives with his life partner and their son. He sells hot dogs in a very busy area of the town where he lives. He’s very well known since his customers find his product delicious. He’s built up a regular customer base since people know that everything’s made with the best quality ingredients, sold at affordable price, and above all sold with good service. William is a family man, dedicated, and very hard working. He’s always ready for new opportunities which present themselves to him since only in that way will he achieve success. As a good business man, he wants to increase sales, but he needs to invest more, and he needs money for that. He’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy sausage, soy meat, bread, dressings, vegetables, etc. William has good credit references, and he is sure that he will be able to pay back the loan while having faith that he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sausage, soy meat, bread, dressings, and vegetables.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
Maruja tiene 49 años, está casada con David, tienen cuatro hijos, ahora sólo viven con uno de ellos, Juan. La casa donde viven la heredó de su padre hace 30 años. 
Ella es agricultora, siembra maíz, pasto y papa. Cuenta que la papa es uno de los principales cultivos que tiene, pues desde hace algunos años vende toda su cosecha a una empresa procesadora que le ofrece ganancias estables y el precio promedio del mercado. Es por esa razón que desea seguir sembrando papa en gran cantidad. Pero no sólo se dedica a eso, también realiza costura de ropa y cría cuyes, tiene 50 ejemplares, los cuales alimenta con la alfalfa que ella misma siembra para minimizar los gastos.

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Virgen de la Candelaria” y este es su cuarto préstamo con MFP. En todo este tiempo trabajó muy duro para seguir con sus objetivos, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Maruja invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de semilla de papa de la variedad “capiro” y fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus próximos sembríos.
texts.en:
Maruja is 49 years old.  She is married to David and they have four children.  Currently only one of them, Juan, lives with them.  She inherited the house they live in from her father 30 years ago.

She is a farmer and she grows corn, grass, and potatoes.  She tells us that potatoes are one of her main crops because for several years now she has sold her entire harvest to a processing business that offers her stable profits and the average market price.  For this reason, she wants to keep growing a large quantity of potatoes.  However, she does not only do this, rather she also sews clothing and raises guinea pigs.  She has 50 of these, which she feeds the alfalfa that she grows herself to minimize her costs.

She belongs to the Virgen de la Candelaria Communal Bank and this is her fourth loan with MFP.  During this entire time, she has worked very hard to stay focused on her goals, which is why she promises to make her payments on time.

Maruja will use the money from this loan to buy seeds of the "capiro" varietal of potatoes, as well as natural fertilizers to scatter on her next plantings.

loans.use: to buy seeds of the "capiro" varietal of potato and natural fertilizers to scatter on her next plantings

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Letecia has a piggery business; she sells grown & matured pigs. She has had this business for seven years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy animal feed for the pigs.

Letecia has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Letecia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for her pigs

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 44 years old, comes from Nyahururu, and is married with five children who are all in school, aged between seven years and 20 years old.

Joseph is a farmer and has applied for his second loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy farm inputs to use in his farm. He is optimistic that his farm will do well after the loan.

He hopes to expand his farm and improve his living standards in the future.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 38 years old and has four children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Nenita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Nenita requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Nenita has been raising pigs for 8 years now and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Nenita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 34 years old and married with two children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Mercy runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell.

Mercy has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar, canned goods, soft drinks, etc.

In the future Mercy would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is 57 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

Luz runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her general store.

Luz has been in this business for 32 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soap, sugar, eggs, etc. 

In the future Luz would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Carina

texts.en: Carina is  51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children.Carina  has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had this business for 30  years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages. Carina has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Carina hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Maxima

texts.es:
Máxima tiene 62 años, está casada con Rodrigo, tiene ocho hijos, pero ya todos mayores e independientes.
La agricultura le dio la satisfacción de obtener todos los ingresos económicos que le ayudaron a educar a sus hijos, los que se encuentra viviendo en la ciudad de Lima. Siembra maíz, alverja y cebada en sus terrenos propios y otros arrendados. Cada cosecha la comercializa en la capital del país, de donde sus hijos le apoyan para el contacto. También tiene cinco vacas, todas lecheras, de las que produce un promedio de 35 litros diarios. Cuando tienen crías, llegan a producir 70 litros. Le va muy bien en la crianza de sus animales, su secreto es sembrar ella misma la alfalfa, que es su principal alimento; “también les doy comida balanceada, les desparasitó y cuido mucho” dice.

Este es su octavo crédito con MFP y se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe. Además agradece la confianza que depositan en ella, prometiendo cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su asociación que la conforman personas solidarias y responsables.	
Máxima invertirá este dinero en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de alfalfa, además de comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Máxima is 62 years old.  She is married to Rodrigo and they have eight children, but they are all independent adults now.

Farming gave her the satisfaction of giving her the income to help educate her children, who are now living in the city of Lima.  She grows corn, peas, and barley on her own land and on rented land.  She sells each harvest in the country's capital, where her children help her out with contacts.  She also has five cows, all of them diary cows, that produce an average of 35 liters per day.  Her livestock is doing very well; her secret is that she grows the alfalfa that is their main food source herself.  She also tells us that she gives them animal feed, de-worms them, and checks on them a lot.  

This is her eighth loan with MFP and the help she receives puts her at ease.  She is also thankful for the trust they have placed in her and she promises to make her payments on time, as she would not let down this association made up of supportive, responsible people.

Máxima will use this money to buy natural fertilizers to scatter on her alfalfa plantings, as well as feed for her animals.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers to scatter on her alfalfa plantings, as well as feed for her animals

loans.name: Hiede

texts.en:
Hiede works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

Hiede requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional equipment for fishing. She has been in this business for 28 years now.

In the future, Hiede would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional equipment for fishing

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 46 years old and married with five children. With four children in school, Flordeliza works very hard to provide for them.

Flordeliza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional items for her business.

Flordeliza has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, soft drinks, canned goods, etc. 

In the future Flordeliza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items for her business

loans.name: Mirian Esther

texts.es: Mirian Esther de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos; ella se dedica a la fabricación y venta de calzado, para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene en variedad de tallas y están elaborados con material de primera calidad, tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro y eso le ayuda a mejorar las ganancias, su clientela es variada, en la semana comercia en una zona muy estratégica transitada por muchas personas, también le vende zapatos a los compañeros de trabajo de su esposo y a algunos estudiantes, todos quedan satisfechos con el producto por la calidad y por el buen precio además del servicio excelente; Mirian es una mujer de familia, emprendedora y muy entregada a su labor, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le abran paso al éxito porque sabe que así tendrá mayor felicidad, desde hace algún tiempo quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital para la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima, cuero, hebillas, cintas, suelas, etc. Mirian tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Mirian Esther is 40 years old and lives together with her life partner and three children. She works making and selling shoes for women, men, and children. She has shoes in a variety of sizes, made with top-quality materials. She has a great deal of experience in this field and that helps her to improve her profits. 

Mirian's clientele is varied; during the week, she sells in a strategic location with a lot of foot traffic. She also sells shoes to her husband's work colleagues and to students. All are satisfied with the product because of the quality and the good price, as well as the excellent service. 

Mirian is a family-oriented woman, enterprising and dedicated to her work. She is always on the lookout for opportunities that will lead to success, because she knows that she will be happier. For some time, she has wanted to increase her business, but she needs capital to make the investment. That's why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy raw materials such as leather, buckles, laces, and soles. Mirian has good credit references and impeccable morals. She is sure that she will be able pay off her debt and she hopes that she will bring economic security to her home at the same time.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as leather, buckles, laces, and soles.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván tiene 26 años, es un hombre trabajador y servicial, amable y trabajador. Su pareja es Diana, junto a ella tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad. Su casa es propia, allí vive con sus padres, su cónyuge y su pequeño hijo.

Su actividad es la agricultura, para eso tiene un terreno de nueve hectáreas de extensión, de las cuales tres, están sembradas con papaya. Desarrolla este trabajo desde hace 13 años y desde que se inició labora con cinco obreros, quienes se encargan de ejecutar todas las funciones de campo, desde la preparación del terreno para la siembra, hasta la cosecha y venta de todos los productos obtenidos. Realiza la venta de las papayas en “javas” o cajones debidamente esterilizados, ya que su principal clientela es de supermercados o mercados mayoristas de otras ciudades que exigen una alta calidad de los productos. Le gusta este oficio por los buenos ingresos económicos que obtiene. Comenta que el clima caluroso origina muchas veces que no pueda realizar bien su trabajo, ya que se agota rápido en el campo, pero sabe que con esfuerzo y dedicación sale adelante. Es por eso que espera ampliar la extensión de sus sembríos y además desea cumplir una meta personal relacionada con sus estudios técnicos en maquinaria pesada. 

Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que siguen confiando en él para acceder nuevamente a este financiamiento que le ayudará a aumentar su capital de trabajo. Sabe que nuevamente tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual, y está contento de pertenecer su banco comunal, ya que ve que son muy solidarios.

Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, ejecutará la ampliación de sus sembríos de papaya, comprará cajones para la venta y contratará el servicio de transporte de carga para trasladar los productos.
texts.en:
Twenty-six-year-old Iván is a hardworking, helpful, and kind man.  His partner is Diana and together they have a three-year-old son.  He owns his home, where he lives with his parents, his partner, and his young son.

His business is farming and he has 9 ha of land, of which three are sown with papaya.  He has been doing this work for 13 years and since he started he has been working with five laborers who take care of all the field work, from preparing the land for planting to harvesting and selling the produce.  He sells the papayas in "javas," or sterilized boxes, as his main clientele are supermarkets or wholesale markets from other cities that demand high quality produce.  He likes this work because of the good profits he earns.  He tells us that a lot of the time the hot climate keeps him from doing his work well because he gets tired quickly in the field.  However, he knows that with hard work and dedication he will get ahead.  That is why he is hoping to extend his crops and he also wants to achieve a personal goal related to his technical studies in heavy machinery.

This is his third loan with MFP and he thanks everyone who keeps believing in him by giving him access to financing again, which will help him increase his working capital.  He knows that once again he will have to be very responsible and, above all, punctual, and he is happy to belong to his communal bank, as he knows them to be very supportive.

With the requeted 2,000 nuevos soles he will extend his papaya crops, buy boxes for selling, and hire a transport service to deliver his produce.

loans.use: to extend his papaya crops, to buy boxes for selling, and to hire a transport service to deliver his produce

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 34 años, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, le agrada la sinceridad y el trato amable. Su pareja es Dalila, viven en su casa propia en compañía de su pareja y su hijo de 5 años de edad.
Su actividad es la siembra de yuca. Para desarrollar esta función cuenta con un terreno de 25 hectáreas que compró hace 11 años, tiempo que viene realizando esta labor. Tiene 5 hectáreas que actualmente están en producción de yuca, adicionalmente siembra, por temporadas, otros productos, como arroz o maíz. Para cumplir su trabajo contrata el servicio de 5 obreros en etapa de cosecha, la cantidad de personal que contrata depende de la función que se tiene que realizar en el campo. La venta de sus productos la realiza en sacos, al por mayor, en el mercado principal de la ciudad. Eventualmente alquila algunas hectáreas de su terreno a otros agricultores que requieren sembrar sus cultivos.

Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que siguen confiando en él para acceder nuevamente a este financiamiento que le ayudará a aumentar su capital de trabajo. Sabe que nuevamente tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual, está contento de pertenecer su banco comunal, ya que ve que son muy solidarios.

Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, tiene planes de invertir en la siembra de una hectárea más de yuca para ampliar su producción. Para ello contratará el personal necesario y comprará fertilizantes y algunas herramientas para reemplazar las que tiene actualmente.
texts.en:
Carlos is 34 year-old hardworking man who appreciates sincerity and good manners. He lives with his partner, Dalila, and their 5 year-old son. They own their home.

He cultivates manioc on 25 hectares of land (approx. 61.8 acres) he bought 11 years ago, which is the length of time he has been doing this work. He currently has 5 hectares (approx. 12.4 acres) producing manioc. He also cultivates other crops seasonally, such as rice and corn. In order to get the work done, he contracts the services of five workers during the harvest. The number of people he hires depends on the work he needs to get done in the fields. He sells his crops wholesale in sacks at the main market in the city. He is likely to rent some of his land to other farmers who need to plant their crops.   

This is his third loan from MFP and he is grateful to all the people who continue to have confidence in him and who enable him to obtain funding again that will help him to increase his working capital. He knows that he will have to be very responsible again and above all very punctual in his repayments. He is pleased to belong to his communal bank because he sees that the members are very supportive.

With the sum requested, S/. 1,500, he plans to invest in the cultivation of one more hectare (approx. 2.5 acres) of manioc to increase his production. For that he will contract the necessary labor force and purchase fertilizer and some tools to replace those he has now.

loans.use: to hire the necessary labor force and purchase fertilizer and some tools to replace those he has now.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Elizabeth is borrowing 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Elizabeth has been raising pigs for nine years and also earns additional income from a general store and rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 60 años, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, así como amable y cordial. Está casado con Auria. Su casa es propia, allí vive en compañía de su esposa y sus tres hijos de 20, 18 y 16 años de edad.
Su actividad es la agricultura. Tiene un terreno de 27 hectáreas, de las cuales ha destinado 15 para la siembra y lo restante para la crianza de animales. Principalmente se dedica al cultivo de yuca, mientras que el otro porcentaje de terreno esta sembrada con diferentes plantaciones como naranjas, piñas y algunas verduras. Vino desde su tierra natal hace 18 años y desde entonces ha trabajado siempre con este cultivo. Inicialmente trabajó solo, ya que no tenía el dinero suficiente para contratar a otras personas que le ayuden, sin embargo con el paso de los años su área sembrada se ha expandido y el volumen de su cosecha se ha incrementado, por lo que ahora contrata al menos 5 obreros que le ayudan en las distintas labores de campo. Comenta que le gusta la vida de campo, además conoce el ritmo del trabajo y como ejecutarlo, ya que desde muy joven cumplió esta función con ayuda de sus padres. Sin embargo, asegura que el cansancio físico es constante, a pesar de ello, le llena de satisfacción los ingresos económicos que percibe, dinero necesario para darles una mejor educación a sus hijos, por lo que espera seguir trabajando de la misma forma.

Este es su préstamo número 14 con MFP y se siente contenta con el apoyo financiero que está recibiendo, ya que eso le servirá para avanzar con su negocio. Además afirma sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues considera que todos sus miembros son personas responsables y muy comprometidas.
El monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la cosecha de yuca y de naranjas, contratando el personal necesario para cumplir esta función. También pagará el transporte de la carga de sus productos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 60 years old. He is a diligent, hardworking man, and he is also friendly and kind. He is married to Auria. He owns his house, and he lives there with his wife and their three children who are 20, 18 and 16 years old.

He is a farmer. Jorge has a 27-hectare plot. He uses 15 hectares for sowing crops while the rest is for raising animals. He mainly grows cassava, while the rest of the plot is sown with different kinds of plants like oranges, pineapples and some vegetables. He came here from his hometown 18 years ago, and since then he has always worked with these crops. At first he worked alone because he didn't have the money to hire other people to help him. However, as time passed, the area he farms has expanded and his harvest has increased in size, so he now hires at least five workers to help him with the various jobs on the farm.

He says that he likes farm life. He is also familiar with the rhythm of the work and how to do it since he began doing it with his parents' help when he was very young. However, he says that physical fatigue is constant. Despite that, the income he receives fills him with satisfaction. He needs this money to give his children a better education. For that reason he hopes to continue working as he has been doing.

This is Jorge's fourteenth loan with MFP, and he is happy with the financial support he is receiving because it will help him to grow his business. He also says that he is happy with his communal bank because he thinks all the members are very committed, responsible people.

He is asking for 1000 new soles to invest in hiring the staff he needs to harvest cassava and oranges. He will also pay to transport his products.

loans.use: to hire people to harvest cassava and oranges, and to pay transportation costs for his products.

loans.name: Tapaswini

texts.en:
Tapaswini is a 25-year-old divorced women living with her parents, three younger sisters and a son, who is 4 years old. After her divorce with her husband, she came back to her paternal house and started living with her parents and her sisters. She felt like a burden on her parents, as her father already had the responsibility of her three sisters, so she planned to help her father financially. She started a small tailoring shop with one sewing machine. She took orders from her customers for stitching their dresses. She earns 4,000 Indian rupees (INR) per month from this activity which is not sufficient for her family.

Tapaswini has a plan to purchase four new sewing machines and fabrics for her shop so that she can take more orders from her existing customers, increase her client base, and earn more. She says, “I can earn up to 10,000 INR per month after adding new machines to my shop, and I will involve my sisters in this business to help me.” 

Tapaswini has requested a loan of 30,000 INR for purchasing new sewing machines and fabrics and to appoint a workforce to help her. She wants to help her father get her sisters married and save some money for her son's future.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing four new sewing machines and fabrics for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma, a 58-year-old married mother of six, has been raising carabao in the Philippines for 10 years now. Having borrowed 25 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business, Guillerma is now requesting a PHP 15000 loan to buy an additional carabao.

In the future, Guillerma would like to save enough to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy an additional carabao.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is 46 years old and married, with five children.

Raquel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell.

Raquel has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Raquel aspires to save money to expand her business and do some house improvements.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Loyda

texts.es:
Loyda tiene 40 años, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y alegre. Está separada de su pareja, siendo padre y madre para sus cuatro hijos de 21, 18, 15 y 12 años. La casa donde vive es propia, la construyó junto a su ex pareja.

Tiene un terreno de 20 hectáreas que compró hace 13 años con ayuda de su ex cónyuge, tiene distintos sembríos de verduras y hortalizas como yuca, plátano, limón, naranjas y ají. Principalmente tiene más áreas sembradas con yuca, ya que este producto tiene mayor demanda entre la población y además tiene un mejor precio en el mercado. Su negocio, poco a poco, continúa en crecimiento, incluso tiene clientes en otras ciudades. Lleva en este negocio cerca de 10 años y trabaja con el apoyo de sus hijos y dos obreros. Le gusta la vida de campo, pues desde muy niña ha vivido en ese ambiente aprendiendo de sus padres, por lo que se siente muy cómoda.

Este es su tercer préstamo con la institución MFP y está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, ya que así se siente segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos los integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
El monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en expandir su área sembrada de yuca, para lo cual contratará el personal necesario y comprará estacas de yuca.
texts.en:
Loyda is 40 years old. She is an industrious and hard-working woman, on top of being kind and cheerful. She is separated from her spouse and acting as both father and mother to her four children, who are 21, 18, 15, and 12 years old. They own the house they live in; she built it together with her ex-husband.

She has a 20 hectare plot of land that she bought 13 years ago with the help of her ex-husband. She has different plantings of vegetables and fruits like cassava, banana, lemon, oranges, and chilis. Her principal crop is cassava, since that product is most in demand in the local population and it also has a better market price. Her business continues to grow little by little; she even has customers in other cities. She has been in this business for about ten years and she works with the help of her children and two laborers. She likes country life; she has lived in that environment since she was very little, learning from her parents, so she feels very comfortable.

This is Loyda's third loan with the MFP institution and she is very happy to know that she has financial support. That way, she feels sure of making progress in her business. In return, she promises to once again repay her loan in a punctual manner. She is also pleased to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.

She will invest amount she is requesting—1500 nuevos soles (PEN)—in expanding her cassava planting. She will hire the necessary labor and she will buy cassava cuttings.

loans.use: to invest in expanding the size of her yucca planting, for which she will hire the necessary labor and purchase cassava cuttings.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en:
Merlina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling herbal medicine business in the Philippines. She also earns more income from buying and selling charcoal.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stocks for her herbal medicine business.  Merlina has been in this business for eight years.  

Merlina has sustained her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 37 años, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, así como alegre y amable. Está casado con Lurdes, con quien tiene tres hijos de 16, 9 y 2 años.
Su actividad es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno de 15 hectáreas de las que se posesionó hace 15 años cuando llegó a esa zona desde su tierra natal. En la actualidad cuenta con cinco hectáreas sembrada de yuca, de las cuales dos se encuentran en periodo de producción y sólo una está en etapa de cosecha. Realiza la venta de sus productos en el mercado principal de su localidad y otra parte lo destina a otras ciudades. Trabaja con ayuda de cuatro personas que están junto a él desde las labores de siembra y mantenimiento de las plantas, hasta la cosecha y venta de lo productos. Tiene además una hectárea de cítricos que está ejecutando actualmente. Le gusta su trabajo de campo por la tranquilidad y el aire puro que percibe del medio ambiente, además se siente muy satisfecho con los ingresos económicos que su labor le genera y que son útiles para pagar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de sus hijos. Tiene planes de ampliar su negocio e incursionar en un nuevo proyecto de siembra de palma aceitera la cual está en auge.

Este es su préstamo número 10 con MFP y se siente contenta con el apoyo financiero que está recibiendo, ya que eso le servirá para avanzar con su negocio. Además afirma sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues considera que todos sus miembros son personas responsables y muy comprometidas.
El monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la ampliación y siembra de yuca comprando estacas saludables y abonos de calidad.
texts.en:
Luis is 37 years old. He is a hard worker and a persevering man, but also cheerful and kind. He is married to Lurdes, and together they have three children, who are ages sixteen, nine, and two.

He is a farmer and works on 37 acres of land he acquired fifteen years ago, when he arrived in the area from his homeland. He currently has 12 acres of planted cassava, five of which are in the production phase, and only 2.5 are in the harvest phase. He sells his products in the main local market, and part of them in other cities. He works with help from four other people who are with him from the planting and maintenance stages until it's time to harvest and sell the products. He also has 2.5 acres of citrus trees he is currently working on. He enjoys working in the fields because of the peace and fresh air the environment provides. He is also very satisfied with the financial income his work generates, which he uses to pay for expenses at home and for his children's education. He plans to expand his business and start a new project growing oil palms, which is a booming venture.

This is his tenth loan with MFP and he is happy with the financial support he is receiving because it will allow his business to advance. He also says he is comfortable with his communal bank, and considers all of its members to be responsible and highly committed people.

He will invest the amount requested, 2,000 nuevos soles, in expanding and planting cassava. He will purchase healthy stalks and quality fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase quality fertilizers and healthy stalks of cassava to plant.

loans.name: Nahun

texts.es:
Nahun tiene 32 años, es un hombre trabajador, empeñoso y con muchos deseos de superación. Su pareja es Segundina, fruto de esa unión tienen dos hijos de 10 y 5 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia, la que obtuvieron gracias al sacrificio que pone cada uno en su trabajo.

Su actividad es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno de 20 hectáreas de extensión, la cual compró hace 10 años, tiempo que viene dedicándose a esta actividad. En tres hectáreas tiene yuca y cuando tiene una buena producción realiza la venta a otras ciudades, pero en temporadas de baja producción realiza sus ventas en el mercado principal de su ciudad. Realiza su trabajo con el apoyo de dos personas, quienes le ayudan en las labores de siembra y cosecha. Eventualmente trabaja conduciendo su motocarro que compró hace 5 años.

Este es su préstamo número 5 con MFP, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que siguen confiando en él para acceder a este financiamiento que le ayudará a aumentar su capital de trabajo. Sabe que nuevamente tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual, y está contento de pertenecer su banco comunal, ya que ve que son muy solidarios.

Con el monto solicitado, de 1000  nuevos soles, incrementará una hectárea de yuca, para ello contratará dos obreros que realicen jornadas laborales diarias.
texts.en:
Nahun is 32 years old. He is a diligent, hardworking man who really wants to excel. He is in a relationship with Segundina, and they have two children who are 10 and 5 years old. They live together in their own house, which they have because of the sacrifices they both make in their work.

Nahun is a farmer. He has a 20-hectare plot of land which he bought ten years ago. That is how long he has been doing this work. He has three hectares of cassava, and when he has a good crop he sells it in other cities, but in low-production years he makes his sales in the main marketplace in his city. He has two people to help him with his work; they help him with sowing and harvesting. He might work driving his little three-wheel van, which he bought five years ago.

This is his sixth loan with MFP, and he is grateful to everyone who keeps believing in him so he can have this financing which will help him increase his working capital. Nahun knows that he will again have to be very responsible and, above all, punctual. He is happy to belong to his communal bank because he sees that the members are very caring.

With the 1000 new soles he is requesting, Nahun will add one hectare of cassava. To do this, he will hire two day workers.

loans.use: to add a hectare of cassava, for which he will hire two people to do day work.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 23 años, es un hombre jovial, responsable y muy trabajador. Es soltero y no tiene hijos. Vive solo en la casa que logró construir en base a mucho esfuerzo desde hace algunos años. 
Su actividad es la agricultura, se dedica específicamente al sembrío de yuca, tiene un terreno que le heredaron por sus padres. Trabaja 10 años en la siembra de este producto y lo realiza con ayuda de dos personas, quienes le apoyan en todas las funciones de campo. La producción actual que obtiene de su cultivo le genera las ganancias suficientes para sobrellevar los gastos básicos que se presentan diariamente; sin embargo, considera que no es suficiente para poder invertir en otros negocios o para aumentar la extensión de siembra. Es por eso que ha incursionado en el rubro de la construcción trabajando como albañil, desde hace 9 meses, y le está yendo muy bien, con el dinero que obtiene de este trabajo, más lo obtenido de la venta de yuca espera aumentar el área cultivada. 

Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que siguen confiando en él para acceder nuevamente a este financiamiento que le ayudará a aumentar su capital de trabajo. Sabe que nuevamente tendrá que ser muy responsable, y sobre todo muy puntual, está contento de pertenecer su banco comunal, ya que ve que son muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1200 nuevos soles, comprará plomada, paletas y espátulas que necesita para desarrollar su trabajo de albañil con mejores resultados.
texts.en:
Juan is 23 years old and a jovial, responsible and hard-working man. He is single and does not have any children. 

He lives alone in a house which he built with much hard-work a number of years ago.  He works in agriculture, specifically in growing cassava. He has land which he inherited from his parents. He has been working growing this product for 10 years and relies on the help of two people, who support him with all of the labour. 

His current production generates enough income to cover his basic daily expenses. Nevertheless, he considers it insufficient to allow him to invest in other businesses or to extend his cultivation area. For this reason, 9 months ago he started working as a bricklayer. It is going well for him. With the money he obtains from this work, in addition to that obtained from the sale of cassava, he hopes to extend his cultivation area. 

This is his first loan with MFP and for this reason he is grateful to all of the people who continue believing in him to obtain this new loan, which will help him to increase his working capital. He knows that he will have to continue be responsible, and above all punctual. He is happy to be a member of his communal bank, as they are very supportive of each other.

With the amount he is asking for of 1,200 nuevos soles, he will buy plummets, trowels and spatulas to carry out his work as a bricklayer more effectively.

loans.use: to buy plummets, trowels and spatulas to carry out his work as a bricklayer more effectively.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients in making fermented fish.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 38 years old and married, with three children, two of whom are still in school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Juliet has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

Juliet has been in this business for nine years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 40 years old and married, with five children, all of whom are in school,   Jocelyn works very hard to provide for them.

Jocelyn runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 12 years, and she sells a variety of items, such as sugar, eggs, soap, canned goods, etc.. 

In the future, Jocelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell.

loans.name: Irma Lilian

texts.es: Irma Lilian de cincuenta y tres años,  edad vive junto a su compañero de vida; ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, ya tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas,  su negocio esta ubicado en el domicilio y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y el servicio completo; Irma es una mujer de familia, dedicada a su labor, honesta y muy responsable siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, como toda buena comerciarte quiere acrecentar el negocio pero para ello necesita de suficiente capital por eso le solicitan a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc. Irma Lilian tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y tiene a la vez certeza que podrá darle a su familia una mergo calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Irma Lilian, 53, lives with her partner. She makes her living making and selling tortillas. She has been in this business for a number of years and has gained a lot of experience in sales. Her business is located in her home and she has many customers because they prefer her products due to the quality, the good prices, and complete customer service. 

Irma is a family woman, focused on her work, honest, and very responsible.  She is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will enable her to be successful. Like all good merchants, she wants to grow her business, but to do that she needs capital. That is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy corn wholesale, propane gas, etc. Irma Lilian has good repayment references. She assures that she will be able to pay the debt and is certain that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 61 años, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además de amable y alegre. Tiene dos hijos, con quienes vive en su casa propia, la que compró gracias a los ahorros obtenidos de su trabajo durante mucho tiempo. 

Su actividad es la agricultura. Tiene un terreno de 10 hectáreas de extensión, ahí siembra yuca, maíz y, en algunas temporadas, plátanos. Por la zona en la que vive considera que el suelo es propicio para la siembra de yuca, su producción es muy buena y la calidad de sus productos son acorde a las exigencias de sus clientes. Realiza la venta de todo lo que cosecha en el mercado principal de su localidad. Lleva en este negocio más de 15 años y trabaja siempre con la ayuda de dos personas a quienes contrata para realizar las principales labores de campo. Le gusta la agricultura, inicialmente se decidió por esta actividad por la necesidad de tener un oficio, ya que comenta que cuando fue joven tuvo muchas dificultades para conseguir trabajo que permitieran continuar con sus estudios. Al no encontrar alguno no completó sus estudios secundarios, en la actualidad se siente conforme con su vida en el campo, ya que le ha traído muchas satisfacciones y le permite llevar una vida tranquila y con muchos planes para el futuro.

Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, se siente contento y agradecido por el apoyo financiero que le brindan para continuar con su negocio. Además se siente a gusto con el asesor de crédito y con los miembros de su banco comunal, pues conoce a sus integrantes, que en su mayoría son sus vecinos, y los considera personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará semillas de maíz y abono para iniciar una nueva siembra. También contratará el servicio de carga para transportar su cosecha de yuca al mercado.
texts.en:
