Luis is 61 years old, a hard-working and persistent man, as well as friendly and cheerful.  He has two children, with whom he lives in his own house, which was purchased thanks to the savings from his work after a considerable about of time.

His occupation is agriculture.  He has an [area] of land 10 hectares in size.  There, he plants yucca, corn, and in some seasons, bananas. The region in which he lives is considered [to have] soil that is [very] conducive to planting yucca.  His yield is very good and the quality of his crops is in accordance with the demands of his customers.  He carries out the sale of all that he has harvested in the main market of his town.

He has been in this business for more than 15 years and always works with the help of two people to whom he contracts the main field labor.  He likes agriculture; initially he worked in this field out of the necessity to have a profession.  He says that when he was young, he had great troubles [with respect to] obtaining work that would allow him to continue with his studies.  Having found no [job that would allow this], he did not complete is education.  At the present time, he is content with his life in the field since it has brought him a great deal of satisfaction and has allowed him to live a peaceful life with a great number of plans for the future.      

This is his first loan with MFP [Microfinanzas Prisma].  He is happy and grateful for the financial support that [MFP] offers him to continue with his business.  In addition to this, he is comfortable with the credit counselor and the members of his community bank because he [personally] knows the members. The majority of [the members] are his neighbors, and he considers them to be responsible people.

With the requested amount of 1000 nuevo soles [Peruvian currency], he will purchase corn seeds and fertilizer to start a new [crop] planting.  He will also contract out the transportation of his yucca harvest to the market.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds and fertilizer to start a new crop planting.  [It will also allow him] to hire a delivery service to transport his yucca (cassava) harvest to the market.

loans.name: Orlith

texts.es:
Orlith tiene 60 años, es una mujer trabajadora y de campo, además de empeñosa y amable. Su pareja es Eglin, quien es agricultor, tienen cuatro hijos, pero ya son independientes. Ahora vive en compañía de su pareja y su nieto de 15 años.
Su actividad es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno de ocho hectáreas, de la cual se posesionó cuando llegó hace 20 años desde su tierra natal. Se dedica a la siembra de mandarinas, naranjas y principalmente al cultivo de yuca, tiene dos hectáreas de área sembrada de ese producto. Realiza la cosecha periódicamente para venderlos, al por mayor, en los mercados más cercanos. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y de dos peones para el cultivo de sus tierras. Adicionalmente tiene una bodega en su casa, desde hace algunos meses, ahí vende todo tipo de abarrotes y sus ventas también le generan buenos ingresos.

Este es su préstamo número 16 con la institución MFP. Siempre se caracterizó dentro de su grupo como una persona responsable, está feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan para poder realizar una buena inversión, y además está segura de que seguirá cancelando sus cuotas a tiempo como lo hizo hasta ahora.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá principalmente en abastecer su bodega con la compra de abarrotes (arroz, azúcar, huevos, leche, aceite, embutidos y otros). Así también, contratará el personal necesario para la cosecha de yuca de esta temporada.
texts.en: Orlith is 60 years old. She is a hard working country woman who is earnest and friendly. Her partner is Eglin, a farmer. They have four children who are all independent already. Now she lives in the company of her partner and their 15 year-old grandson. Her work is in agriculture, for which she has an eight hectare plot of land that she inherited when she was 20 years old. She dedicates herself primarily to growing yucca, as well as tangerines and oranges. She has two hectares planted with yucca. She harvests periodically to sell her produce wholesale in the nearby markets. Her husband and two workers help her maintain her land. In addition, she has had a bodega [small grocery store] in her home for several months now, where she sells all types of groceries. Her sales bring in good profits. This is her 16th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. Amongst her group, she is always characterized as a responsible person. She is happy to have this opportunity to make a good investment, and she is also confident that she will continue to make her repayments on time, as she always has up to this point. Orlith will use the amount she is requesting (2,000 nuevos soles) to invest primarily in stocking her bodega by purchasing rice, sugar, eggs, milk, oil, cold cuts, and other groceries. She will also hire the necessary hands for this season's yucca harvest.

loans.use: to stock her store with groceries (rice, sugar, eggs, milk, oil, cold cuts, and others) and to hire seasonal workers for the yucca harvest

loans.name: Antony

texts.en:
Antony is 23 years old from Nyahururu, and he is a single man.

Antony has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy a motorcycle. He has been in the transport business for two years now.

He hopes to see his business expand and to be able to own a fleet of cars in the near future.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Rubie

texts.en:
Rubie  is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married, with two children. 

Rubie has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages. 

Rubie is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Rubie hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Esther Jean

texts.en:
Esther Jean is a 20-year-old who engages in buying and selling fruits and vegetables as a source of income. She helps her husband in earning their meager living through this occupation. 

With the desire to improve their lifestyle, she is borrowing PHP 15,000 to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell, to have more income for their daily needs. She wishes to build a new business, such as a sari-sari (variety) store, as an additional source of income.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Zohor

texts.en:
Zohor is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.  The photo was taken in his office.

Zohor is a  37-year-old woman, she is married and is a mother to four sons and three daughters.  Her husband is employed, but the salary he earns is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past three years, Zohor's husband has had an office where he provides printing, translating and copying services to students and customers.  This has been a profitable project, but also not enough to cover his costs. Zohor wants to assist her husband in increasing the family's income, so she is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing a new copier machine. This will improve his work quality and increase demand from customers. This will increase the family's income and provide Zohor and her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a copier machine

loans.name: Prudencio

texts.es:
Prudencio tiene 68 años, es un hombre responsable y muy trabajador. Vive junto a su cónyuge, en su casa propia, la que logró construir en base a mucho esfuerzo desde hace algunos años.
Su actividad es la agricultura, se dedica específicamente a la producción de yuca, desde hace 6 años. Tiene un terreno de 30 hectáreas donde trabaja con la ayuda de cuatro obreros a quienes contrata dependiendo de la cantidad de terreno que tiene para cosechar o trabajar. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la siembra de verduras y otros productos de corto periodo vegetativo, pero no le daban buenas ganancias, así que decidió cambiar y ahora le va muy bien. Tiene un puesto de ventas en el mercado donde vende las yucas que cosecha. Se siente a gusto con su trabajo de campo, pues lo considera una actividad muy rentable por ahora, además es lo que siempre ha realizado y la experiencia que tiene en el campo le ha servido de mucho. Viendo el progreso que está teniendo ha optado por ampliar su negocio incrementando la extensión que actualmente tiene sembrada.

Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que confían en él para acceder a este financiamiento que le ayudará a aumentar su capital de trabajo. Sabe que tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará estacas de yuca y fertilizantes para incrementar su extensión de siembra y elevar su producción.
texts.en:
Prudencio, 68, is a responsible and hardworking man. He lives with his spouse in his own home which he was able to build with a lot of effort a number of years ago. 

His business is agriculture; specifically he has made his living in the production of cassava for 6 years.  He has a 30 acre plot of land that he works on with help from his four workers that he hires depending on the amount of land that needs to be harvested or worked on. Previously, he would plant vegetables and other products, but they did not make good profits so he decided to make a change and now he does very well. He has a location in the market where he sells the cassava that he harvests. He feels happy with his job as he sees it as a very profitable business for now and it is what he has always done and the experience in the field has helped him a lot. In seeing the progress that he has made, he has chosen to expand his business by increasing the amount he currently sows. 

This is his first loan with MFP, he is grateful for all of the people that trust in him to have his loan that will help him increase his earnings at work. He knows that he must be very responsible and above all, punctual. With the amount requested, 1,000 PEN, he will buy cassava cuttings and fertilizers to increase the size of his crop and improve production.

loans.use: to buy cassava cuttings and fertilizers increase the size of his crop and improve production.

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki, 31, is a hardworking, dedicated woman who very much wants to get ahead.  Her spouse, who works in a parastal, is the father of their two children.  They all live together in the house they worked hard to build.

She operates a tailoring store where she makes and repairs torn clothing. She started more than five years ago with her own capital.   To date, her sister helps her tend to customers. Riziki considers the business to be quite profitable because of the profits it nets and the high demand her products have. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase clothing materials. She started the business because she needed to earn income to help her spouse with household expenses and to provide a better quality of life for her children. Therefore, seeing the good results she’s been having, she wants to continue all the way to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing materials.

loans.name: Ben

texts.en:
Ben is 36 years old. He is married to Josphine, and together they have two school-going children. 

Ben sells paraffin, and he has been in the business for the past two years with a good income.

This is his fifth loan with KADET LTD.  He was introduced to KADET by a credit officer. He will use the loan amount to purchase more stocks of paraffin for his business.

He hopes to start building rental houses.

loans.use: Purchase stocks of paraffin.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolio tiene 37 años, es un hombre trabajador y con deseos de superación. Su pareja es Brin, con quien tienen dos hijos de 12 y 10 años. La casa donde viven es propia, como resultado de su arduo trabajo.
Tiene un terreno de 60 hectáreas de extensión, de las cuales en cinco siembra palma aceitera, ya que este producto tiene bastante demanda en la actualidad como un cultivo alternativo. Lleva en esta actividad cerca de 8 años y trabaja con dos personas que le ayudan a realizar todas las labores de campo y cosecha. Adicionalmente, tiene dos vacas a las que cría con fines reproductivos, para ello contrata cuatro personas que están pendientes del cuidado completo de sus animales. Finalmente, tiene instalado, desde hace 3 años, un pequeño aserradero en el que vende madera y brinda servicio de corte. Para el futuro, piensa incursionar en la siembra de otros cultivos como la caña de azúcar, también desea incrementar su ganado y para ello tiene que continuar trabajando muy duro.

Este es su préstamo número 7 con MFP y se siente agradecido con el apoyo financiero que está recibiendo, ya que esto le servirá para avanzar con su trabajo. Además, afirma sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues considera  que sus integrantes son personas amables y solidarias.
El monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la extracción de árboles maderables que tiene en su terreno y con las ganancias que perciba empezará a concretar sus otros planes.
texts.en:
Rodolio is 37 years old. He is a hard worker who strives for self-improvement. His partner is Brin, and they have two children together, who are twelve and ten years old. They live in the house they bought as a result of their hard work.

He has 148 acres of land, twelve of which he is using to grow oil palm, since there is currently quite a demand for this product as an alternative crop. He has been in this business for nearly eight years and he works with two people who help him with all the fieldwork and the harvesting. He also has two cows he keeps for breeding pursposes. For that he hires four people who are in charge of fully taking care of his animals. Finally, three years ago he set up a small sawmill where he sells timber and offers cutting services. In the future he plans to venture into planting other crops like sugar cane. He also wants to add to his cattle, and will have to keep working hard to do so.

This is his seventh loan with MFP and he is grateful for the financial support he is receiving, since it will help him get things done. He also says he is comfortable with his communal bank, because he believes its members are kind and supportive people.

He will invest the amount requested, 1,500 nuevos soles, in the removal of timber trees that grow on his land. He will use whatever profit he obtains from the timber to start specifying his other plans.

loans.use: to remove timber trees from his land.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y amable. Es viuda desde hace 4 años y vive en su casa propia junto a sus hijos de 28, 17, 14, 9 y 8 años de edad, a los que quiere mucho y por quienes se esfuerza día a día para darles lo mejor.

Su actividad es la agricultura, tiene un terreno de 5 hectáreas, el cual compró su difunto esposo hace 20 años, donde siembra naranjas, mandarinas y principalmente yuca. Actualmente tiene 2 hectáreas sembradas con este cultivo y su producción va en aumento con el paso de los años, ya que le genera buena rentabilidad debido a la demanda. Comparte esta actividad con sus hijos quienes le brindan todo su apoyo y ayuda en las labores de campo. Le gusta su vida campestre, ya que le brinda tranquilidad emocional y económica. Se inició por insistencia de su esposo, con quien compartió sueños y arduas jornadas de trabajo. Desde entonces este oficio le ha permitido darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. En la actualidad desea ampliar su producción incrementando sus hectáreas de plantaciones de yuca.

Este es su préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP y agradece a todas aquellas personas que lo hacen posible, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado, se siente a gusto con su banco comunal, pues considera que es un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la cosecha de su producto y en el servicio de transporte para trasladar a la ciudad su producto.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 42 years old. She is a hardworking and earnest woman who is also cheerful and friendly. She has been a widow for four years and lives in her own house together with her five children who are 28, 17, 14, 9, and 8 years old. She loves her children lot and strives day by day to give them them very best. 

Her trade is agriculture. She has five hectares of land which her late husband purchased 20 years ago, where she grows oranges, mandarines, and primarily yuca. Right now she is cultivating two hectares of land. Production has increased over the years and is generating good returns because of the demand. She shares her work with her children who provide their support and help with the fieldwork. Elizabeth likes the country life because it gives her emotional and economic peace of mind. She began this work at the insistence of her husband, with whom she shared dreams and long work days.  Since then, this business has allowed her to give a better quality of life to her children. At the present time, she wishes to expand production by planting more hectares of yuca.  

This is Elizabeth's fourth loan with the institution MFP and she is grateful to all of the people that have made it possible: with this loan she will feel safe to expand her business. On the other hand, she feels comfortable with her communal bank, and considers it a united and mutually supportive group. 

With the amount requested, 1000 nuevos soles, Elizabeth will invest in the harvest of her produce and a service to transport it to the city for sale.

loans.use: to invest in the harvest of her produce and transportation service to bring her produce to the city

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food supplements to sell

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 35 years old. He is married to Flora and together they have three children. For the past two years, James has operated a motorcycle transport business and his wife does tailoring to provide additional income for the family. He was introduced to KADET by a credit officer.

James is requesting his first business loan from KADET LTD to purchase material for his wife's business. In the future, he hopes to educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase material for his wife's tailoring business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase Avon products to sell

loans.name: Zakaria

texts.en:
Zakaria is 25 years old.  He is married to Anne and together they have one child.

Zakaria operates a motorcycle and a charcoal business. He has been in the business for the past one year.

This is his sixth loan from KADET LTD.  He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer.  He will use the loan amount to add more stocks of charcoal for sale.

He hopes to purchase a lorry to aid in charcoal transportation.

loans.use: to add more stocks of charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge Alberto  de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida Juana y sus hijos; él se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado para damas, caballeros, y niños , posee variedad de camisas, pantalones, vestidos, zapatos, sandalias, entre otros,  tiene varios años con el negocio  y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas, la clientela lo prefiere porque todo el producto es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles además del buen servicio; Jorge Alberto es un hombre de hogar, dedicado a su labor, siempre esta motivado a buscar alternativas que le ayuden a lograr el éxito, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y desea aprovechar este  momento para aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa y calzado por mayor. Jorge tiene buenas referencias de pago es responsable y tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez tiene confianza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto is 48 years old and lives with his life partner Juana and their children. He works selling clothing and shoes for men, women, and children. He has a variety of shirts, pants, dresses, shoes, sandals, and other items. He has been in business several years and has acquired lots of sales experience. Customers prefer him because he offers top-quality products at affordable prices, as well as good service.

Jorge Alberto is a family man and he is dedicated to his work. He is always motivated to find alternatives that will help him achieve success. In recent months demand has increased and he wants to seize this opportunity and increase his investment. That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow him to purchase wholesale clothing and shoes.

Jorge has good credit references. He is responsible and is certain that he will pay off the debt. He is also confident that he will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 58 años, es un hombre cordial, trabajador y emprendedor. Está casado con Alicia,  con quien tiene un hijo de 23 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia, la que construyó con mucho esfuerzo.

Su actividad es la agricultura. Tiene un terreno de seis hectáreas del cual se posesionó hace 16 años cuando llegó desde su tierra natal. Actualmente, tiene tres hectáreas de yuca y otra parte para la crianza de algunos animales, básicamente para subsistencia familiar. Su producción la envía a otras ciudades del país y otra parte a los mercados de su localidad. Tiene la ayuda de cuatro obreros, a quienes contrata de manera temporal cuando requiere cumplir con faenas agotadoras que el solo no podría realizar. Le gusta su trabajo porque le permite estar constantemente en el campo, es una actividad por la que tiene afinidad desde que fue un niño. Su prioridad actualmente es consolidar otro negocio que consiste en la venta de abarrotes y otros artículos de primera necesidad, ya que su casa está ubicada en un lugar céntrico del pueblo en el que vive y eso le brinda la seguridad de que siempre tendrá clientes y por lo tanto también buenas ventas.

Este es su préstamo número 11 con MFP y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que le están brindando para seguir con su negocio y avanzar con sus planes. Por otro lado, comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues considera que cada uno de sus miembros son personas buenas y cumplidas.
El monto solicitado, de 3000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos, leche y otros productos necesarios para implementar su nueva bodega. Otra parte del dinero lo invertirá en el transporte de la yuca cosechada al mercado de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Víctor is 58 years old and is a cordial, hard-working and entrepreneurial man.  He is married to Alicia, with whom he has a 23 year old son.  Together they live in their own home, which he built through great effort.

He works in agriculture.  He has a field of 6 hectares which he has owned for the past 16 years since he moved from his birthplace.  Currently, he has three hectares of yuca and another plot for raising animals, basically for family subsistence.  His products are sent to other cities in the country and also to markets in his town.  He receives help from four laborers, who he contracts on a seasonal basis when he needs to complete difficult work that he cannot do by himself.  He likes his work because it allows him to be constantly in the field, an activity that he has had an affinity for ever since he was a kid.  His current priority is to consolidate another business that consists of selling food and other basic needs products.  His house is located in a central part of town, and thus this business provides the security that he will always have customers and for that reason good sales.

This is his 11th loan through MFP and he feels grateful for the financial support that they are providing so that he can continue with his business and advance with his plans.  In addition, he comments that he feels pleased with his communal bank, since he thinks that every member is a good and reliable person.

The loan that is requested, of 3000 nuevos soles (Peruvian currency), he will invest in the purchase of foods like rice, sugar, bread, eggs, and other products necessary to stock his new store.  Another part of the money will be invested in transporting harvested yuca to the market in his city.

loans.use: to purchase foods like rice, sugar, bread, eggs, and other products necessary to stock his new store.  Another part of the money will be invested in transporting harvested yuca to the market in his city.

loans.name: Gideon

texts.en:
Gideon is 35 years old and married to Gladys. They are blessed with four children, ages two, five, six, and eight. For the past ten years, Gideon has been a farmer and he earns an income of 20,000 KES.

Gideon is requesting a loan to buy more seeds and fertilizer. He will use his profit to increase his farm produce. In the future, Gideon's hope is to have a successful life.

loans.use: to purchas seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es: Roxana Elizabeth de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos;  Ella se dedica a la venta de bolis, gelatinas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas, posee mucha clientela fija que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesible además el servicio es único siempre esta a la orden de las personas; Roxana es una mujer emprendedora, luchadora, con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre esta a la expectativa de oportunidades que la lleven al éxito, sabe que mientras mas duro trabaje, mejor será la recompensa, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar este momento para invertir pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar bolis, gelatinas, etc. Roxana Elizabeth tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Roxana Elizabeth is twenty-nine years old and lives with her life partner and their children.  She makes a living selling ball-point pens, gelatin, and other items.  She has had her business for several years and that has given her a lot of experience in sales.  She has a large and loyal clientele who prefer to buy from her because she always has what they need in terms of quality products at affordable prices.  Her service is also unique because it is always based on her customers’ orders.  

Roxana is a very enterprising and determined woman who is eager to get ahead and is always looking for opportunities that will lead her to success.  She knows that the harder she works, the greater the reward will be.  In the last few months the demand for her products has increased, and so she wants to take this opportunity to invest in her business but needs capital for that.  That is why she is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will allow her to purchase ball-point pens, gelatin, and other products.  

Roxana Elizabeth has good payment references and is certain that she will be able to pay off her loan.  She is also confident that she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase ball-point pens, gelatin, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 42-year-old married man and the father of two children. He has worked in water distribution since 1999. His business is very important in his region since most of the Lebanese suffer from the loss of water these days.

Ali also transports water to irrigate agricultural lands. 

This is Ali's 12th loan cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower. He has an excellent history of paying back his loans. His previous loans helped a lot in improving both his business and his personal living conditions.

Ali is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to change his tractor's tire to keep it working in a very good condition.

loans.use: To change his tractor's tire.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 34 años, es un hombre trabajador, empeñoso, solidario y muy amable. Su pareja es Jesenia, con quien tiene dos hijos de 15 y 3 años.
Su actividad es la compra y venta de ganado vacuno. Realiza su trabajo en su terreno propio, de 40 hectáreas, que le da la comodidad necesaria para desarrollar su labor con buenos resultados. Compró su terreno hace 12 años y actualmente tiene 22 animales entre machos, hembras y terneros. Para el cultivo del pasto que sirve de alimento para sus animales, contrata dos peones a los que paga un jornal de 20 nuevos soles diarios. De manera eventual trabaja como mototaxista en su vehículo propio que obtuvo hace 5 años. Considera ambas actividades muy rentables porque son de gran demanda entre la población de su localidad. Le gusta su trabajo de campo, ya que con eso tiene un oficio rentable y sostenible, pues no terminó sus estudios y a pesar de ello nunca se sintió derrotado. Por otro lado, tiene planes de establecer una bodega y espera concretarlo en esta oportunidad.

Este es su crédito número 16 con MFP, por tanto agradece la confianza que ponen nuevamente en él para acceder al crédito que necesita para continuar con sus objetivos. Está muy decidido a cumplir con sus pagos de manera, como lo hizo en sus créditos anteriores. Le agrada mucho formar parte del grupo al que pertenece, es uno de los socios más antiguos y conoce a todos los integrantes que participan.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la construcción de un redil y mejorará algunas áreas de crianza que necesitan reparaciones.
texts.en:
Segundo, 34, is a hard worker, diligent, supportive, and very friendly. His partner is Jesenia with whom he has two children aged 15 and 3. 

His business is buying and selling cattle. He does his work on his own land of 40 acres which gives him the comfort necessary to carry out his work with good results. He bought this land 12 years ago and he currently has 22 animals including males, females, and calves. To grow the grass that he uses as food for the animals, he hires two laborers that he pays 20 PEN a day. In addition, he works as a taxi driver in his own vehicle which he obtained 5 years ago. He considers them both very profitable because they are in great demand among the people in his city. He likes his job now that he has a profitable and sustainable business. He was not able to finish his studies, but he never felt defeated. On the other hand, he has plans to establish a small store and he hopes to achieve it with this opportunity. 

This is his 16th loan with MFP; once again he is grateful for the trust given to him in order to grant him the funding he needs to pursue his goals. He is very determined to meet payments as he did with his previous loans. He likes the group that he is a member of; he is one of the oldest members and he knows all of the participating members. 

With the amount requested, 2000 PEN, he will invest in the construction of fence and improve some areas of his cattle farm that are in need of repairs.

loans.use: to build a fence and improve some areas of his cattle farm that are in need of repairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: José Domingo

texts.es: José Domingo de 69 años de edad, vive junto a su hija de 20 años de edad, quien se dedica a estudiar en la universidad y así mismo a ayudarle a su padre con los quehaceres del hogar y el trabajo. José posee su propio negocio el cual es un telar en el que elabora tapetes, manteles sabanas, cortinas y otros productos más. El telar es una máquina para tejer elaborada de madera, la  cual es utilizada en este país desde los indígenas, siendo toda una tradición, lo que le da mayor valor a los productos ya que son pocas personas quienes lo realizan. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar hilos en diferentes colores, la cual es la materia prima de su trabajo, de esta forma el podrá elaborar mayor cantidad de productos los cuales comercializa en diferentes mercados donde se venden muy bien el arduo trabajo de José. El es un señor muy trabajador quien desea darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
Jose Domingo, 69, lives with his 20-year old daughter who studies in the university and also helps her father with household chores and his work. 

Jose has his own business in which he has a loom where he makes rugs, tablecloths, sheets, curtains, and other products. A loom is a machine made of wood used for weaving which has been used in this country since indigenous times. It is considered traditional and therefore it gives his products a greater value because few people do this type of work. 

Jose is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy thread in different colors which is the primary material he uses in his work. In this way he will be able to make a greater number of products which he sells in different markets where they sell very well. He is a hardworking man that wants the best for his daughter.

loans.use: to buy thread to improve his weaving business.

loans.name: Romy

texts.en:
Romy is 36 years old and single. To provide for his needs and save for his future family, he works as a farmer. Romy has encountered difficulty supporting his family and providing for their high expenses but works hard to pay their for their needs.

Romy is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer and pesticide to develop his business. With these inputs, he will have bigger crop yields to help meet his obligation to his family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer and pesticide

loans.name: Marleni Arely

texts.es: Marleni Arely  de 42 años de edad, es una madre responsable y laborosa quien vive únicamente junto a sus dos hijos quienes se dedican a estudiar. Ella posee una tienda en la que comercializa productos perecederos y de primera necesidad, la cual está ubicada en su casa de habitación. Marleni solicita un préstamo por medio del cual tenga la capacidad económica de surtir su negocio, esto debido a que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para hacerlo, y es muy necesario tanto para ella como para sus hijos, ya que es este el negocio que les permite solventar todos sus gastos familiares. Ella desea poder surtir su tienda con productos como detergente, comida enlatada, pan, golosinas, bebidas y otros productos más, los cuales son de primera necesidad en un hogar y que también son los que se solicitan más en una tienda. Marleni espera mejorar las ganancias y de esta forma contar con una vida más estable.
texts.en:
Marleni Arely, 42, is a responsible mother and worker who lives only with her two children who are in school. She owns a store where she sells perishable and staple products and which is located in her home. 

Marleni is requesting a loan so that she can have the financial ability to stock her store because she does not have the money to do so. It is very necessary for her and for her children because this business allows her to pay for their household expenses. She would like to be able to stock her store with detergent, canned food, bread, candy, beverages, and other staple products that are requested most from her store. Marleni expects to improve her earnings and in this way, have a more stable life.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candy, and more to sell in her store.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is 24 years old and is married with two children who are currently in school. She lives in the town of Likoni in the coastal region of Kenya. For the past five years, Mwanajuma has been working hard to manage her clothes selling-business. She sells clothing from her home.

Mwanajuma is requesting a 10,000 KES loan to buy a wider variety of clothes to sell. Her loan will help her to generate greater profits and buy a wider range of clothes to expand her business. Mwanajuma hopes that in the future she will be able to sell a higher volume of clothing.

loans.use: to buy a wider variety of clothes to sell

loans.name: Joana Elizabeth

texts.es: Joana Elizabeth de veinticuatro años de edad vive junto a su sus dos hijos en casa alquilada; ella se dedica a la compra y venta de celulares y accesorios para celulares, tiene varios años con el negocio y ha adquirido mucha  experiencia que le permite obtener siempre muy buenas ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en una zona estratégica muy transitada por las personas, ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues la prefieren por la calidad, el buen precio pero sobre todo el excelente servicio; Joana es una mujer emprendedora, responsable, que ama a su familia, quiere alcanzar sus sueños porque sabe que así lograra un futuro mas prospero, esta trabajando duro para lograrlo y no piensa rendirse, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar este momento para una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permia comprar celulares, protectores, cargadores, etc. Joana Elizabeth tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a al mismo tiempo tiene la certeza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Joana Elizabeth is twenty-four years old and lives with her two children in a house that she rents.  She makes a living purchasing and selling cell phones and cell phone accessories.  She has had this business for several years and has gained a lot of experience from it that always helps her to earn good profits.  Her business is located in a strategic area that is always bustling with people.   Joana has a large and loyal clientele that likes to buy from her because of the quality of her products, her good prices, and above all, her excellent service.  

Joana is a very responsible and enterprising woman who loves her family.  She wants to make her dreams a reality, and knows that the way to achieve a more prosperous future is to work hard and to never think about giving up.  In the last few weeks the demand for her products has increased, and so she wants to take this opportunity to invest in her business.  That is why she is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will allow her to purchase cell phones, screen protectors, chargers, and other items.  

Joana Elizabeth has good payment references and is certain that she will be able to pay off her loan on time.   She is also confident that she will provide her family with economic security.

loans.use: to purchase cell phones, screen protectors, and chargers.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is 36 years old. She is a friendly, good and responsible person. Her partner is a teacher, with whom she has two children. They live in a house they built together as a fruit of their labor. She makes a living selling khangas [African traditional cloth] door to door. Her work has brought in significant revenue, and she feels very comfortable doing it. Currently, she wants to increase her inventory but she does not have enough capital to do so.

This is her third loan with Yehu and Saumu is very happy with the financial support that will help her advance her business plans. In addition, she is committed to repaying the installments in a timely manner. With the amount requested, 20,000 Kenyan shillings, she will buy bales of khangas for sale.

loans.use: to buy bales of khangas [African traditional cloth] for sale.

loans.name: Kathryn

texts.en:
Kathryn is 33 years old and married with two children who are in school. Kathryn works very hard to provide for them. Kathryn runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, sugar, spices, soap, shampoo, etc. 

Kathryn requested a 25,000 Philippine peso (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell. In the future, Kathryn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell

loans.name: Socheat

texts.en:
Socheat is 42 years old. She is married and resides with a son in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling groceries for more than four years, earning about $5 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $2 daily. Her son is employed in garment factory. He earns about $3 each day. 

To improve her family’s finances, Socheat is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase more groceries to sell. By doing so, she would earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Mwanarusi

texts.en:
Mwanarusi lives in the coastal region of beautiful Kenya. She is 22 years old, married, and has one child. 

Mwanarusi lives with her husband who works as a businessman in the city.  She has always been desiring to help her spouse with the household expenses so as to feel recognized as a responsible mother.

Mwanarusi has been working in the market for two years. She sells vegetables and fruits. She is taking a loan to buy tomatoes, potatoes, onions, and vegetables. She wants to expand her inventory.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes, onions and vegetables.

loans.name: Ana Marleny

texts.es: Ana Marleny, se destaca por ser muy emprendedora y responsable, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores de seis años. Ana posee una venta de cosméticos, cremas para el cabello y cuerpo, perfumes, lociones y shampoo. Su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación, y así mismo sale a venderlas en diferentes municipios. Ella solicita un préstamo con el deseo de contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería, aumentando la cantidad de maquillajes y de esta forma ofrecer diferentes precios, así mismo comprar cremas para el cuerpo, lo cual es lo que posee mayor cantidad de demanda. Esto llena de mucha ilusión ya que espera mejorar sus ganancias, y de esta forma seguir brindándoles mejores oportunidades a sus hijos.
texts.en: Ana Marleny stands out for being very enterprising and responsible. She lives with her husband and two children, who are younger than 6 years old. Ana has a shop where she sells cosmetics, hair cream, body creme, perfumes, lotions and shampoo. Her business is located in her house, and she also goes out to sell the cosmetics in different towns. She is requesting a loan with the desire of having the necessary money in order to buy a bigger quantity of merchandise, increasing the quantity of make-up, and in this way offering different prices. She also wants to buy body lotions, which have bigger demand. This is filled with much hope, and she hopes to improve her earnings, and in this way continue providing better opportunities for her children.

loans.use: to buy makeup and body lotion to sell

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Lily is 58 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them. Lily runs a buy-and-sell dry goods store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 40 years. 

Lily requested an 18,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell in her business. In the future, Lily would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell in her business

loans.name: Caxton

texts.en: Caxton is 31 years old and married with two children who are in school. He is a farmer and has been farming for the past five years. He has applied for his fourth loan from KADET Ltd and intends to use the entire loan to buy four dairy cows to rear for milk production. He is optimistic that his farm will do well in the near future and hopes to build his family a house; thereby, improving their living standards.

loans.use: to buy four dairy cows.

loans.name: Douglas Eliseo

texts.es: Douglas Eliseo de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su familia en casa propia, el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, pan, leche, huevos, jabones, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy conocida en la zona y ya tiene clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios, y el excelente servicio; Douglas es un hombre dedicado a su labor, motivado, con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que lo conduzcan al éxito, no piensa rendirse pues sabe q eso significaría apagar sus sueños,  como todo comerciante una de sus mas grandes metas es acrecentar el negocio pero no posee del suficiente capital para lograrlo por eso le solicita a INETEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Douglas Eliseo tiene buenas referencias de pago es responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Douglas Eliseo is 46 years old and lives with his family in their own house. He has a store where he sells staple goods like beans, bread, milk, eggs, soap, and other items. He has had this business for several years and it has given him a lot of sales experience that allows him to make better profits. He is very well known in the area and has customers who prefer him for his quality, good prices, and excellent service. Douglas is a man who is dedicated to his work and very motivated, with a great desire to always get ahead. He is always on the look out for new opportunities that could lead to success. He never thinks about giving up because he knows that to do so would mean snuffing out his dreams.

Like any merchant, one of Douglas' greatest goals is to expand his business, but he does not have sufficient capital to do so. In order to achieve his goal, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy basic grains, candies, bread, instant products, drinks, soap, etc. Douglas Eliseo has good credit references, is responsible, and assures that he will be able to pay off his debt. At the same time, he has faith that he will be able to bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candies, bread, instant products, drinks, soap, and other goods for his store

loans.name: Kenis Beatriz

texts.es: Kenis Beatriz de 31 años de edad, es una madre de familia muy responsable quien se dedica de lleno a su familia. Ella vive junto a su esposo y su único hijo quien estudia. Kenis posee una pequeña tienda la cual ha sido de mucho beneficio para su estabilidad económica, con el deseo de mejorar ella también ha iniciado el negocio de la pupusería elaborándolas de lunes a domingo, aprovechando sobretodo el fin de semana que los clientes se incrementas. Kenis solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en la venta de pupusas comprando mayor cantidad de maíz, chicharrón, queso, frijoles, verduras y toda la materia prima para elaborar mayor cantidad de pupusas y de esta forma mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Kenis Beatriz is 31 years old. She is the very responsible mother of a family who fully dedicates herself to her family. She lives with her husband and their only son, who is in school. Kenis has a little store which has been of great benefit to their economic stability. With the desire to improve, she has also begun a pupusa business (pupusas are filled corn tortillas, a typical Salvadoran dish). She makes pupusas from Monday to Sunday, especially taking advantage of the weekend, when the clientele increases. Kenis is applying for a loan through which she can invest in her pupusa business by buying larger quantities of corn, pork, cheese, beans, vegetables, and all the basic ingredients to prepare a larger quantity of pupusas and in this way improve her income.

loans.use: to buy corn, pork, and cheese to make pupusas

loans.name: Willian Antonio

texts.es: Willian Antonio de 48 años de edad, trabaja arduamente por salir adelante junto a su familia la cual está conformada por sus padres que son mayores de edad, su padre es pensionado y su madre se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Willian posee una carpintería en la cual elabora sillones, roperos, mesas, puertas y todo lo que se pueda realizar con madera. El es una persona muy responsable, razón por la que posee muchos clientes fijos que le hacen varios pedidos. Con el deseo de aumentar sus clientes, William solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del que cuente con el dinero necesario para comprar diferentes tipos de madera para dar variedad de precios en su negocio, así mismo para comprar pegamento y otros instrumentos básicos para realizar este oficio.
texts.en: Willian Antonio is 48 years old and works hard to help his family, which consists of his elderly parents. His father is a pensioner and his mother dedicates herself to household chores. Willian has a carpentry shop where he makes chairs, wardrobes, tables, doors and anything else made of wood. He is a very responsible person, which helps him have many regular customers who make multiple orders. With a desire to increase his clientele, Willian is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral so that he will have the money he needs to buy different types of wood, in order to have a greater variety of prices for his business. He will also use the loan to buy glue and other basic tools for his work.

loans.use: to buy wood to increase his work materials

loans.name: Nuria Del Carmen

texts.es: Nuria del Carmen de 47 años de edad, vive junto a su extensa familia que está conformada por seis hijos y su esposo quien también trabaja.   Nuria posee un puesto de frutas y verduras en el mercado central de su lugar de vivienda, en el cual vende su producto por unidad y al mayoreo, ella cuenta con muchos clientes sobre todo  las personas que poseen comedores en el mismo mercado las cuales compran ahí porque Nuria vende las verduras a muy buenos precios. Es por esto que Nuria solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de frutas y verduras, ya que ella quiere comprar al por mayor para poder comprar a precios menores y vender aún más barato. Esto es de mucha importancia para ella ya que le permite percibir mayores ganancias lo cual beneficia a su familia.
texts.en: Nuria del Carmen is 47 years old and lives with her vast family, which is made up of her six children and her husband who also works. Nuria has a fruit and vegetable stand in the central market, in which she sells products by the unit and wholesale. She has many customers, many of which are people who have restaurants in the same market. They buy there because Nuria sells the vegetables at very good prices. It is for this reason that Nuria requests a loan, with which she will be able to buy a bigger quantity of fruits and vegetables, since she wants to buy more in order to buy at lower prices and sell at even cheaper prices. This is of much importance for her since it allows her to receive better profits which benefit her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in order to improve her business

loans.name: Mon

texts.en: Mon is 45 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than ten years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Her children are employed at a garment factory. They earn about $6 daily. In order to improve her family’s living condition, Mon is requesting a loan of $1,400 to purchase more groceries to sell. This purchase will help her generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her store and rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Oscar Alexander

texts.es:
Oscar Alexander tiene 19 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene 1 hijo de 1 año de edad, vive con la esposa y con el hijo en la Ciudad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC 30 DE JULIO, se encuentra ubicada en Recinto Zapotal nuevo, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

Oscar Alexander  se dedica  a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, fréjol y maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes urea, abonos, líquido mata monte.

Las compras y las ventas de los productos las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas cada 20 días. Con La ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos.

Enfrenta desafíos cómo las plagas, lancha en los cultivos. El sueño es tener éxito en la vida y más ingresos. En el tiempo libre le gusta trabajar mucho más.
texts.en:
Oscar Alexander is 19 years old. He is in a common-law marriage and has a one-year-old son. He lives with his wife and his son in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Rios.

He is a member of the 30th of July communal bank, which is located in the Zapotal Nuevo district in the Ventanas canton and specializes in agricultural work.

Oscar Alexander works in agriculture, planting rice, beans, and corn. He is applying for the loan to buy supplies such as fertilizers, urea, compost, and liquid Matamonte herbicide.

He makes his purchases and sells his products in the city of Ventanas every 20 days. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy his supplies.

He faces challenges such as pests and fungus in his fields. His dream is to have success in life and more income. In his free time he likes to work a lot more.

loans.use: to buy supplies: fertilizers, urea, compost, and Matamonte liquid herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Uy

texts.en:
Uy is 64 years old and a married woman who has been residing in Baray district with her spouse and some of her children. She operates a small grocery store from her home to supplement her income. She enjoys selling and communicating with her customers but unfortunately, she cannot make consistent income which is what she wishes. Uy would like to increase her merchandise in order to satisfy her customers. And she hopes that it’s a way to make her profit become sustainable. 

Due to the shortage of funds, Uy decided to take out a loan through HKL, one of Kiva's partners, to purchase merchandise in bulk to sell in her store such as snack foods, home use products, personal care products, spices, beverages and other miscellaneous things. Through the loan, she will maintain the number of her customers and keep growing her retail shop.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in bulk to sell in her store such as, snack foods, home use products, personal care products, spices, beverages and other miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Augusto German

texts.es:
Augusto es un joven de 21 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con su pareja y su pequeña hija de 1 año, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasmo, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Mecánica Electrónica, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver futbol en televisión y en alguna de estas ocasiones come un riquísimo Escabeche de Pollo, el cual es su plato favorito.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Augusto trabaja como Obrero en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores de campo, el puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Augusto se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brinda podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, como tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de piso;  de esta manera Augusto tendrá su vivienda en mejores condiciones, así el espera poder brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar a su familia, él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de culminar su vivienda y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Augusto is 21 years old, lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago with his partner and his small 1-year-old daughter. He is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who together with his partner dedicates all of his efforts to moving his family forward. Unfortunately, due to the necessity of working to pay his expenses, he was not able to study for a career in electronics mechanics, but he would have liked very much to have been able to do that. In his free moments, he likes to watch soccer on television and on some of these occasions, he eats a delicious pickled chicken, which is his favorite dish.

With much determination and enthusiasm, Augusto works as a farm worker. Every day at early hours in the morning, he starts his work in the field. He can work approximately 10 hours a day and believes that it is going well for him due to his good performance and the friendly way he treats everyone else. 

Augusto is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help he will be able to improve his house, including the plastering, painting, and floor installation. In this way, Augusto will have his house in better conditions. He hopes to be able to provide better security and well-being for his family. He will continue working and making the effort to achieve his big dream of finishing his house and moving his family forward.

loans.use: to improve his house, including plastering, painting, and floor installation

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is grateful for the support she received from the previous loan that enabled her to improve her food stall. In order to have various sources of income, she started a clothing selling business. She is selling affordable clothes for all genders on one of the local markets. Her extensive experience helps her navigate through assortment, prices and demand for clothing inventory. Currently, Mwanakombo doesn't own her point of sales machine and is forced to rent one, on which she has to spend most of her income.

Mwanakombo is asking for another loan of 10,000 KES in order to purchase bales of clothes for sale.
With time and investments, Mwanakombo hopes to purchase her own point of sales machine and open a boutique.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Bihija

texts.en:
Bihija has been working in the commercial sector for over five years and sells new clothing door to door.

She is requesting a new loan of 10,000 KES to stock up on bales of clothing for resale. She has already repaid two previous loans from Yehu. Her goal is to increase her working capital through this financing and to develop her business further. Thus, she will be able to do better in covering family expenses and improving her family's living conditions.

In the future, she would like to have a large store for selling ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en: Due to their hardship of living, Norma supported her husband in managing their rice farming business for it is the main source of their income. She is 52 years old, married and has five grown-up children. They strove to raise their living conditions to give their children a better life. They have been farmers for almost 28 years and usually earn a profits of P20,000.00 in every harvest season. They planned to expand their rice plantation to ensure a high yield. Due to financial burden, Norma is asking for additional capital of P39,000.00 to buy fertilizers, pesticides and for expenses incurred in transplanting rice seedlings. They believe that this financial assistance will enable them to improve their farming business and hope that they will be having a fruitful harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides, and for expenses incurred in transplanting rice seedlings

loans.name: Rio Blanco Group

texts.es:
El grupo Rio Blanco lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es María de los Ángeles  quien se dedica al comercio de cosméticos desde hace 4 años la cual inicio con la compra de unos cuantos productos ahora está más surtido.
Las otras integrantes son Darling del Socorro quien tiene una tortillería y Luisa quien vende ropa desde hace 2 años.
texts.en:
The Rio Blanco group is composed of three hardworking and entrepreneurial women. One of them, Maria de los Angeles, has been working in cosmetic sales for the past 4 years, since she started with the purchase of a few products and now has a very well-stocked business. 

The other members of the group are Darling del Socorro who has a tortilla shop, and Luisa who has been selling clothes for 2 years.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Celia Pilar

texts.es:
La socia Celia Pilar tiene 49 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene un hijo. La socia Celia Pilar  es contadora y tiene una oficina donde trabaja independiente, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m.  La socia Celia PiIar solicita el préstamo para implementar su estudio contable desea comprar materiales de trabajo como útiles de escritorio. La socia Celia Pilar está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota. 

La socia Celia Pilar  sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y las reuniones del banco son cada treinmta días en el distrito de Cusco de la perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco del departamento de Cusco.
texts.en:
Celia Pilar is 49 years old and is married with one son. She is an accountant and she has an office where she works independently from 8:00am to 7:00pm. She is asking for this loan to implement her accounting firm by purchasing office supplies. Celia Pilar is happy for this loan and promises to comply with all loan repayments. 

Celia belongs to the communal banking group "Santo Domingo," which meets every 30 days in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

loans.use: to implement her accounting firm by purchasing office materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her transport motorcycle.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah's fruit selling business is improving and she is happy. She is now applying for her second loan from KADET LTD as a concurrent loan to add more stock of fresh fruits especially avocados and bananas.

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children and expand her business. Her hopes and dreams are to support and improve the living standards of the family.

loans.use: to add more stock of fresh fruits especially avocados and bananas.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a businessman who runs a grocery. He has been in the business for five years. He also own a carpentry workshop for more income generation.  With the income from his business, he is able to provide for his wife and one-year-old child.
Peter hopes to open a wholesale enterprise in the future. He has requested a loan of 20,000 KES to buy tomatoes, potatoes and onions.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes, and onions

loans.name: Granito De Mostaza Group

texts.es:
El grupo Granito de Mostaza lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Nohemi quien se dedica al comercio de productos AVON y ropa desde hace 7 años y su meta es llegar a tener una tienda.
Ella con el crédito anterior con las ganancias logro construir un cuarto y enverjo su casa.
Las otras integrantes son Martha quien vende ropa y zapatos, y Nidia quien vende verduras y frutas desde hace 21 años.
texts.en:
The group "Granito de Mostaza" (Mustard Seed) is composed of three very hardworking and entrepreneurial women. One of them, Nohemi, works selling clothing and Avon products, and has done so for the past 7 years. Her goal is to have her own store one day. 

With her previous loan, she was able to improve her income and use it to construct a new room in her house and make other home improvements. 

The other members of the group are Martha who sells clothing and shoes, and Nidia who has been selling fruits and vegetables for the past 21 years.

loans.use: to buy Avon products

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is married to Samson and together they have two children. She has been selling timber for the past seven years and earns good income.

She has applied for her first business loan from KADET LTD and she will use the loan amount to purchase more stock of timber for resale in her business.

She hopes to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more timber for sale.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en: Mwanaisha is 38 years old, married and has three school-aged children. She earns a living selling soft drinks like juice and ice cream while her husband works as a clerk in a private company. They aim to increase their income to cover their necessities and to continue sending their children to school so that they will earn a degree and become professionals someday. To increase their income, Mwanaisha plans to improve her business by increasing her product offerings to satisfy her customers' demand. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of KES 10,000 to buy a variety of fruits for flavors to make juice like mango, pineapple, and orange juices. Through patience and hard work, she believes that she will improve the business in the future.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruits

loans.name: Pastora01 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Pastora lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedora una de ellas es María de 54 años de edad quien tiene una tortillería, cuajada, elotes, café…etc. Ella con el crédito anterior adquirió una refrigeradora y con este desea ampliar el negocio.
Las otras integrantes son Elieska quien vende zapatos y bisutería y Zenia del Carmen quien tiene una tortillería desde hace 14 años.
texts.en:
The group "Pastora" is composed of three very hardworking and entrepreneurial women. One of them, Maria, is 54 years old and has a tortilla shop. With this loan she will buy ingredients such as corn for the production of her food. With her previous loan she was able to purchase a refrigerator and increase her business.  

The other members of the group are Elieska who sells shoes and jewelry, and Zenia del Carmen who has had a tortilla shop for the past 14 years.

loans.use: to buy corn and other food products

loans.name: Gamaliel

texts.es: Gamaliel, tiene la edad  de 59 años, está en unión libre, vive con su hijo y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de alguna semilla de pasto para mejorar al existente, además comprar terneros. Además de poder comprar una semilla de buena calidad y que se adapte bien al clima y suelo de la zona y pretende obtener la semilla lo más pronto posible y realizar la siembra para aprovechar lo más posible del invierno. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de ganado.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gamaliel, 59 years old, lives with his wife and their son who are his main priority. With this loan he would like to purchase some grass seed to improve the grass he currently has, as well as to buy some cattle. He would like to buy high quality seeds that adapt well to the climate and soil in the area where he lives, and he would like to do so as soon as possible in order to plant and take as much advantage of the winter season as possible. With the improvements in his cultivation, he expects to obtain greater income and thereby improve the living conditions for his family as well as invest a bit more in the area of livestock raising. This is the first loan that he will receive from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him this loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy grass seed and cattle

loans.name: Nehemias Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nehemías está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Mayra quien tiene un cafetín desde hace 12 años. Este negocio lo inicio con la venta de frutas y poco a poco fue aumentándolo.
Ella con el crédito anterior logro comprar una camioneta.
Los otros integrantes son Rosa quien se dedica a la compra de calzado desde hace 18 años y Jenia vende calzado desde hace 10 años.
texts.en: The Nehemías Group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people. One of them is Mayra who has had a cafe for 12 years. She started this business selling fruits and slowly expanded. With her previous loan she was able to buy a small van. The other members are Rosa who has been reselling shoes for 18 years and Jenia who has been reselling shoes for 10 years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise especially soft drink.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
Omar es un hombre muy trabajador y decidido. Su pareja es Cristina, quien también se dedica a la agricultura, y tienen un hijo de 14 años.
Su actividad es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno de siete hectáreas de extensión que compró hace 3 años. Tiene cuatro hectáreas de papaya y una de yuca, trabaja con la ayudad de dos obreros, quienes se encargan de la labores de mantenimiento y cosecha. Le gusta su actividad, ya que le genera un ingreso económico para mantener y solventar sus gastos del hogar. Comenta que escogió este trabajo por la necesidad de tener un oficio que le genere los recursos necesarios para vivir, ya que no tiene ninguna formación académica. En la actualidad tiene planes de seguir con su labor y ampliar la extensión de su área de siembra y plantar otro tipo de cultivo de mayor producción que le ayuden a incrementar sus ingresos. 

Este es su préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP y se siente agradecido de contar con una línea de crédito para avanzar con su actividad. Por tanto, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas para tener un buen record crediticio. Además, comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues considera que sus integrantes son personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles, comprará semilla de papaya, estacas de yuca, fertilizantes y contratará personal que le ayuden a realizar todas las labores que requiere para establecer una nueva campaña de siembra.
texts.en:
Omar is a very hard-working and decisive man. His partner is Cristina, who also works in agriculture, and they have a 14-year-old son.

His work is farming, and for this he has a a seven-hectare piece of land that he bought three years ago. He has four hectares of papaya and one of yuca. He works with the help of two laborers, who handle the maintenance and harvest work. He likes his work, as it generates income for supporting and paying for his household expenses,

He says that he chose this work because of the need to have an occupation that will generate the resources necessary to live, as he does not have any schooling.  Currently he has plans to continue with the work; to expand the size of the area cultivated, and to plant another type of crop with greater output that will help him increase his income. 

This is his fifth loan with the MFP institution, and he feels grateful to have a line of credit for moving forward with his work. 

Therefore he promises to make his instalment payments, in order to have a good credit record. In addition, he says that he feels at ease with his communal bank, as he considers the members to be responsible people.

With the amount of 3000 nuevos soles applied for, he will buy papaya seeds, yuca stakes and fertilizers, and hire laborers to help him carry out all the work needed to undertake a new planting.

loans.use: To buy papaya seeds, yuca stakes, fertilizers, and hire labor.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia Gloria es natural de la ciudad de Arequipa pero vive en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 39 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 5 hijos. 

La socia Gloria sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal "Santo Domingo" y sigue con el negocio de venta de comidas, ella sigue vendiendo comida en una de las ferias gastronómicas de la ciudad del Cusco, ella también tiene un pequeño restaurante y trabaja en el restaurante desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m. Ya son 28 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño de su trabajo. 
 
La socia Gloria solicita el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo carne, arroz, aceite, huevos,  fideos, verduras y otras más. La socia Gloria está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member, Gloria, comes from the city of Arequipa but lives in the city of Cusco. She is 39 years old and has a common-law relationship from which she has 5 children.

Gloria still belongs to the community bank "Santo Domingo", and continues with her business selling food. She continues to sell food in one of the food fairs in the city of Cusco, and also has a small restaurant. She works in the restaurant from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm. Gloria has worked in this business for 28 years and is doing very well thanks to her good work.
 
Gloria is requesting a loan to buy more supplies such as meat, rice, oil, eggs, noodles, vegetables and other products. She is grateful for the loan and agrees to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy more supplies such as meat, rice, oil, eggs, noodles, vegetables and other products.

loans.name: Juán Luis

texts.es: Juán Luis, tiene la edad  de 55 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizante, herbicidas y productos para fumigar  y además pagar mano de obra para los trabajos a realizar, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Además de poder comprar los mejores materiales y hacer los trabajos lo más pronto posible y aplicar los fertilizantes  a tiempo para que la cosecha sea de buena calidad y abundante y hacer esto antes de que se madure la misma. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco en el área de ganado.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Juán Luis is 55 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children, who are his top priority. He plans to use this loan to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and fumigation products, as well as to pay laborers for the work he needs done. This way, he can be sure to do a good job of it. Furthermore, this loan will mean he can buy better materials, complete the work as soon as possible, apply the fertilizers in time for his harvest to be abundant and high-quality, and can do so before his crops mature. With these improvements to his crops, he hopes to obtain a little more income and thereby improve his family's living conditions. He would also like to invest a little in the area of livestock. This is the first loan Juán has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with more ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and fumigation products, as well as to pay laborers for his coffee crops

loans.name: Justa

texts.es:
La socia Justa pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,la socia continua con su negocio de elaboracion de artesania ,la socia elabora tejidos como chompas,chalinas,chuyos entre otros,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio ,la socia realiza sus trabajos para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de materiales para su negocio como lana de alpaca.
La socia se siente feliz por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member, Justa, belongs to the Vallecito community bank. She continues with her craft business, making fabrics such as sweaters, scarves, and chuyos among other items. She has spent many years in this business, which is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into it. Justa carries out her work and then distributes her items to the customers who have ordered them. She is responsible and earnest, and thus manages to support her family.

Justa is requesting a loan to purchase materials for her business such as alpaca wool. She is grateful for the loan and undertakes to comply with the repayments.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her business such as alpaca wool.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia Julia pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO ,la socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de granos secos como trigo,maiz,kinua entre otros,la socia compra su mercaderia en el distrito de Ocongate para luego venderlo a sus clientes que tiene en Cusco y Sicuani,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de granos al por mayor.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member, Julia, belongs to the Vallecito community bank. She is continuing her business of buying and selling dried grains such as wheat, corn, and quinoa among other products. She buys her goods in the district Ocongate and then sells them to their clients in Cusco and Sichuan. Julia has many years experience in this business, and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She is responsible and earnest, and is thus able to support her family.

Julia is requesting this loan to buy grain in bulk. She is grateful for the loan granted to her and undertakes to comply with the repayments.

loans.use: to purchase grains in bulk

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,la socia continua con su negocio de movilidad escolar ,la socia cuenta con un carro el cual transporta a los niños de su casa al colegio,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio cada dia,la socia a la vez continua con su otro negocio de reposteria ella elabora pasteles,tortas,bocaditos para los distintos compromisos que le solicitan,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
