La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos como harina,leche,mantequilla entre otros para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Vallecito" ("Little Valley") communal bank. She continues her school transportation business. She has a car that she uses to transport children from their houses to school. She has run this business for some time and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts into it each day. Guadalupe is also continuing her other business, a confectionery. She makes pastries, cakes, and snacks for the various orders she receives. She is a responsible and dedicated person and this is how she carries her family ahead.

This borrower is requesting a loan to buy flour, milk, butter, and other ingredients for her business. She feels grateful to be granted this loan and promises to comply with the established repayments.

loans.use: to buy flour, milk, butter, and other ingredients for her business

loans.name: Emiliano

texts.es:
Emiliano, es soltero y no tiene hijos vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación pequeña con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió solo hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente trabaja por más de diez horas como chofer en el área urbana ya que con lo poco que gana debe cubrir sus gastos  de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos.
El  crédito lo requiere para pagar  el costo de  conversión de gasolina a gas liquado  a su vehiculo ya que le ayudara en ahorrar el combustible  pues el costo del gas es mucho menor que el de la gasolina y de esta forma mejorarán sus ingresos, ya que es su única fuente de trabajo.
El sueño de Emiliano, es mejorar sus ingresos y poder independizarse para tener más comodidad y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Emiliano is single, and does not have children. He lives in his parents' home, occupying only one small room with brick walls and earth floor. The house is located in the Achachicala area of the city of La Paz.

He studied only as far as high school completion, and currently works more than ten hours a day as a driver in an urban area. With the small amount he earns, he must cover food expenses and payment for basic services.

He needs the loan to pay for the cost of converting his vehicle from gasoline to natural gas. This will help him to save on fuel, as the cost of natural gas is much less than that of gasoline. This way he will improve his income, as it is his only source of work.

Emiliano's dream is to improve his income, to be able to live on his own, to live more comfortably, and to improve his quality of life.

This is the first time he has applied for a loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: To pay the cost of converting his vehicle from gasoline to natural gas, so that he can save on fuel costs.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is 46 years old. She is married to John, who is a farmer. They are blessed with four children. She has been a farmer for the last four years with the monthly income of 8,000 Kenyan shillings (KES).  

She was introduced to KADET LTD., and she is applying for her first loan of KES 20,000. Julia will use the loan to buy farm inputs to improve her harvest. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will add more stock to her business. 

Her hopes and dreams are to be able to educate her children to the highest level of education and improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs to improve her harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing and tailoring machines for the workshop.

loans.name: Roderick

texts.en:
Roderick is 28 years old and still single. His ambition in life is to become successful and financially stable before he is going to settle down. To achieve his goals, he engages himself in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. He has been in this business for more than two years and usually earns profits of only 12,000 Philippines pesos (P), which he usually spends on his food and clothing and saves some for his future. 

He planned to raise more pigs to sell in the future, but due to inadequate capital, he is asking for P50,000 to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccines and additional piglets to raise. He believes that, someday, he will improve the business and make his dream come true.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccines and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
EL socio pertence al banco comunal VALLECITO,la socia continua con su negocio de carpinteria,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio ,el socio elabora muebles,armarios,camas entre otros modelos ,el socio tambien tabaja a pedido ,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para la compra de madera al por mayor.
EL socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Manuel belongs to the Vallecito community bank and works as a carpenter. He has a number of years in the business, which is going very well thanks to the hard work he puts into it. He makes furniture, cabinets, beds and other items. He also works on special orders. Manuel is a responsible and hardworking person because in this way he can make headway for his family. He is requesting the loan to buy wood at wholesale. He feels thankful for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase wood at wholesale.

loans.name: Abdushukur

texts.en:
Abdushukur is a 38-year-old man. He is married and the father of three children. All of the children are already in school.

He has been busy with growing maize, tomatoes and apricots, and he has sold his harvest at a local market for 15 years. Thanks to his good experience in this field and his influence over his suppliers, he is able to obtain goods to sell, but it brings in little income. It does not allow him to provide for the needs of his family and build a new house. His family is large and needs a bigger house. 

This year, he began to build a new house with modern planning. This loan will help him to buy building materials to continue building the new house. In this way, he will provide a higher quality of living conditions for his family and put an end to the problems with housing.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement and wood for building a house.

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
Keo is 56 years old and married with five children – three married children and two single children. Keo is very industrious in the farming business so that she can satisfy her family’s daily necessities. Keo feels regret that she cannot provide a good education to all her children due to the financial difficulties incurred in the family. However, Keo’s children are very appreciative of their parents because of their hard work and sacrifices. They also help Keo in managing the farming business so as to reduce some expenses in labor costs.

As there is much work to handle at this time, Keo really needs to hire laborers to help her at the rice field and potato plantation. For this reason, Keo would like to acquire a loan from HKL and Kiva to pay for labor costs. She hopes that it will provide good results and let her earn a higher income in this coming season.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs for the rice field and potato plantation.

loans.name: Ana Josefa

texts.es: Ana Josefa de 59 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien es jubilado y de edad avanzada. Ana posee una venta de productos de belleza tales como perfumes, cremas para el cuerpo y el cabello y otros más. Mucho de estos productos se comercializan por catalogo, de los cuales se venden a crédito, esta es una estrategia que Ana utiliza para poder asegurar sus ventas aunque en muchas ocasiones es bastante riesgosa. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de cosméticos e incrementar su inventario y  así mejorar sus ventas. Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora, la cual siempre se ha esforzado al máximo por contar con una vida estable.
texts.en: Ana Josefa is 59 years old and lives with her husband, who is retired and advanced in age. Ana sells beauty products like perfumes, body and hair creams, and other items. She sells many of the products on credit via catalog, which is one of the strategies she uses to assure herself of sales, although many times there is a fair amount of risk. It's for this reason she is requesting a loan, so she can purchase a larger quantity of cosmetics and increase her inventory and thus sell more items. Ana is a very hardworking woman who always puts in the maximum effort to have a stable life.

loans.use: to purchase beauty supplies.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
La socia Marlene es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, tiene 45 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 5 hijos. 

La socia Marlene sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y es contadora pública, ella tiene un estudio contable en la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son 20 años que se dedica a este profesión y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño de su trabajo.  

La socia Marlene solicita el préstamo para implementar su estudio contable desea comprar materiales de escritorio como papeles, lapiceros y otras más. La socia Marlene está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota. Su sueño de Marlene es terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Marlene is a native of the city of Cusco, the same city in which she was born and still lives. She is 45 years old, and is in a common-law relationship in which she has five chidlren. 
 
Marlene continues to be a member of the communal bank "Santo Domingo" and is a public accountant. She has an accounting firm in the city of Cusco. She has already spent 20 years making a living in this profession and is doing very well thanks to the performance of her work. 
  
Marlene is asking for this loan in order to set up her accounting firm. She wishes to buy materials such as paper, pens, and more. Marlene is happy to be receiving this loan and promises to comply with the loan repayment quotas. Her dream is to finish building her house.

loans.use: to by writing materials like paper, pens and more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, and thread

loans.name: Souma

texts.en:
Souma is a 39-year-old married woman and mother of three children. She opened a grocery store in 2007 to help her husband in making their living and providing their children with the best education.

Souma is a hard worker with a very good reputation. She seeks perfection and makes sure that her customers are pleased and satisfied.

Souma applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, for the first time, in order to increase her business merchandise with special discount products such as fruits, vegetables, and drinks.

Souma is planning to turn her store to a larger supermarket in the future.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise

loans.name: Mwanatumu

texts.en:
Mwanatumu is 28 years old, married, and has a daughter who is underage. In search of a source of income for her family, Mwanatumu started her own business selling fish in 2011 with an initial sum of 2,000 KES. Thanks to her persistence and hard work, she was able to increase her turnover of goods, making a monthly profit of 8,000 KES. 

Mwanatumu sells different types of fish. Today, the merchandise selection is limited, and this is why she requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 KES from Yehu to purchase stock of fish, frying pans, and five litres of cooking oil. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into business development and also plans to buy a refrigerator in future.

loans.use: to purchase stock of fish, frying pans, and five litres of cooking oil.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia Lucila es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos  hijos. 
La socia Lucila pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” de la Asociación Arariwa, ella se dedica a la venta de auto partes de automóviles. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño de su trabajo.  

La socia Lucila solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo pistones, llantas, parabrisas y otras más. La socia Lucila está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota. Su sueño de Lucila es comprase una casa.
texts.en:
Lucila is a native of the city of Cusco and she still lives in the same city where she was born. She is 40 years old and married, with two children from this relationship.

Lucila belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank of Asociación Arariwa. She dedicates herself to selling automobile parts. She has already been in this business for several years, and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

Lucila is requesting a loan to buy merchandise like pistons, tires, and windshields, among others. She is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule. Lucila's dream is to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like pistons, tires, and windshields

loans.name: Jovena

texts.en: Jovena and her husband are both farmers who live in a rural community. They cultivate their farmland by planting rice and some vegetables to sell. They aim to educate their two children and give them a better life. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, they need to increase their income to cover their needs and support the education of their children. In this regard, Jovena engages in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. She aimed to raise more pigs for sale but due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional loan of PHP 33,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise. She hopes that someday she will make her business grow and become more profitable as she continues to work hard and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise

location.town: Brgy. La Torre North, Bayombong,Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Pierre

texts.en: Pierre is aged 28. He sells rice and milk. He is married with one child aged one. He has been in the business for two years. He wants the loan to buy more rice and milk to sell. The profits from the business will be reinvested in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more rice and milk to sell

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 52 years old, married, and has four children. For seven years, she has been selling cereals to earn a living. Besides this, she is employed in a juice-processing firm. Through Faulu Kenya, she has been empowered economically. This has helped her to improve her business.

Jane desires to grow her business into wholesale in the future. She needs a loan of 100,000 KES to buy beans, maize, and peas.

loans.use: to buy beans, maize, and peas

loans.name: Ana Gricelda

texts.es: Ana Gricelda de 35 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas, hombres y niños, la cual comercializa desde hace varios años de forma ambulante en diferentes colonias y departamentos del país. Ella vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como albañil y así mismo junto a dos hijos. Con el paso del tiempo Ana ha deseado mejorar su negocio, aumentando la cantidad de ropa que vende ya que cuenta con varios clientes fijos, pero con la visión de crecer constantemente ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar variedad de ropa interior, y también adquirir camisas para niños, las cuales tienen un mercado amplio y pueden venderse a muy buenos precios. Ana es muy trabajadora con muchos deseos de superarse junto a su familia.
texts.en: Ana Gricelda is 35 years old and sells undergarments for women, men, and children. She has been selling these items as an itinerant vendor for several years, in different colonies and departments of the country. She lives with her husband who works as a mason, and they have two children together. Over time, Ana has hoped to improve her business, increasing the quantity of clothing that she sells. She already has some regular customers, but with the goal of constantly growing, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral. With this loan, she will be able to buy a variety of undergarments and also acquire children's shirts, for which there is a good market. She will be able to sell them at good prices. Ana is very hard working, with great dreams of lifting her family up.

loans.use: to buy undergarments to sell

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La socia Yolanda pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,la socia continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como gaseosas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Yolanda belongs to the Vallecito ("Little Valley") communal bank. She continues to run her grocery store business. She sells different types of products, like rice, sugar, milk, sweets, and soft drinks, among others. Yolanda has been in this business for some time and it has gone well thanks to her dedication to the business. She is a responsible and hard working person, which is how she moves her family forward.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, such as soft drinks, for her business. She feels grateful for the loan she has been granted and promises to comply with her established repayments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business, such as soft drinks

loans.name: Eda

texts.en:
Eda, 45, is an enterprising, kind, very hardworking woman. She is a widow who has five adult children.

She has a food stall located at the market, where she sells basic dishes.  She hopes to make the business grow still more and hopes to continue to work like she’s done to date.

This is her third Yehu loan and she thanks the people who make this opportunity to have working capital available. She will use the requested loan to buy more ingredients like sugar, beans, rice, and cooking oil.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like sugar, beans, rice, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Santos Ángela

texts.es: Santos Ángela vive junto a su esposo y una hija menor de edad quien le ayuda con el negocio. Ella es una señora muy trabajadora, la cual debe dar su mayor esfuerzo día con día para poder salir adelante junto su familia. Santos posee una tienda, la cual se encuentra ubicada en su casa de habitación, y en la que comercializa diferentes tipos de productos varios como: pan, golosinas, sodas y otros productos más. El mayor deseo de Santos es el de poder mejorar sus ventas, es por esto que solicita un préstamo con el cual pueda llevar a cabo este deseo, ya que esta es la única forma en la cual puede contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en el negocio, y así comprar todos los productos necesarios para contar con más  clientes ya que se encuentra ubicada en una zona en la cual hay una gran afluencia de personas diariamente, lo que es una gran ventaja.  Esto llena de mucha ilusión a Santos porque de esta forma podrá contar con una mejor estabilidad económica en la cual supla todas las necesidades de su hogar.
texts.en: Santos Ángela lives with her husband and one young daughter who helps with her business. She is a very hard working woman who gives her best effort day in and day out, in order for herself and her family to get ahead. Santos has a store that is located in the house where she lives. She sells different types of products in her store, such as: bread, sweets, sodas, and other products. Santos' greatest dream is to be able to improve her sales, which is why she is requesting a loan. This is the only way she will be able to have the necessary money to invest in her business, and therefore to be able to buy all of the products she needs to bring in more customers. She is located in an area where there is a great influx of people each day, which is a great advantage. This opportunity makes Santos very happy because this way she will be able to count on more economic stability, so that she can provide for her household necessities.

loans.use: to buy bread, sweets, sodas, and other products to sell

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en: Jaime believes that "Hard work will bear a good fruit". He is 56 years old, married, and has one grown-up child. He is raising his family in a rural community where he is able to plant rice and vegetables and raise livestock for sale. Despite the hardship of living, he aims to become successful in life to give his family a better future. He aims to improve his hog-raising business by raising more piglets to sell in the future. To improve the business, he is asking for an additional loan of PHP 18,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. He hopes that this financial assistance will enable him to improve the business as he continues to work hard and strive for it.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is taking out another Kiva loan in order to expand her existing business. She says that the previous loan helped her to improve her business significantly as it enabled her to renovate her chicken house. She was also able to buy more chicks, which she says have now grown big enough for sale. 

Beatrice believes that she does well because she is responsible and she has a strong drive to get ahead. She is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support, she will be able to buy more chicks, feeding equipment, and chicken feed. She will improve her quality of life and continue working hard to make her greatest dream a reality: to own a rental house.

loans.use: to buy more chicks, feeding equipment, and chicken feed.

loans.name: Aloys

texts.en: Aloys is 38 years old and married with four children, aged five and thirteen. He has been selling clothes as a business for eight years. With the loan he has applied for, he wants to buy more clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Freddie

texts.en:
Freddie is a responsible farmer who has been working at this job for 15 years. He had no choice but to become a farmer because he was not able to finish his education. He is 34, married to Marilyn and blessed with five children. 

Freddie wants to provide his children with the necessities of life. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farming business. He hopes to produce better crops so that he can protect his family from a difficult way of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Wayna Taucaray Iii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WAYNA TAUCARAY”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teresa ella es casada y tiene 52 años y tiene 6 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de ceviche (es un plato a base de pescado con limón y camote),la socia vende en el mercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 3 años en este negocio, en sus tiempos libres la socia le gusta salir a pasera con sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender el ceviche. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como pescado, camote, limón y maíz al  por mayor.
La socias que están pegadas a la foto grupal se les tomo después porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo y también las socias que están tapadas sus caras ya no pertenecen al banco comunal Wayna Taucaray.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de librería, negocio de hotel, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de restaurant y negocio de venta de vinos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "WAYNA TAUCARAY" communal bank; this bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

One member, Teresa, is 52 years old and is married with 6 children. She works in her business selling ceviche (a dish made from fish with lemon and sweet potato) in the market from 8.00am until 4.00pm. She has been working in this business for 3 years. In her free time, she likes to go out for a walk with her children. Her dream is to have the premises from which to sell her ceviche. She is requesting the loan to buy cooking products such as fish, sweet potatoes, lemons and corn wholesale. 

The members who are in the smaller photo had their photo taken after the main group because they asked for permission for work reasons, and the members whose faces are covered no longer belong to the Wayna Taucaray communal bank. The other members have businesses including a bookshop, a hotel, a grocery store, a restaurant and a wine-selling business.

Teresa is grateful to those who form part of her dream through this medium and she promises to meet her repayments within the established time frame.

loans.use: to buy cooking products such as fish, sweet potatoes, lemons and corn wholesale.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La socia Paulina es natural de la ciudad del Paruro pero vive en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene un hijo. 

La socia Paulina pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” de la Asociación Arariwa, ella se dedica a la venta de juguetes y artesanía. Ya son 20 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño de su trabajo.  

La socia Paulina solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo juguetes y otras más. La socia Paulina está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Paulina is originally from the city of Paruro, but lives in Cusco. She is 45 years old and is married, and as the fruit of this beautiful relationship she has a son. 

Paulina belongs to the Santo Domingo communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa, she makes her living selling toys and handicrafts. She has now spent 20years in this business and it is doing well thanks to her hard work.

Paulina is seeking this loan to buy merchandise such as toys and more. Paulina is happy about the loan and pledges to meet the repayments.

loans.use: to buy goods such as toys and more.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesús Group

texts.es:
El comité Divino Niño Jesús esta compuesto por 15 integrantes mujeres que se dedican a actividades varias. El comité se encuentra en su décimo cuarto ciclo y las integrantes se encuentran muy entusiasmadas por continuar en el programa. El comité ha demostrado ser muy responsable, constante y sobre todo unido ya que entre todas las integrantes se ayudan para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. 
Una de las integrantes la señora Carmen, tiene 45 años es casada y tiene 2 hijas, es cocinera. Cocina para ella y su familia y también para la comunidad. Gracias a su habilidad culinaria ella vende sus platos a un buen precio y son muy sabrosos y conocidos por la calidad del producto y buen precio. 
El crédito solicitado sería para comprar los ingredientes como verduras, carne de vaca, de pollo, cerdo, panificados, aceites, etc que son necesarios para continuar con el negocio.
texts.en:
The Divino Niño Jesús communal bank is made up of 15 female members who work in several fields. The communal bank is in its 14th loan cycle and the members are very keen to continue in the program. The communal bank has proved to be very responsible, persevering and, above all, united as all the members help each other in order to get ahead and help their families.

One of the members is Carmen, she is 45 years old, married with 2 children, and is a cook. She cooks for herself and her family as well as for the community. Thanks to her culinary skills, she sells dishes at a competitive price which are delicious, and are renowned for the product quality and the value for money. 

The loan she is seeking would be to buy ingredients such as vegetables, beef, chicken, pork, bakery products, oils and so on which are necessary to continue in this business.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs such as vegetables, meat, baked products and so on.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando  de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y una hija quien ayuda con los quehaceres del hogar y también a estudiar. Fernando es un señor muy emprendedor, quien posee su propio negocio el cual es una tienda en la cual comercializa productos perecederos y de primera necesidad, su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación y es el que le permite contar con todo lo necesario para vivir de una forma estable junto a su familia, así mismo debido a su lesión en la pierna es de mucho beneficio ya que se le facilita atenderlo. Fernando solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos como: bebidas, pan, golosinas, desinfectantes, detergentes, pan, cereales y todos los productos que más son solicitados por sus clientes. El mayor deseo de Fernando  es el de poder mejorar sus ventas, ya que son estas las que le permiten sostener a su hogar.
texts.en:
Fernando, 56, lives with his wife and one daughter who helps with the household chores and also with studies. Fernando is a very enterprising man, who owns his own business, a store in which he sells perishable products and basic goods. His business is located in his home as it enables him to have everything he needs to live in a stable manner with his family. Likewise, given his leg injury it very convenient to have the business in his home as it makes it easier to run the business.

Fernando is seeking a loan through which he can buy a larger quantity of products such as drinks, bread, sweets, disinfectants, detergents, cereals and all goods which are most sought after by his customers. Fernando's biggest desire is to increase his sales, as they are what enable him to support his household.

loans.use: to buy cereals, bulk grains and more to stock the store.

loans.name: Theogene

texts.en: Theogene is 26 years old. He is single. He runs a minor studio of burning CDs. With the loan, he wants to buy CDs to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy more CDs for sale.

loans.name: Hafswa

texts.en:
Hafswa is married to a businessman called Nyandu. The couple has three children under their care, all of whom are in school. Together with her husband, Hafswa ensures that the various household expenses are met. To cover these expenses, she works as a food vendor in a neighborhood of Kenya. In addition to this business, she also owns a rental house that earns her income. Hafswa has been working in this area for six years and has a number of reliable customers.

To better meet the needs of her ever growing customer base, and to make more profits, Hafswa has requested a second loan from Yehu to buy a baler of wheat and maize flour, 10 litres of cooking oil, and 6kgs of beans. Her first loan was successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy a baler of wheat and maize flour, 10 litres of cooking oil, and 6 kgs of beans.

loans.name: Las Amigas Group

texts.es:
El comité las amigas esta conformado por 17 integrantes mujeres todas dedicadas a actividades varias, desde la venta de ropas hasta la confección de las mismas. Todas las señoras del comité son responsables y emprendedoras, muchas de ellas desean aumentar la cantidad de clientes y también su propio negocio para generar mayor ingreso y con eso mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familiares, ellas contribuyen mucho en la economía familiar pagando ya sea la alimentación, el alquiler, la educación entre otros gastos.
Una de las integrantes, la señora Blanca se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas tanto para mujeres como para hombres, la señora ya cuenta con una clientela frecuente ya que sus prendas son vendidas a una precio bajo y accesible.
El crédito solicitado sería destinado a la compra de mayor cantidad de mercaderías para de esa forma poder ofrecer mayor variedad de ropas y con eso aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Las Amigas communal bank is made up of 17 female members who all work in various fields, from selling clothes to making them. All the women in this communal bank are responsible and enterprising, many of them want to increase their customer base as well as to improve their businesses in order to generate large income and thereby improve the quality of life of their family members. The women contribute a lot to the family income whether it is paying for food, rent, education fees among other costs.

One of the members, Blanca, works in the sale of second-hand clothes for men and women. Blanca already has a regular customer base as she sells her clothes at a low and accessible price. The loan she is seeking will be used to buy a larger volume of goods in order to offer a wider variety of clothes, and thereby increase sales.

loans.use: to buy men and women's clothing such as T-shirts, shirts, trousers, and so on.

loans.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es: Sonia Elizabeth de 39 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijos menores de edad, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora quien desea lo mejor para su familia.  Desde hace varios años que Sonia se dedica a vender ropa, en el mercado municipal de la ciudad en que reside donde es muy conocida y cuenta con varios clientes fijos, pero que debido a una remodelación del mercado han disminuido, situación que está dispuesta a cambiar. Ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa, en diferentes tallas y colores, y de esta forma llamar la atención nuevamente de sus antiguos clientes y al mismo tiempo obtener nuevos lo que será muy positivo para Sonia y su familia.
texts.en:
Sonia Elizabeth, 39, a single mother with 2 children, is a very responsible and hard-working lady who wants the best for her family. She has been selling clothes for several years in the municipal market of the city in which she lives where she is well known and has several steady customers. However, due to restructuring of the market, her customer base has shrunk, a situation which Sonia is ready to change.

She seeks a loan to buy a larger volume of clothes, in different colors and sizes, and thereby once again attract the attention of her former customers, and at the same time, attract new ones which would be very positive for Sonia and her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.en: Marcial is an industrious father and farmer who lives in a village in Cagayan, the Philippines. Through the income generated from his business, he is able to provide for his family's basic needs, but is currently unable to support the education of all his six children. Thus he needs to increase his income from his farming. To make this possible, he is requesting a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy additional seeds, fertilizer and insecticides. He hopes that, with these essential farming supplies, he can earn higher proceeds and save funds so that his children can finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy additional seeds, fertilizer and insecticides

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla is a 42-year-old mother of seven children. Four of her children are working while the other three are still in school. Priscilla is a dedicated and determined woman with two business activities. She sells women’s and children’s clothing door to door, and in addition, she also sells soaps to the neighborhood.

With the two businesses, Priscilla can ensure a decent income for herself and her family. She has applied for a loan to purchase more bales of clothes to expand her clothing business. One day, she wants to open a boutique.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes to expand her clothing business.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina Isabel de 59 años de edad, vive junto a dos hijas quienes le ayudan con el negocio y así mismo con dos nietos. Reina posee una tortillería desde hace 10 años, en el cual ha trabajado arduamente por el bienestar de sus hijas, ya que Reina es una madre  muy dedicada a su hogar y que cuenta con enormes deseos de salir adelante. Ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda compra maíz para la elaboración de las tortillas, esto debido a que cuenta con muy buena clientela, y ella desea poder atender a más clientes, puesto que en muchas ocasiones por falta de masa no ha podido atender a más personas, es por ello que solicita el préstamo el cual le permita comprar más materia prima y así vender más y obtener mayores ganancias. El deseo de Reina es el de mantener estable su negocio para poder seguir trabajando de esta manera ya que se le facilita en gran manera por estar en su casa de habitación.
texts.en:
Reina Isabel, 59, lives with her two daughters who help out with the business, and she also has two grandchildren. Reina has had a tortilla production business for 10 years. She has worked hard for the welfare of her children - she is a very dedicated mother with a great desire to succeed. 

Reina applied for a loan in order to buy corn for making tortillas. She has a very good customer base and she wants to be able serve even more customers. She often runs out of corn which has meant that she is unable to serve more people, which is why she is applying for this loan - so that she can buy more raw ingredients in order to increase sales and earnings. Reina's desire is to keep her business going, so that she can continue working. She is greatly helped by being able to work from her home.

loans.use: to buy corn and propane gas to help with her business

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al ngeocio de tienda de abarrotes ,ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite,la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta pasear con sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Martha continues to making her living running a grocery store, she sells basic products such as rice, sugar, milk and oil and works from 5:00am to 10:00pm, Martha has worked in this business for 6 years. In her free time, Martha likes to walk with her children, her dream is to expand the grocery store business. She is seeking the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and biscuits in bulk. Martha is happy about the loan and pledges to meet repayments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and biscuits in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Yaneth

texts.es: Ana Yaneth de 36 años de edad quien vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos pequeños. Ana es una persona muy responsable, quien se dedica a la venta de perfumes, cremas para el cuerpo y el cabello, diferentes cosméticos. Sus ventas las realiza en su hogar y así mismo de forma ambulante, ya que ella ofrece sus productos de casa en casa con vecinos, y amigos y personas de confianza, sus ganancias son muy estables, razón por la que desea invertir más. Ana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de cosméticos y cremas para el cuidado personal los cuales no es muy fácil para ella obtenerlos ya que la mayoría de sus ventas son a crédito, por lo que no siempre cuenta con el dinero necesario para aumentar sus productos. Es así como por medio de dicho préstamo ella espera contar con todo lo necesario para mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en: Ana Yaneth, age 36, lives with her husband and two small children. Ana is a very responsible person who sells perfume, creams for the body and the hair, and different cosmetics. She makes her sales at home and also offers her products door-to-door to neighbours, friends, and other trusted people. Her earnings are very stable, and for this reason she wants to invest more. Ana is requesting a loan through which she will be able to buy a larger quantity of cosmetics and creams for personal care. It is not easy for her to obtain these items, since the majority of her sales are on credit; for this reason she does not always have the necessary money to increase her stock. For this reason, through this loan she hopes to have everything necessary to improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to stock her business.

loans.name: Toro Blanco Group

texts.es:
El comité  Toro Blanco esta conformado por 12 integrantes mujeres que son vecinas de la misma comunidad. Las mujeres son de procedencia humilde y trabajadoras al mismo tiempo que buscan un mejor porvenir para ellas y sus familias.Las integrantes del comité son muy solidarias, emprendedoras y responsables.
Una de las integrantes, la señora Carmen es dueña de un almacén donde vende productos de limpieza en general, alimentos básicos como panificados, fideos, arroz, yerbas y productos que vienen en lata como choclo, atún, etc. 
El crédito solicitado sería para comprar mayor cantidad de mercaderías para luego venderlas a un precio justo y accesible y de esa forma aumentar la cantidad de clientes y de productos ofertados.
texts.en:
The Toro Blanco communal bank is made up of 12 female members who are neighbors in the same community. The women are hardworking and of a humble origin, at the same time, they fight for a better future for themselves and their family. The members of the communal bank are united, enterprising and responsible.

One of the members, Carmen owns a store where she sells cleaning products in general, basic foodstuffs such as bakery products, noodles, rice, mate drinks and products which come in tins such as corn, tuna, etc. The loan being sought would be to buy a large volume of goods to then sell them at a fair and accessible price and thereby increase the number of customers and products offered.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, cleaning products, bakery goods, noodles, rice, etc

loans.name: Jose Salomon

texts.es: Jose Salomón de 43 años, casado, con 4 hijos de los cuales 2 dependen económicamente de el porque están estudiando tiene por actividad económica una sastrería, lo cual consiste en la elaboración de prendas (pantalones, trajes de sacos, uniformes de empresas, uniformes de colegios, el negocio lo tiene desde hace 26 años. esta ubicado en su casa de habitación.  Jose Salomón se ha caracterizado por un hombre muy responsable en lo personal y de trabajo, luchador, con ganas de salir adelante par cumplir sus metas y objetivos como es forma profesionalmente a sus hijos. Ya que el por falta de recursos de sus padre cuando era un nino no pudo estudiar una carrera , y se vio en la necesidad de aprender un oficio para salir adelante, oficio que hoy en día le ha sido de gran ayuda, y sobre todo le gusta lo que hace, ya que lo hace ser una persona útil a al sociedad, ademas es su herramienta de trabajo para salir adelante con su familia.  Jose Salomón necesita el financiamiento para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes, los productos que necesita comprar son los siguientes: telas, hilos, agujas, tijeras, carretes, entre otros.
texts.en:
Jose Salomón, 43, is married with four children of whom two of them depend on him financially because they are in school. He has for a business activity a tailoring business which consists of making clothing (pants, suits, employee and school uniforms). He has had the business for 26 years and it is located in his own home. Jose Salomón has been characterized as a responsible man in both his personal and work affairs, a fighter, with the desire to get ahead in order to achieve his goals and objectives such as professional training for his children. Since he was not able to study for a career as a child due to his parents' lack of resources he had to learn a trade in order to get ahead, a trade which has been of great help to him these days. Above all he likes what he does since it makes him useful to society and is his tool for getting ahead with his family. 

Jose Salomón needs the loan in order to meet customer demand. The products he needs to purchase are the following: cloth, thread, needles, scissors, and bobbins among other items.

loans.use: to purchase work materials for his tailor shop such as cloth, thread, needles, scissors, and bobbins among other items.

loans.name: Ana De Los Ángeles

texts.es: Ana de Los Ángeles de 42 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable quien trabaja junto a su esposo para darle lo mejor a sus cuatro hijos. Ana posee un negocio en su casa de habitación en el cual elabora y vende platillos típicos como pupusas, atoles y demás. Debido a que ya posee muchos años de tener este negocio, cuenta con una amplia clientela, la cual asiste a su puesto ya que la consideran como una persona de mucha confianza que toma en cuenta todos los estándares de calidad en lo que prepara. Ana solicita un préstamo con el deseo de poder aumentar sus ventas, ya que ella espera poder comprar, verduras, queso, maíz y todos los ingredientes necesarios para hacer los platillos ya que ella cuenta con la ilusión de aumentar sus ventas, es por ello que desea poder brindarles un mejor servicio de comida a sus clientes y así mismo obtener nuevos clientes lo que le genera ganancias extras.
texts.en: Ana de Los Ángeles, age 42, is a very responsible person who works with her husband to give their four children the best. Ana has a business in her home where she makes and sells traditional foods such as pupusas [a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans], atoles [thick, masa-based drink], and more. Since she has already had this business for many years, she has a large base of customers who come to her stall. They consider her to be a very trustworthy person who takes all the quality standards into account in her food preparation. Ana is requesting a loan with which she wants to increase her sales. She hopes to buy vegetables, cheese, corn, and all of the necessary ingredients for making the foods. She hopes to increase her sales, so she wants to be able to provide a better food service to her clients and obtain new clients to generate extra income.

loans.use: to buy basic ingredients for making traditional foods.

loans.name: Sandra Verónica

texts.es: Sandra Verónica es una joven madre de familia de dos niños con muchas ganas de mejorar en la vida. Ella posee una venta de pollo y menudos de estos, la cual está ubicada sobre calle principal, lo que es muy positivo ya que esta a la vista de muchas personas. Las ganancias de este negocio son las que le permiten  sostener su hogar y contar con todo lo necesario para tener una vida estable. Sandra solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de pollo y menudos para contar con más productos y vender más. Ella es una persona muy amable por lo que posee varios clientes fijos, pero que también cuenta con el enorme deseo de mejorar sus ventas para vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Sandra Verónica is a young mother of a family of two children  and is very eager to improve in life.  She owns a small shop that sells chicken and chicken giblets, which is located on the main street, which is very positive as it is in view of many people. The earnings from this business are such that they permit her to sustain her household and have everything necessary to have a stable life. 

Sandra is applying for a loan by means of which she can buy a greater quantity of chicken and giblets in order to have more products and to sell more.  She is a very nice person and because of this she has several regular customers but she also has the enormous desire to improve her sales in order to live better.

loans.use: to purchase chickens to sell.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de agencia de viajes,la socia vende boletos turisticos a los turistas y tambien a las agencias de viajes,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta preparar galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio de venta de boletos turisticos,el sueño de la socia es tener su propia agencia de viajes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar boletos turisticos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mery is continuing with her travel agency business. She sells tour tickets to the tourists and also to the travel agencies. In her free time, she enjoys making cookies. She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. She has had this business selling tour tickers for six years. Her dream is to have her own travel agency. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of tour tickets.
She is happy about the loan and promises to repay her quotas as established.

loans.use: to buy tour tickets.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia Graciela pertenece al banco comunal VALLECITO,la socia continua con su negocio de libreria,la socia vende cuadernos,libros,lapiceros,hojas,reglas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia ,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia ,la socia es una persona reponsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia puede seguir apoyando economicamente a sus hijos.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de libros para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Graciela belongs to the Vallecito communal bank. She is continuing with her bookstore business. She sells notebooks, books, pens, paper, rulers, and other items. She has had this business for some time and it is going well thanks to her daily hard work. She wants to keep working in order to continue supporting her family. She is a responsible and hard-working person; this is how she can keep supporting her children.
She is requesting this loan for the purchase of books for her business.
She is grateful for this loan and promises to repay her quotas as established.

loans.use: to buy books for her business.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.en:
Mahbuba is 59 years old and lives with her husband and five children. Mahbuba has been busy with farming for seven years. She grows different kinds of fruit trees. 

This is her second loan from AqroInvest and Kiva. She has a very good client history, which allows her credit in larger amounts. She will use the loan to buy fertilizer, seeds and tools for the farm. Mahbuba is very thankful for your support.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and tools for the farm

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
La socia Yoni es natural de la ciudad del Cotabambas pero vive en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 24 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión de libre de la cual tiene un hijo. 

La socia Yoni pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” de la Asociación Arariwa, ella se dedica a la venta de salchipapas y pollipapas, ella prepara estas comidas especiales en una carreta de forma ambulatoria, ella vende  sus comidas desde las 4pm hasta las 10pm de lunes a domingo en la puerta de su casa. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño de su trabajo.  

La socia Yoni solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo pollos, papas, aceite, salchicha y otras más. La socia Yoni está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yoni is originally from the city of Cotabambas but lives in the city of Cusco, she is 24-years-old and she is in a civil union from which she has a son.

Yoni belongs to the “Santo Domingo” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa. She makes her living selling salchipapas and pollipages, fried potatoes and sausages or chicken. She makes these special dishes in a vendor cart, selling her food from 4pm to 10pm from Monday to Sunday at the front door to her home. She has already spent several years working in this business and it has gone very well thanks to her performance. 

Yoni seeks this loan to buy goods such as chicken, potatoes, oil, sausages and others. Yoni is happy about the loan and she pledges to meet the repayments.

loans.use: to buy goods such as for example chicken, potatoes, oil, sausages and more.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily, 32, is an enterprising, kind, very hardworking woman. She and her husband live in a rental house.

She’s had a retail shop at home for over five years where she sells groceries and other basic staple items. She buys her merchandise every week wholesale in the city’s main market. What she likes about her work is the independence it gives her to do other things. She hopes to make the business grow so as to increase her monthly income.

She will use the loan to buy more groceries and other items to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy more groceries and other items to stock her store.

loans.name: Josiane

texts.en:
Josiane is 34 years old. She is married, with two children ages nine and eleven. 

She sells beans and has been in the business for four years. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy more beans for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more beans for sale.

loans.name: Claudia Andrea

texts.es:
Claudia es una persona muy trabajadora que desde los 18 años de edad comenzó a trabajar fuertemente con el ánimo de mejorar la condición económica que tenían sus padres, y gracias al empuje que siempre la ha caracterizado ha seguido trabajando fuertemente y progresando poco a poco. Actualmente se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 10 años de edad, y su negocio gracias a su esfuerzo ha crecido hasta ser una gran papelería donde puede generar ingresos que le permite a su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias a las buenas ventas que ha tenido en los últimos meses, Claudia busca un préstamo para comprar productos de papelería y surtir su almacén con productos que ya se han ido agotando.

Su sueño es poder diversificar sus ventas en un futuro ya que hay unas temporadas que son muy frías, lo que hace que sus ingresos se vean fuertemente afectados y las condiciones en su hogar se hagan muy difíciles. Además, aspira a poder ofrecerle a su hijo una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Claudia is a very hardworking person.  Since the age of 18, she has worked hard with the goal of improving her parent’s financial situation.  Thanks to the drive that has always characterized her, she keeps working hard and making progress little by little.  

Now she is married and has a 10-year-old son.  Because of her efforts, her business has grown to be a great stationary store that can generate enough income so that her family has a better quality of life.  

Thanks to the good sales she has had in recent months, Claudia is looking for a loan to buy paper products and stock her store with a variety of products that have depleted.  Her dream is to diversify her sales in the future since some seasons are very cold, which affects her income and makes life at home very difficult.  Also, she hopes to be able to offer her son a better education.

loans.use: buy paper products and stock her store with products that have depleted.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make adjustments to his shop

loans.name: Thoul's Group

texts.en:
Thoul is 35 years old. She lives in a rural village of the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She is a married mother of four, one daughter of whom is dependent on her and still in school. 

She has earned a living through growing cassava for several years. The current business earns her about 34,000KHR per day. The low price of cassava in the market is the main challenge for her business.

Thoul has been with VisionFund for four cycles, while the other members have been with VisionFund from one to four cycles. She successfully repaid the past loans, which have helped her relieve her family’s burden. She is now leading her group of five to request a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her cassava farm and will use a portion of the loan to hire labor. Thoul hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income so as to make a better living and keep her daughter in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her cassava farm and to hire labor.

loans.name: Ramon Antonio

texts.es:
Ramón trabaja desde hace 7 años vendiendo frutas y verduras y con este negocio genera los ingresos que requiere en su hogar para sostener los gastos de su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 14, 16 y 19 años de edad. Anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa pero debido a que su salario no le alcanzaba para sostener los gastos de su hogar, decidió busca una mejor fuente de ingresos y fue así como montó su negocio. A pesar de que con esta venta de frutas y verduras la condición económica en su hogar ha mejorado, aún presenta grandes dificultades económicas que busca superar poco a poco trabajando fuertemente, y para lograrlo, Ramón busca un préstamo que le permita comprar surtido de frutas y verduras y ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos.

Su sueño es poderle brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida que la que tienen actualmente y ofrecerles a sus 3 hijos el acceso aun educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Ramón has worked for seven years selling fruit and vegetables and with this business he generates income required at home to support the expenses of his wife and their three children who are 14, 16, and 19 years old. Previously he worked at a company but, since his salary wasn't enough to pay the bills, he decided to look for a better source of income and it was in this way that he started his business. Although with this sale of fruit and vegetables the economic condition at home has improved, he still faces large financial difficulties which he is trying to overcome gradually  by working hard to achieve. Ramón is looking for a loan that allows him to buy stock of fruit and vegetables and to offer his customers a greater variety of products.

His dream is to be able to provide a better quality of life to his family than what they have now and offer his three children access to a university education.

loans.use: to purchase fruit and vegetables and offer a greater variety of products to his customers.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos, y debido a que los ingresos que esta generando su esposo no están siendo suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, desea iniciar su propio negocio de venta de comidas rápidas aprovechando que su hogar se encuentra ubicado en un lugar donde visitan muchas personas gracias a la vista que ofrece el paisaje. Es por esto que Maria busca un préstamo para comprar un carro de comidas rápidas y los insumos necesarios para la preparación de las comidas.

De esta manera comenzará a generar ingresos que espera puedan mejorar la situación económica tan difícil que esta viviendo su familia y así poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Su mayor sueño es poder tener en su familia una calidad de vida digna para sus hijos y ofrecerles el acceso a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Maria is married and has 3 children. Given that her husband's income is not enough to cover the household spending, she wants to start her own business selling fast food, taking advantage of the fact that her home is found is am area with high footfall thanks to the view it has of the countryside. This is why Maria is seeking a loan to buy a fast food cart and the ingredients needed to prepare the dishes.

In this way, she will start to generate an income which she hopes will improve the very difficult financial situation that her family is in, and thereby be able to offer a better quality of life and better financial opportunities to get ahead. Her biggest dream is to have a decent quality of life for her children and give them access to a higher quality of education.

loans.use: to buy a fast food cart and the ingredients needed to prepare dishes.
